Addon_Beartrap_001.name: Honing Stone
Addon_Beartrap_001.description:
When used with the Bear Trap, the honing stone sharpens its blades. The razor-sharp blades inflicts deep wounds aimed at bleeding the victim as fast as possible.

The trapped victim is left dying instead of injured if they free themselves.

Addon_Beartrap_002.name: Serrated Jaws
Addon_Beartrap_002.description:
These replacement Bear Trap jaws have saw like blades which cause awful open wounds when they snap.

Bear Traps inflict Hemorrhage on trapped Survivors until they are healed.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_Beartrap_003.name: Trapper Bag
Addon_Beartrap_003.description:
A cured leather waist bag. Large and sturdy to transport hunting equipment.

Start with 1 extra Bear Trap.Allows the transportation of 1 extra Bear Trap.

Addon_Beartrap_004.name: Wax Brick
Addon_Beartrap_004.description:
A block of wax used to lower friction and facilitate movement in mechanical parts.

Increases the time required to rescue a Survivor or attempt escape from a Bear Trap by 33%.

Addon_Beartrap_005.name: Lengthened Jaws
Addon_Beartrap_005.description:
Jaws with long teeth that dig further into the flesh than a conventional Bear Trap.

When Survivors escape Bear Traps, they are inflicted with Deep Wound.

Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

Addon_Beartrap_006.name: Tar Bottle
Addon_Beartrap_006.description:
A black, matte and sticky substance similar to tar. When applied to Bear Traps, makes them far less noticeable.

Darkens the appearance of Bear Traps.

Addon_Beartrap_007.name: Makeshift Wrap
Addon_Beartrap_007.description:
A scratched and worn brace made of thick, cured animal skin.

The Trapper cannot be caught in his Bear Traps.Bear Traps will be disarmed if The Trapper steps on them.

Addon_Beartrap_008.name: 4-Coil Spring Kit
Addon_Beartrap_008.description:
A replacement kit for Bear Traps which changes the usual dual spring system with 4 coil springs adding a great amount of strength to the traps' hold.

Increases time required for Survivors to disarm Bear Traps by 33%.

Addon_Beartrap_009.name: Trapper Sack
Addon_Beartrap_009.description:
A crude leather sack suitable for foraging.

All Bear Traps are carried at the beginning of the Trial instead of spawning on the map.Bear Traps cannot be picked up.

Addon_Beartrap_010.name: Trapper Gloves
Addon_Beartrap_010.description:
Protective padded leather gloves.

Increases Bear Trap setting speed by 30%.

Addon_Beartrap_011.name: Secondary Coil
Addon_Beartrap_011.description:
A secondary coil which keeps a Bear Trap effective in times when the primary coils becomes unusable.

Increases time required for Survivors to disarm Bear Traps by 50%.

Addon_Beartrap_012.name: Fastening Tools
Addon_Beartrap_012.description:
A specialized set of tools used to fasten Bear Traps to ensure their effectiveness.

Increases Bear Trap setting speed by 50%.Increases the time required to rescue a Survivor or attempt escape from a Bear Trap by 25%.

Addon_Beartrap_PaddedJaws.name: Padded Jaws
Addon_Beartrap_PaddedJaws.description:
These padded jaws are meant to restrain, not to wound.

Bear Traps do not inflict damage on trapped Survivors. Equipping this add-on negates the effects of Rusted Jaws and Serrated Jaws.Points awarded for trapping Survivors are increased by 100%.

Addon_Beartrap_TrapperSack.name: Bear Oil
Addon_Beartrap_TrapperSack.description:
Melted animal fat that can lubricate the Bear Trap's squeaky joints.

Setting a Bear Trap is silent.

Addon_Bell_001.name: Bone Clapper
Addon_Bell_001.description: A bell clapper made from a highly polished piece of bone. Causes the sounds of the Wailing Bell to echo and warp chaotically.Survivors can no longer discern the Wailing Bell's distance or direction.

Addon_Bell_002.name: "The Ghost" - Soot
Addon_Bell_002.description:
The Khugwemuu symbol, representing the spirit world, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.

After Uncloaking, the Wraith's Terror Radius and Red Stain will remain suppressed for 6 seconds.

Addon_Bell_003.name: "The Hound" - Soot
Addon_Bell_003.description:
The Wonnug symbol, representing a peerless tracker, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.

While Cloaked, fresh blood marks are brighter than normal.

Addon_Bell_004.name: "Blind Warrior" - Mud
Addon_Bell_004.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.

Uncloak surprise attacks inflict Survivors with Blindness for 60 seconds. Blindness prevents survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_Bell_005.name: "Swift Hunt" - Mud
Addon_Bell_005.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing rapid descent on prey, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.

Increases uncloaking speed by 8%.

Addon_Bell_006.name: "Swift Hunt" - Blood
Addon_Bell_006.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing rapid descent on prey, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.

Increases uncloaking speed by 12%.

Addon_Bell_007.name: "The Beast" - Soot
Addon_Bell_007.description:
The Kunwulju symbol, representing the realm of fear, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.

The Wraith's Terror Radius is no longer suppressed while Cloaked.Bloodpoints granted for Stalking and surprise attacks are increased by 100%.

Addon_Bell_008.name: "All Seeing" - Blood
Addon_Bell_008.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing The Entity watching over us, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.

Unlocks hidden potential in one's aura reading ability. While Cloaked, the auras of Survivors within 8 meters are revealed to you.

Addon_Bell_009.name: "Windstorm"- Mud
Addon_Bell_009.description: The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.Increases the Wraith's movement speed while cloaked by 5%.

Addon_Bell_010.name: "Windstorm" - White
Addon_Bell_010.description: The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.Increases the Wraith's movement speed while cloaked by 7%.

Addon_Bell_011.name: "Blink" - Mud
Addon_Bell_011.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.

Increases cloaking speed by 40%.

Addon_Bell_012.name: "Blink" - White
Addon_Bell_012.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.

Increases cloaking speed by 60%.

ADDON_Bell_AllseeingSpirit.name: "All Seeing" - Spirit
ADDON_Bell_AllseeingSpirit.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing The Entity watching over us, glows ominously on the head of the bell.

Unlocks awesome potential in one's aura reading ability. While Cloaked, the repair progress of generators can be determined by the intensity of their auras.

ADDON_Bell_AllseeingWhite.name: "The Serpent" - Soot
ADDON_Bell_AllseeingWhite.description:
The Oas-Nek symbol, representing cunning, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.

The Wraith will Uncloak completely when breaking pallets or walls, or damaging generators while Cloaked.

ADDON_Bell_BlindBlood.name: "Shadow Dance" - White
ADDON_Bell_BlindBlood.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.

Increases speed of vaulting windows, breaking pallets or walls, and damaging generators by 40% while cloaked.

ADDON_Bell_BlindSpirit.name: "Shadow Dance" - Blood
ADDON_Bell_BlindSpirit.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.

Increases speed of vaulting windows, breaking pallets or walls, and damaging generators by 60% while cloaked.

ADDON_Bell_BlindWhite.name: "Blind Warrior" - White
ADDON_Bell_BlindWhite.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.

Uncloak surprise attacks inflict Mangled and Hemorrhage for 70 seconds.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

ADDON_Bell_CoxcombedClapper.name: Coxcombed Clapper
ADDON_Bell_CoxcombedClapper.description:
A simple coxcomb knotted rope wrapped around the bell clapper to muffle its sound. A malevolent aura emanates from it.

Renders the Wailing Bell completely silent.

ADDON_Bell_SwiftMud.name: "Swift Hunt" - White
ADDON_Bell_SwiftMud.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing rapid descent on prey, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.

Increases uncloaking speed by 10%.

ADDON_Bell_WindstormBlood.name: "Windstorm" - Blood
ADDON_Bell_WindstormBlood.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in blood on the body of the bell.

Increases the Wraith's movement speed while cloaked by 9%.

Addon_Blinker_001.name: Plaid Flannel
Addon_Blinker_001.description:
A torn piece of red and black plaid flannel. The scrap of fabric imbues The Nurse with devastating focus.

Allows the Nurse to see the Blink target location.

Addon_Blinker_002.name: White Nit Comb
Addon_Blinker_002.description:
A parasitic nit comb taken from the clinic. Once the symbol of a deep connection between an anxious patient and her nurse.

Decreases the length of Blink Attack lunges by 50%.Increases Bloodpoints for Blink Attack score events by 100%.

Addon_Blinker_003.name: Pocket Watch
Addon_Blinker_003.description:
A charred and broken pocket watch with rattling pieces. Taken from Nurse Moris' body.

Increases the time before The Nurse succumbs to fatigue after Blinking by 20%.

Addon_Blinker_004.name: Anxious Gasp
Addon_Blinker_004.description:
The gasp of surprise collected from an anxious girl which The Nurse was fond of. Twitches vigorously at The Nurse's touch.

Blinking past a survivor causes them to scream and awards 200 Bloodpoints for spooking them.

Addon_Blinker_005.name: Torn Bookmark
Addon_Blinker_005.description:
A white and pristine piece of ribbon once attached to a sacred book. Serves as the symbol of a dispute.

Adds 1 Blink charge.Increases Blink recharge time by 30%.

Addon_Blinker_006.name: Dark Cincture
Addon_Blinker_006.description:
A black rope used as a belt in times of mourning. Taken from Father Campbell's body.

Increases movement speed after a Blink but before the following fatigue by 30%.

Addon_Blinker_007.name: Fragile Wheeze
Addon_Blinker_007.description:
The whistling and rattling breath stolen from Father Campbell. Silently curves and bends at The Nurse's touch.

Blink Attacks inflict the Mangled status effect for 70 seconds.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_Blinker_008.name: Campbell's Last Breath
Addon_Blinker_008.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum priest Father Campbell. In the hands of The Nurse, it crackles with intensity.

After reappearing from a fully charged Blink, The Nurse immediately Blinks at full charge in the direction she is currently facing.This only works if The Nurse has a remaining Blink charge.

Addon_Blinker_009.name: Metal Spoon
Addon_Blinker_009.description:
A dull, partially rusted and stained metallic spoon. Confiscated from room 202's patient, the "Bad Man".

Hitting a survivor with a successful Blink Attack causes their sounds of pain to be 50% louder for 60 seconds.

Addon_Blinker_010.name: Bad Man Keepsake
Addon_Blinker_010.description:
A rotten molar extirpated from the "Bad Man's" cold dead hand.

Hitting a survivor with a successful Blink Attack causes their aura to be revealed when healing or being healed within a 28 meter range for 60 seconds.

Addon_Blinker_011.name: Wooden Horse
Addon_Blinker_011.description:
An unpainted toy carved out of cheap wood to resemble a horse. Once the symbol of a deep connection between a catatonic patient and his nurse.

Decreases extra fatigue from missed Blink Attacks by 50%.

Addon_Blinker_012.name: Catatonic Boy's Treasure
Addon_Blinker_012.description:
A pine-cone which unexpectedly calmed a patient's repetitive movement. Taken from the catatonic boy's body.

Decreases extra fatigue from chain Blinks by 65%.

Addon_Chainsaw_001.name: Dad's Boots
Addon_Chainsaw_001.description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Sr.

Increases the Chainsaw Sprint turn rate by 20%.

Addon_Chainsaw_002.name: Counterweight
Addon_Chainsaw_002.description:
Adds weight to the base, for stability.

Decreases the Chainsaw Sprints's initial turn rate by 70%.

Addon_Chainsaw_003.name: Greased Throttle
Addon_Chainsaw_003.description:
A lubricated trigger. One twitch of the finger brings the chainsaw back to life.

Decreases recovery time after using the Chainsaw by 5%.This effect does not apply while in Overdrive.

Addon_Chainsaw_004.name: Thermal Casing
Addon_Chainsaw_004.description:
A thicker case that allows the user to control the conservation of energy.

Decreases the speed at which the Overdrive meter dissipates when not using the Chainsaw by 20%.

Addon_Chainsaw_005.name: Steel Toe Boots
Addon_Chainsaw_005.description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.

Decreases recovery time after hitting an object with the Chainsaw by 10%.

Addon_Chainsaw_006.name: The Thompsons' Mix
Addon_Chainsaw_006.description:
A special oily substance concocted by the family for their machinery.

Decreases recovery time after using the Chainsaw by 10%.This effect does not apply while in Overdrive.

Addon_Chainsaw_007.name: Begrimed Chains
Addon_Chainsaw_007.description:
A foul yet oddly familiar chain, coated with something unpleasant.

Survivors hit with the Chainsaw suffer from the Mangled and Hemorrhage status effects for 70 seconds.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_Chainsaw_008.name: Ragged Engine
Addon_Chainsaw_008.description:
Some would say it needs a tune-up. Max would say it is tuned-up.

Decreases the speed at which the Overdrive meter dissipates when not using the Chainsaw by 30%.

Addon_Chainsaw_009.name: Lo Pro Chains
Addon_Chainsaw_009.description:
Light chains that decrease the weight of the Chainsaw, allowing for greater maneuverability.

Continue a Chainsaw Sprint after breaking a pallet or wall.Healthy Survivors hit with the Chainsaw within 5 seconds of breaking a pallet or a wall are damaged for a single health state.Injured Survivors suffer from the Deep Wound status effect.

Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

Addon_Chainsaw_010.name: Discarded Air Filter
Addon_Chainsaw_010.description:
A cracked and dusty filter. It still manages to work better than the stock model.

Increases the time it takes before the Overdrive meter starts dissipating by 20%.

Addon_Chainsaw_011.name: Cracked Primer Bulb
Addon_Chainsaw_011.description:
A button that clears air from the fuel lines. This machine needs to be fed.

Survivors hit with the Chainsaw are damaged for a single health state.Increases Overdrive generation by 15%.

Addon_Chainsaw_012.name: Off-Brand Motor Oil
Addon_Chainsaw_012.description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.

Increases Overdrive generation by 15%.

ADDON_Chainsaw_CarburatorGuide.name: Tuned Carburetor
ADDON_Chainsaw_CarburatorGuide.description:
Despite being caked in dirt and oil, this carburetor has been well adjusted.

Increases Chainsaw charge speed by 20%.Decreases base movement speed to 4.4 m/s.

ADDON_Chainsaw_DeathEngravings.name: Clogged Intake
ADDON_Chainsaw_DeathEngravings.description:
Modifying the airflow is key to modifying the saw’s power.

Increases Overdrive duration by 15%.

ADDON_Chainsaw_DoomEngravings.name: Iridescent Engravings
ADDON_Chainsaw_DoomEngravings.description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body representing the dark beast that lives in The Fog. Fills the user with determination.

Increases Chainsaw Sprint movement speed by 20%.Increases time required to charge the Chainsaw by 12%.

ADDON_Chainsaw_HomemadeMuffler.name: Apex Muffler
ADDON_Chainsaw_HomemadeMuffler.description:
A masterfully crafted chainsaw muffler that outperforms all others.

Chainsaw is silent for Survivors outside the Terror Radius.

ADDON_Chainsaw_LightChassis.name: Low Kickback Chains
ADDON_Chainsaw_LightChassis.description:
A specialized chain that reduces the likelihood of kickback.

Decreases recovery time after hitting an object with the Chainsaw by 15%.

ADDON_Chainsaw_ThompsonMix.name: High-Speed Idler Screw
ADDON_Chainsaw_ThompsonMix.description:
A loosened screw will bring more power to the chainsaw.

Increases the time it takes before the Overdrive meter starts dissipating by 30%.

ADDON_Chainsaw_ThompsonMoonshine.name: Spiked Boots
ADDON_Chainsaw_ThompsonMoonshine.description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow in mud for more stability and control with each step.

Increases the Chainsaw Sprint turn rate by 30%.

Addon_Demogorgon_BarbsGlasses.name: Barb's Glasses
Addon_Demogorgon_BarbsGlasses.description:
A broken pair of glasses that traveled to the Upside Down.

Decreases Shred pallet break cooldown by 10%.

Addon_Demogorgon_BlackHeart.name: Black Heart
Addon_Demogorgon_BlackHeart.description:
A black fermented heart ripped from the chest of a tentacled creature in the Upside Down.

Decreases Shred hit cooldown by 10%.

Addon_Demogorgon_BrassCaseLighter.name: Brass Case Lighter
Addon_Demogorgon_BrassCaseLighter.description:
A lighter used to ignite trouble.

Proximity to Portals inflicts Survivors with Blindness. Once out of contact with the Portal, this effect persists for 60 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_Demogorgon_DeerLung.name: Deer Lung
Addon_Demogorgon_DeerLung.description:
A raw, rubbery lung that reinvigorates The Demogorgon.

Increases Upside Down movement speed by 30%.Decreases the number of available Portals by 2.

Addon_Demogorgon_ElevensSoda.name: Eleven's Soda
Addon_Demogorgon_ElevensSoda.description:
A soda can charged with psychic energy.

Shows yellow auras for generators being repaired while traversing the Upside Down.

Addon_Demogorgon_LerproseLichen.name: Leprose Lichen
Addon_Demogorgon_LerproseLichen.description:
A potent lichen that grows like dust on the rocks in the Upside Down.

Reveals the auras of all Survivors while traversing the Upside Down.After emerging from a Portal, the auras of all Survivors within 16 meters of an active Portal are revealed for 3 seconds.

Addon_Demogorgon_LifeguardWhistle.name: Lifeguard Whistle
Addon_Demogorgon_LifeguardWhistle.description:
A rusty, metal whistle that once ruled the Hawkins public pool.

Increases the number of available Portals by 2.

Addon_Demogorgon_MewsGuts.name: Mew's Guts
Addon_Demogorgon_MewsGuts.description:
The tasty guts of an unfortunate victim.

Increases the total number of available Portals by 1.Decreases Shred miss cooldown by 11%.

Addon_Demogorgon_RatLiver.name: Rat Liver
Addon_Demogorgon_RatLiver.description: A soggy pile of salty, soft liver.Increases movement speed while charging Of The Abyss by 3.5%.

Addon_Demogorgon_RatTail.name: Rat Tail
Addon_Demogorgon_RatTail.description: A chewy rat tail for The Demogorgon to consume.Increases speed of opening a Portal by 50%.

Addon_Demogorgon_RedMoss.name: Red Moss
Addon_Demogorgon_RedMoss.description:
A psychedelic moss that grows on tree barks in the Upside Down.

Increases time required to emerge from a Portal by 15%.Increases the duration of the Undetectable effect gained when emerging from a Portal by 8 seconds.Emerging from Portals becomes silent.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_Demogorgon_RottenGreenTripe.name: Rotten Green Tripe
Addon_Demogorgon_RottenGreenTripe.description: Rotten tripe that fuels The Demogorgon.Increases Upside Down movement speed by 15%.

Addon_Demogorgon_RottenPumpkin.name: Rotten Pumpkin
Addon_Demogorgon_RottenPumpkin.description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.

When traversing the Upside Down, the Portal you enter is destroyed. Gain an additional 200 Bloodpoints for the traversal.

Addon_Demogorgon_StickyLining.name: Sticky Lining
Addon_Demogorgon_StickyLining.description:
A fetid, viscous layer that covers and expands the interdimensional tunnels.

Increases the distance from Portals at which Survivors can be detected by Of The Abyss by 2.5 meters.

Addon_Demogorgon_ThornyVines.name: Thorny Vines
Addon_Demogorgon_ThornyVines.description:
Thick, thorny vines that stretch and reinforce the interdimensional tunnels.

Increases time required for Survivors to seal Portals by 8%Increases the distance from Portals at which Survivors can be detected by Of The Abyss by 1 meter.

Addon_Demogorgon_UnknownEgg.name: Unknown Egg
Addon_Demogorgon_UnknownEgg.description:
A large, warm egg coated in gruesome webbing.

Decreases the cooldown after traversing the Upside Down by 2.5 seconds.

Addon_Demogorgon_UpsideDownResin.name: Upside Down Resin
Addon_Demogorgon_UpsideDownResin.description: A sticky, flammable sap that fortifies the gateway to the interdimensional tunnels.Increases time required for Survivors to seal Portals by 20%.

Addon_Demogorgon_VermillionWebcap.name: Vermillion Webcap
Addon_Demogorgon_VermillionWebcap.description:
A bright red poisonous mushroom from the Upside Down.

Increases the duration of the Undetectable effect gained when emerging from a Portal by 3 seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius and Red Stain.

Addon_Demogorgon_VioletWaxCap.name: Violet Waxcap
Addon_Demogorgon_VioletWaxCap.description:
A dark fleshed mushroom from the Upside Down that allows The Demogorgon to telepathically distort the senses in its prey.

Increases the duration of the Undetectable effect gained when emerging from a Portal by 1 second.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius and Red Stain.

Addon_Demogorgon_ViscousWebbing.name: Viscous Webbing
Addon_Demogorgon_ViscousWebbing.description: Wet, elastic webs that broaden the interdimensional tunnels.Increases time required for Survivors to seal Portals by 10%.

Addon_DreamInducer_BlackBox.name: Black Box
Addon_DreamInducer_BlackBox.description:
A black cardboard box filled with photographs.

When an Exit Gate is opened, it is blocked for Sleeping Survivors for 15 seconds.This lingers for 3 seconds after they are woken up by any means.

Addon_DreamInducer_BlueDress.name: Blue Dress
Addon_DreamInducer_BlueDress.description:
A little girl's pale blue dress with white lace which front is ruined by large cuts.

Dream Snare no longer moves.Dream Snare remains active for 8 seconds.Only 1 Dream Snare can be placed at a time.

Addon_DreamInducer_CatBlock.name: Cat Block
Addon_DreamInducer_CatBlock.description:
A white and purple wooden block depicting a sleeping cat and the letter "C".

Decreases Dream Projection's cooldown by 10%.

Addon_DreamInducer_ClassPhoto.name: Class Photo
Addon_DreamInducer_ClassPhoto.description:
A large photograph taken at Badham preschool showing the cheerful class of 94-95.

Survivors in the Dream World are revealed with Killer Instinct while opening Exit Gates.Grants the ability to teleport to Exit Gates.

Addon_DreamInducer_GardenRake.name: Garden Rake
Addon_DreamInducer_GardenRake.description:
A small claw rake, a must-have tool for any accomplished gardener.

Increases the size of the Dream Snare by 10%.

Addon_DreamInducer_GreenDress.name: Green Dress
Addon_DreamInducer_GreenDress.description:
A little girl's green dress with a silky white ribbon.

Increases the time it takes for Survivors to perform the Wake Up action by 2 seconds.

Addon_DreamInducer_JumpRope.name: Jump Rope
Addon_DreamInducer_JumpRope.description:
A long double dutch jump rope, stained with many years of use.

Increases duration of Hindered when a Survivor is hit with a Dream Snare by 11%.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Addon_DreamInducer_KidsDrawing.name: Kid's Drawing
Addon_DreamInducer_KidsDrawing.description: An unattributed drawing clearly crafted by a young child.Increases the amount of Sleep gained from attacking with Dream Abilities by 10%.

Addon_DreamInducer_NancysMasterpiece.name: Nancy's Masterpiece
Addon_DreamInducer_NancysMasterpiece.description:
A painting of a character, made by Nancy Holbrook at Badham and kept as a treasured memory.

Decreases Dream Projection's total cooldown by 10% after hitting a Survivor with a Dream Snare or Dream Pallet.

Addon_DreamInducer_NancysSketch.name: Nancy's Sketch
Addon_DreamInducer_NancysSketch.description:
A crude and bold sketch made with fusain, signed Nancy H.

Decreases Sleep immunity after a Survivor uses an alarm clock by 20%.

Addon_DreamInducer_PaintThinner.name: Paint Thinner
Addon_DreamInducer_PaintThinner.description:
A tin of a highly volatile and inflammable material.

When a Survivor drops a Dream Pallet, they are revealed with Killer Instinct for 6 seconds.Unlocks the ability to use Dream Projection on that Survivor while they are revealed.Increases this Dream Projection's charge speed by 100%.

Addon_DreamInducer_PillBottle.name: Pill Bottle
Addon_DreamInducer_PillBottle.description:
An empty pill bottle which once contained a medicine called Zoneral.

Each time a Survivor wakes up, their Sleep Meter fills 10% faster, up to a maximum of 50%.

Addon_DreamInducer_PrototypeClaws.name: Prototype Claws
Addon_DreamInducer_PrototypeClaws.description:
A homemade tool to facilitate bush trimming.

Decreases the charge time to release a Dream Snare by 10%.

Addon_DreamInducer_RedPaintBrush.name: Red Paint Brush
Addon_DreamInducer_RedPaintBrush.description:
A large paint brush, wet with crimson paint.

Reveals the aura of Survivors in the Dream World when they are further than 32 meters away.Increases each Survivor's Sleep Meter by 50%.

Addon_DreamInducer_Rope.name: Outdoor Rope
Addon_DreamInducer_Rope.description:
Sturdy outdoor rope, handy to tie up anything.

While Survivors are in the Dream World:

Increases the speed at which the Dream Snare travels by 15%.

Addon_DreamInducer_SheepBlock.name: Sheep Block
Addon_DreamInducer_SheepBlock.description: A white and blue wooden block depicting two wooly lamb grazing and the letter "S".Increases the Alarm Clocks' cooldown by 10%.

Addon_DreamInducer_SwingChains.name: Swing Chains
Addon_DreamInducer_SwingChains.description:
Rusty but sturdy chains used to securely attach a swing seat.

After using Dream Projection, block all window vaults within 16 meters for 6 seconds.

Addon_DreamInducer_UnicornBlock.name: Unicorn Block
Addon_DreamInducer_UnicornBlock.description:
A white and red wooden block depicting a prancing unicorn and the letter "U".

Increases the Dream Pallets' rupture radius by 14%.

Addon_DreamInducer_WoolShirt.name: Wool Shirt
Addon_DreamInducer_WoolShirt.description:
A small boy's orange and yellow striped shirt. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Jesse".

Decreases the delay before Dream Pallets rupture by 10%.

Addon_DreamInducer_ZBlock.name: "Z" Block
Addon_DreamInducer_ZBlock.description:
A deeply scratched and burnt wooden block which only recognizable feature is the letter "Z".

Survivors hit with a Dream Snare or Dream Pallet are revealed for 3 seconds.

Addon_Flashlight_001.name: Battery
Addon_Flashlight_001.description:
A standard battery of unknown brand.

Adds 2 seconds of use to the Flashlight.

Addon_Flashlight_002.name: Heavy Duty Battery
Addon_Flashlight_002.description:
A battery marked as "industrial strength."

Adds 4 seconds of use to the Flashlight.

Addon_Flashlight_003.name: Focus Lens
Addon_Flashlight_003.description:
A thick glass lens that focuses the Flashlight beam to increase its intensity.

Increases the range of the Flashlight beam by 25%.Decreases the width of the Flashlight beam by 15%.Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 20%.Increases Blindness duration by 10%.

Addon_Flashlight_004.name: Wide Lens
Addon_Flashlight_004.description:
A thin wide lens in perfect condition. Designed to spread the Flashlight beam at the cost of reducing its range of effectiveness.

Decreases the range of the Flashlight beam by 25%.Increases the width of the Flashlight beam by 25%.

Addon_Flashlight_005.name: Power Bulb
Addon_Flashlight_005.description:
A tiny Flashlight bulb that packs more wattage for a brighter, more powerful light beam.

Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 20%.Increases Blindness duration by 10%.

Addon_Flashlight_006.name: TIR Optic
Addon_Flashlight_006.description:
A lens and reflector combo which can magnify a Flashlight's beam.

Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 30%.Increases Blindness duration by 15%.

Addon_Flashlight_007.name: Low Amp Filament
Addon_Flashlight_007.description:
A filament bulb designed to extend a Flashlight battery's life.

Decreases Flashlight battery consumption by 24%.

Addon_Flashlight_008.name: Leather Grip
Addon_Flashlight_008.description:
A leather strip wrapped around the Flashlight for more grip.

Increases the accuracy of the Flashlight beam by 20%.

Addon_Flashlight_BrokenBulb.name: Broken Bulb
Addon_Flashlight_BrokenBulb.description:
A damaged bulb that causes a spooky flickering effect.

Causes the Flashlight to flicker.Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 15%.Increases Blindness duration by 30%.Increases the spookiness just a little.

ADDON_flashlight_highendsapphire.name: High-end Sapphire lens
ADDON_flashlight_highendsapphire.description:
A wide lens made of unscratchable sapphire that optimises the power and range of the light beam.

Increases the range of the Flashlight beam by 25%.Increases the width of the Flashlight beam by 25%.Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 30%.Increases Blindness duration by 15%.

ADDON_flashlight_intensehalogen.name: Intense Halogen
ADDON_flashlight_intensehalogen.description:
A chemical bulb that generates an intensely clear light.

Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 40%.Increases Blindness duration by 20%.

ADDON_flashlight_lonflifebattery.name: Long Life Battery
ADDON_flashlight_lonflifebattery.description:
A recent model of battery that lasts longer.

Adds 6 seconds of use to the Flashlight.

ADDON_flashlight_oddbulb.name: Odd Bulb
ADDON_flashlight_oddbulb.description:
A heavy and completely opaque bulb of unknown origin which emits a faint light even when turned off.

Increases the brightness of the Flashlight beam by 50%.Increases Blindness duration by 25%.Increases Flashlight battery consumption by 12%.

ADDON_flashlight_rubbergrip.name: Rubber Grip
ADDON_flashlight_rubbergrip.description:
A rubber grip specifically fitting Flashlights for more grip.

Increases the accuracy of the Flashlight beam by 40%.

ADDON_Frenzy_ColdDirt.name: BFFs
ADDON_Frenzy_ColdDirt.description:
An unnaturally cold silver necklace split into four, one for each best friend.

Earn tokens for hitting Survivors during Feral Frenzy:Second chained hit: 2 tokensThird chained hit: 3 tokensFourth chained hit: 4 tokensFifth chained hit: 5 tokens

Once the gates are powered, if 15 or more tokens have been collected, gain 6% Haste when not using Feral Frenzy.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

ADDON_Frenzy_DefacedSmileyPin.name: Defaced Smiley Pin
ADDON_Frenzy_DefacedSmileyPin.description:
A once friendly-looking bright yellow button of a defaced smiley. A signature icon of The Legion.

Survivors who self-mend a Deep Wound from Feral Frenzy are inflicted with Mangled for 60 seconds.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

ADDON_Frenzy_EtchedRuler.name: Etched Ruler
ADDON_Frenzy_EtchedRuler.description:
A wooden ruler deeply etched with the names of enemies.

Survivors hit by a Feral Slash are inflicted with Oblivious for 60 seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

ADDON_Frenzy_FilthyBlade.name: Filthy Blade
ADDON_Frenzy_FilthyBlade.description:
This blade is stained with foul spots of blood and grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.

Increases time required for Survivors to mend by 4 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_FranksMixTape.name: Frank's Mix Tape
ADDON_Frenzy_FranksMixTape.description:
Never go on a kill mission without your tunes. A track list of massive distortion and loud percussion that stabs at your eardrums.

While using Feral Frenzy:Damaging generators is 20% faster.Breaking walls is 30% faster.The Power gauge pauses while damaging a generator or breaking a wall.

ADDON_Frenzy_FriendshipBracelet.name: Friendship Bracelet
ADDON_Frenzy_FriendshipBracelet.description:
A wide gray and red braided rope bracelet. The inscription "F J S J" can be seen, crudely written in bold black ink.

Increases duration of lunges during Feral Frenzy by 0.3 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_FumingMixTape.name: Fuming Mix Tape
ADDON_Frenzy_FumingMixTape.description:
Dark beats, violent shreds and unfathomable sounds from another world fill the mind with a vibrating sixth sense.

While using Feral Frenzy:The repair progress of generators can be determined by the intensity of their auras.Generators not being worked on regress.

ADDON_Frenzy_IridescentButton.name: Iridescent Button
ADDON_Frenzy_IridescentButton.description:
A glass-like button molded from The Fog that captures The Legion’s likeness. The surface is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.

During Feral Frenzy, any pallets you vault are immediately broken.

ADDON_Frenzy_JoeysMixTape.name: Joey's Mix Tape
ADDON_Frenzy_JoeysMixTape.description:
A mix of bangin' tracks and slammin' beats for when life's a bitch.

Survivors who self-mend a Deep Wound from Feral Frenzy are inflicted with Hemorrhage until fully healed.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

ADDON_Frenzy_JuliesMixTape.name: Julie's Mix Tape
ADDON_Frenzy_JuliesMixTape.description: A dark mix tape made out from mainly power ballads and gloomy rock.If The Legion is stunned while in Feral Frenzy, the power gauge refills once the duration of the stun ends.

ADDON_Frenzy_MischiefList.name: Mischief List
ADDON_Frenzy_MischiefList.description:
A list of mischievous missions to accomplish; memento of brighter days.

Increases the duration of Feral Frenzy by 1 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_MuralSketch.name: Mural Sketch
ADDON_Frenzy_MuralSketch.description:
A rough sketch of The Legion mural torn from a notebook.

Increases speed bonus per hit during Feral Frenzy to 0.32 m/s.

ADDON_Frenzy_NastyBlade.name: Stylish Sunglasses
ADDON_Frenzy_NastyBlade.description:
Oval-shaped sunglasses that exude poise and cool. Their color tinted lenses add an understated appeal.

Shows the auras of Survivors who are mending within a 24-meter radius.

ADDON_Frenzy_NeverSleepPills.name: Never-Sleep Pills
ADDON_Frenzy_NeverSleepPills.description:
Highly caffeinated tablets to make you extra sharp for exams or other draining activities.

The Legion's base move speed during Feral Frenzy is 4.6 m/s.Increases the duration of Feral Frenzy by 10 seconds.Gain 100 to 500 bonus Bloodpoints for each successive hit on a Survivor during Feral Frenzy.

ADDON_Frenzy_ScratchedRuler.name: Scratched Ruler
ADDON_Frenzy_ScratchedRuler.description:
A wooden ruler deeply scratched with hash marks.

Decreases Feral Frenzy recharge time by 5 seconds.

ADDON_Frenzy_SmileyFacePin.name: Smiley Face Pin
ADDON_Frenzy_SmileyFacePin.description:
A friendly-looking bright yellow button used as a sarcastic statement.

Survivors who self-mend a Deep Wound from Feral Frenzy are inflicted with Blindness for 60 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

ADDON_Frenzy_StabWoundsStudy.name: Stab Wounds Study
ADDON_Frenzy_StabWoundsStudy.description:
A printed medical article stolen from Ormond's public library vulgarizing a study on lesions and stab wounds.

The auras of Survivors who self-mend a Deep Wound from Feral Frenzy are shown for 4 seconds afterward.

Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

ADDON_Frenzy_StolenSketchBook.name: Stolen Sketch Book
ADDON_Frenzy_StolenSketchBook.description:
A sketch book with imaginative and evocative, if not slightly bizarre, sketches.

During Feral Frenzy, from the second chained hit onward, hit survivors drop their item.

ADDON_Frenzy_SusiesMixTape.name: Susie's Mix Tape
ADDON_Frenzy_SusiesMixTape.description: A thrilling mix tape with energizing songs and intricate guitar riffs.Increases Killer Instinct detection range by 20 meters.

ADDON_Frenzy_TheLegionPin.name: The Legion Pin
ADDON_Frenzy_TheLegionPin.description:
A handmade button with the face of The Legion. To use exclusively on intimidation dares.

Survivors who self-mend a Deep Wound from Feral Frenzy are inflicted with Broken for 60 seconds.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

Addon_GasBomb_01.name: Robin Feather
Addon_GasBomb_01.description:
A warm orange feather, soft to the touch.

Decreases bottle throw cooldown by 40%.

Addon_GasBomb_02.name: Party Bottle
Addon_GasBomb_02.description:
Be the life of the party!

Party Bottles emit confetti when they break, in addition to their usual gas effect.Hitting a Survivor directly with a Party Bottle interrupts actions as usual, and awards 100 Devious Bloodpoints.

Addon_GasBomb_03.name: Smelly Inner Soles
Addon_GasBomb_03.description:
A moldy inner sole which gives much comfort to tired feet.

Increases movement speed while reloading bottles by 66%.

Addon_GasBomb_04.name: Fingerless Parade Gloves
Addon_GasBomb_04.description:
Part of the standard Clown apparel; the cut fingers allow for dexterous manipulations.

Increases bottle throw speed by 25%.Decreases bottle throw angle by 15 degrees.

Addon_GasBomb_05.name: Thick Cork Stopper
Addon_GasBomb_05.description:
A sturdy cork, fitting The Afterpiece Tonic bottles perfectly.

Decreases reload time by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_GasBomb_06.name: Solvent Jug
Addon_GasBomb_06.description:
A volatile chemical compound that irritates the respiratory tract, but increases absorption of The Afterpiece Antidote.

Increases duration of Invigoration by 1 seconds.

Addon_GasBomb_07.name: Kerosene Can
Addon_GasBomb_07.description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.

Intoxication inflicts Blindness for 30 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_GasBomb_08.name: Sticky Soda Bottle
Addon_GasBomb_08.description:
It's sugary sweet, with only a little blood on the label.

Increases Invigoration by 2%.

Addon_GasBomb_09.name: Starling Feather
Addon_GasBomb_09.description:
A black feather with an emerald sheen, very soft to the touch.

Decreases bottle throw cooldown by 50%.

Addon_GasBomb_10.name: VHS Porn
Addon_GasBomb_10.description:
An all time classic. You won't see things quite the same again.

Makes Afterpiece Tonic clouds yellow.Makes Afterpiece Antidote clouds purple.

Addon_GasBomb_11.name: Spirit of Hartshorn
Addon_GasBomb_11.description:
A pungent chemical compound consisting of ammonia. One whiff is enough to jolt even the most sluggish of minds.

Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Antidote gas clouds by 20%.

Addon_GasBomb_12.name: Sulfuric Acid Vial
Addon_GasBomb_12.description:
An odorless syrupy liquid which is highly corrosive.

Intoxication inflicts Mangled on injured Survivors for 70 seconds.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_GasBomb_13.name: Flask of Bleach
Addon_GasBomb_13.description:
A potent chemical which causes irritation, burn and lungs damage.

Increases the Hindered penalty from Intoxication by an additional 4%.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Addon_GasBomb_14.name: Bottle of Chloroform
Addon_GasBomb_14.description:
A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anesthetic capabilities.

Increases the size and spread of Afterpiece Tonic gas clouds by 20%.

Addon_GasBomb_15.name: Garish Makeup Kit
Addon_GasBomb_15.description:
Some for the face and some for the Antidote. The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effects.

Increases the duration of Invigoration by 2 seconds.

Addon_GasBomb_16.name: Cheap Gin Bottle
Addon_GasBomb_16.description:
When the night was rough and the day is rougher, a little hair of the dog will give you a boost.

Increases Invigoration by 3%.

Addon_GasBomb_17.name: Ether 15 vol%
Addon_GasBomb_17.description:
A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration.

Increases the duration of Intoxication by 1 second.

Addon_GasBomb_18.name: Cigar Box
Addon_GasBomb_18.description:
A grim and incomplete collection of fingers. Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities.

While The Clown or a Survivor is Invigorated, they see all other Survivor and Killer auras within 16 meters.

Addon_GasBomb_19.name: Tattoo's Middle Finger
Addon_GasBomb_19.description:
The prized middle finger of a large tattooed man. Has a faint taste of machinery oil.

Auras of Intoxicated or Invigorated Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

Addon_GasBomb_20.name: Redhead's Pinky Finger
Addon_GasBomb_20.description:
The prized pinky of a redhead. Faintly fragrant. Tastes of potpourri and varnish.

Direct hits by a bottle of Afterpiece Tonic inflict Exposed until Intoxication ends.Sets maximum number of carried bottles to 1.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

Addon_Ghost_CheapCologne.name: Cheap Cologne
Addon_Ghost_CheapCologne.description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol. Worn by Ghost Face to make his presence known. Reserved for impromptu visits.

Increases Marked duration by 10 seconds.

Addon_Ghost_ChewedPen.name: Chewed Pen
Addon_Ghost_ChewedPen.description:
Blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny’s DNA. Incriminating evidence that was never found.

Survivors that are in the dying state take 3 seconds to reveal The Ghost Face.

Addon_Ghost_DriversLicense.name: Driver's License
Addon_Ghost_DriversLicense.description:
A driver’s license revealing Olsen’s true identity: Danny Johnson.

When Marking a Survivor repairing a generator, the generator explodes and loses 20% progress.The affected generator becomes blocked for 15 seconds.When Marking multiple Survivors at the same time, the loss of progress only applies once.

Addon_Ghost_DropLegKnifeSheath.name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath
Addon_Ghost_DropLegKnifeSheath.description:
Sheath allowing a full motion range: ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely. Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.

The Ghost Face gains 10% movement speed for 5 seconds after Marking a Survivor.

Addon_Ghost_HeadlinesCutouts.name: Headline Cutouts
Addon_Ghost_HeadlinesCutouts.description:
Cutouts of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania. While Ghost Face only authored some of the headlines, he committed all the murders.

Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.

Increases movement speed while stalking by 40%.

Addon_Ghost_KnifeBeltClip.name: Knife Belt Clip
Addon_Ghost_KnifeBeltClip.description:
Perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly. No one knows what you’re planning to do tonight.

Reduces the Terror Radius by 12 meters while crouching.

Addon_Ghost_LastingPerfume.name: Lasting Perfume
Addon_Ghost_LastingPerfume.description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by Ghost Face to announce his presence. Reserved for victims he planned to write about.

Survivors that are on a hook take 3 seconds to reveal The Ghost Face.

Addon_Ghost_LeatherKnifeSheath.name: Leather Knife Sheath
Addon_Ghost_LeatherKnifeSheath.description:
Quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade. Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.

Increases crouched movement speed by 10%.

Addon_Ghost_MarkedMap.name: Marked Map
Addon_Ghost_MarkedMap.description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida. Each X represents a victim of The Ghost Face. Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.

Increases duration of Killer Instinct after being revealed by 2 seconds.

Addon_Ghost_NightVisionMonocular.name: Night Vision Monocular
Addon_Ghost_NightVisionMonocular.description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness. Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.

A Survivor that reveals The Ghost Face is inflicted with Exhausted for 10 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Addon_Ghost_OlsensAddressBook.name: Olsen's Address Book
Addon_Ghost_OlsensAddressBook.description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing. All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.

Survivors that are Marked reveal their auras for 5 seconds when performing rushed actions.

Addon_Ghost_OlsensJournal.name: Olsen’s Journal
Addon_Ghost_OlsensJournal.description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries. The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims.

A Survivor that is Marked is inflicted with Oblivious until the Mark expires.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_Ghost_OlsensWallet.name: Olsen’s Wallet
Addon_Ghost_OlsensWallet.description:
Olsen’s wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen’s first Roseville victim. Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.

Breaking a pallet or wall immediately recharges Night Shroud.

Addon_Ghost_OutdoorSecurityCamera.name: Outdoor Security Camera
Addon_Ghost_OutdoorSecurityCamera.description:
A small surveillance camera that filmed Ghost Face breaking into a house on Belleview Road in Northern Roseville. The camera was positioned at the perfect angle to catch a glimpse of Ghost Face without providing any real clues to the police.

The auras of all Survivors are revealed for 7 seconds when a Marked Survivor is put into the dying state.

Addon_Ghost_Philly.name: “Philly”
Addon_Ghost_Philly.description:
Stolen camera from a victim of Olsen’s in Philadelphia, where he worked before. The film inside captured his last night in the city.

Decreases time required to Mark a Survivor by 10%.

Addon_Ghost_ReusableCinchStraps.name: Cinch Straps
Addon_Ghost_ReusableCinchStraps.description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.

Night Shroud remains active after a failed basic attack.

Addon_Ghost_TelephotoLens.name: Telephoto Lens
Addon_Ghost_TelephotoLens.description:
A manual focus lens to take pictures from afar without being noticed.

A Survivor that reveals The Ghost Face is inflicted with Oblivious for 60 seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_Ghost_TheGhostFaceCaughtOnTape.name: “Ghost Face Caught on Tape”
Addon_Ghost_TheGhostFaceCaughtOnTape.description:
Tape obtained by Olsen to write an article that terrorized Roseville.

Instantly recharges Night Shroud after a successful basic attack that puts a Survivor into the dying state.

Addon_Ghost_VictimsDetailedRoutine.name: Victim’s Detailed Routine
Addon_Ghost_VictimsDetailedRoutine.description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen's first victim in Roseville. Compiling your victim's habits allows you to anticipate and counter their next move.

After being Marked, Survivors are inflicted with Exhausted for 5 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Addon_Ghost_WalleyesMatchbook.name: Walleye's Matchbook
Addon_Ghost_WalleyesMatchbook.description:
A sheet of matches from Walleye's, a small bar in Northern Roseville. A victim’s phone number is scribbled in blue. One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.

Decreases Night Shroud recovery time by 3 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_BarbedWire.name: Barbed Wire
Addon_Harpoon_BarbedWire.description:
Pliable American made steel lined with sharp barbs. Despite its simplicity, Caleb found it could be wrapped around a spear to increase its viciousness.

Increases Survivor mend time by 3.5 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_BayshoresCigar.name: Bayshore’s Cigar
Addon_Harpoon_BayshoresCigar.description:
A quality cigar, plucked from the jacket of Caleb’s boss while he wailed over the spear lodged in his abdomen.

Decreases the stun duration when Survivors break free by 0.75 second.

Addon_Harpoon_BayshoresGoldTooth.name: Bayshore’s Gold Tooth
Addon_Harpoon_BayshoresGoldTooth.description:
A golden tooth torn from Henry Bayshore as he screamed for mercy, hours before he was finished off.

Increases The Redeemer's reeling speed by 5%.

Addon_Harpoon_ChewingTobacco.name: Chewing Tobacco
Addon_Harpoon_ChewingTobacco.description:
A can of clipped and sweetened tobacco leaves lifted from a gutted body in Glenvale. Stimulates the nervous system.

Decreases the stun duration when Survivors break free by 0.25 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_ClearCreekWhiskey.name: Gold Creek Whiskey
Addon_Harpoon_ClearCreekWhiskey.description:
Warm comfort in a bottle that quelled Caleb’s anger and slowed his step.

Decreases Terror Radius by 8 meters while aiming down The Redeemer's sights.

Addon_Harpoon_HellshireIron.name: Hellshire Iron
Addon_Harpoon_HellshireIron.description:
The Hellshire Gang’s branding iron. Despite folklore, it never made its mark on new initiates, instead having been used to brand particularly quarrelsome bounties.

When a Survivor is speared, gain Undetectable. The effect persists for 10 seconds after the Survivor is no longer speared.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius and Red Stain.

Addon_Harpoon_HoneyLocustThorns.name: Honey Locust Thorns
Addon_Harpoon_HoneyLocustThorns.description:
Angered with a bounty who fled twice before, Caleb twisted thorn branches onto a spear and let it loose.

Breaking free from the spear inflicts Mangled for 70 seconds.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_Harpoon_IridescentCoin.name: Iridescent Coin
Addon_Harpoon_IridescentCoin.description:
A glass-like coin molded from The Fog itself. Payment to the bounty hunter for services rendered.

Survivors speared from at least 12 meters away are inflicted with Exposed for as long as they remain speared.

Exposed survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

Addon_Harpoon_JawSmasher.name: Jaw Smasher
Addon_Harpoon_JawSmasher.description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb’s jaw during a frenzied shootout. It brings back a burning desire for revenge.

Increases movement speed by 1.5% while aiming down The Redeemer's sights.

Addon_Harpoon_MarshalsBadge.name: Marshal's Badge
Addon_Harpoon_MarshalsBadge.description:
A silver badge taken from the corpse of a lawman in Arizona Territory who interfered with the Hellshire Gang’s bounties.

Decreases Terror Radius by 4 meters while aiming down The Redeemer's sights.

Addon_Harpoon_ModifiedAmmoBelt.name: Modified Ammo Belt
Addon_Harpoon_ModifiedAmmoBelt.description:
An old ammo belt Caleb altered for his specialized weaponry. Still holds the fine red dirt of the Arizona Territory desert.

Decreases The Redeemer's reload time by 0.25 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_PoisonOakLeaves.name: Poison Oak Leaves
Addon_Harpoon_PoisonOakLeaves.description:
An ordinary looking plant, Caleb found that spears coated in its oil caused unbearable blistering around wounds.

Increases Survivor mend time by 1.5 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_PrisonChain.name: Prison Chain
Addon_Harpoon_PrisonChain.description:
A thick, heavy chain that once held a steel ball and latched to Caleb’s ankle. It’s been repurposed to hook onto a spear.

Increases time required for a Survivor to break free from a spear by 10%.

Addon_Harpoon_RicketyChain.name: Rickety Chain
Addon_Harpoon_RicketyChain.description:
Weak steel links first used on Caleb's prototype Speargun. Despite the chain's failings, it holds sentimental value.

Grants 50% bonus Bloodpoints for Speared score events.Survivors break free 33% faster.

Addon_Harpoon_RustedSpike.name: Rusted Spike
Addon_Harpoon_RustedSpike.description:
A railroad spike that Caleb fastened to the front of the Speargun during a moment of morbid curiosity. The dull tip prevents it from cleanly piercing its target.

Hitting a Survivor with The Redeemer while they are being reeled in inflicts Mangled for 60 seconds.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_Harpoon_SnakeOil.name: Snake Oil
Addon_Harpoon_SnakeOil.description:
A tincture of oils and extracts purchased from a travelling salesman. Purported to cure all that ails you.

Increases The Redeemer's reeling speed by 2.5%.

Addon_Harpoon_SpitPolishRag.name: Spit Polish Rag
Addon_Harpoon_SpitPolishRag.description:
A grimy piece of burlap. Spit and elbow grease was enough to wipe down the speargun in the heat of a shootout.

Decreases The Redeemer's miss cooldown by 0.25 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_TinOilCan.name: Tin Oil Can
Addon_Harpoon_TinOilCan.description:
A can holding a small amount of oil to reduce friction in machinery. Early models of the Speargun were notorious for jamming, and oil had to be readily available.

Decreases The Redeemer's miss cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_Harpoon_WantedPoster.name: Wanted Poster
Addon_Harpoon_WantedPoster.description:
The yellowed remains of a wanted poster for Mason Kelly. Kept Caleb focused on the hunt.

Increases movement speed by 3% while aiming down The Redeemer's sights.

Addon_Harpoon_WardensKeys.name: Warden’s Keys
Addon_Harpoon_WardensKeys.description:
The dull jangle of the keys evokes a furious memory within Caleb.

Decreases The Redeemer's reload time by 0.35 seconds.

Addon_Hatchet_AmanitaToxin.name: Amanita Toxin
Addon_Hatchet_AmanitaToxin.description:
A toxin applied to the Hatchets' blade. The Amanita mushrooms' toxin numbs the mind.

Hatchets inflict Blindness for 60 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_Hatchet_BandagedHaft.name: Bandaged Haft
Addon_Hatchet_BandagedHaft.description:
First-aid bandages securely rolled and attached to the Hatchets' haft.

Decreases Hatchet throw cooldown by 10%.

Addon_Hatchet_BegrimedHead.name: Begrimed Head
Addon_Hatchet_BegrimedHead.description:
These Hatchets' heads are stained with a foul substance that afflict anyone it touches with debilities.

Hit target suffers from the Mangled and Hemorrhage status effects for 80 seconds.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until healed.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_Hatchet_BerusToxin.name: Yellowed Cloth
Addon_Hatchet_BerusToxin.description:
A simple scrap of material to tend to blisters and wipe the puss away.

Increases thrown hatchet speed by 10%.

Addon_Hatchet_CoarseStone.name: Coarse Stone
Addon_Hatchet_CoarseStone.description:
This stone is too coarse to do any good. A blade damaged by it inflicts awful open wounds.

Hitting a target increases the volume of their grunts of pain by 50% until healed.

Addon_Hatchet_DeerskinGloves.name: Deerskin Gloves
Addon_Hatchet_DeerskinGloves.description:
Cured leather gloves that protect the hands and give a sure grip.

Decreases time required to reload Hatchets at a locker by 20%.

Addon_Hatchet_FineStone.name: Weighted Head
Addon_Hatchet_FineStone.description:
An oddly weighted hatchet head, crafted to deliver a hard blow to its target. It requires a wielder with a strong arm.

Hatchets inflict Incapacitated for 10 seconds.

Incapacitated prevents Survivors from healing, repairing, sabotaging, cleansing, blessing, mending, or using items.

Addon_Hatchet_FlowerBabushka.name: Flower Babushka
Addon_Hatchet_FlowerBabushka.description:
A clean and colorful kerchief adorned with a flower pattern. This memory of a lost little one fills the Huntress with rage and focus.

Decreases time required to wind up a Hatchet throw by 10%.

Addon_Hatchet_GlowingConcoction.name: Glowing Concoction
Addon_Hatchet_GlowingConcoction.description:
An otherworldly concoction that faintly glows a foreboding light.

Reveals the auras of Survivors hit by Hatchets for 5 seconds.

Addon_Hatchet_InfantryBelt.name: Infantry Belt
Addon_Hatchet_InfantryBelt.description:
A sturdy utility belt pillaged from a soldier. He was quick in combat, but she was quicker.

Hatchet hits grant 3% Haste for 5 seconds.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

Addon_Hatchet_IridescentHead.name: Iridescent Head
Addon_Hatchet_IridescentHead.description:
A glass-like Hatchet head molded from The Fog Itself. The blade is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.

Successful Hatchet hits immediately put healthy Survivors into the dying state.Sets maximum number of carried Hatchets to 1.

Addon_Hatchet_LeatherLoop.name: Leather Loop
Addon_Hatchet_LeatherLoop.description:
The right tool in the right hands is key to a successful hunt.

Hatchet hits grant 2% Haste for 5 seconds.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

Addon_Hatchet_MannaGrassBraid.name: Manna Grass Braid
Addon_Hatchet_MannaGrassBraid.description:
A circular decorative braid made from manna grass. This memory of a lost little one fills the Huntress with rage and focus.

Decreases time required to wind up a Hatchet throw by 5%.

Addon_Hatchet_OakHaft.name: Oak Haft
Addon_Hatchet_OakHaft.description:
A polished haft which allows for a quick and sly manipulation of the deadly tool.

Decreases Hatchet throw cooldown by 20%.

Addon_Hatchet_PungentFiale.name: Soldier's Puttee
Addon_Hatchet_PungentFiale.description:
A wrap taken from a dead soldier, it provides protection and support to the ankle and lower leg.

The Huntress moves 4.6 m/s when she has no Hatchets.

Addon_Hatchet_RustyHead.name: Rusty Head
Addon_Hatchet_RustyHead.description:
These Hatchets' heads are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that makes injuries particularly difficult to heal.

Hatchets inflict Mangled for 70 seconds.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_Hatchet_ShinyPin.name: Shiny Pin
Addon_Hatchet_ShinyPin.description:
A copper pin defaced beyond recognition yet polished to a high sheen. Pillaged from a particularly difficult prey.

Increases The Huntress' movement speed by 5% while aiming or throwing a Hatchet.

Addon_Hatchet_VenomousConcoction.name: Venomous Concoction
Addon_Hatchet_VenomousConcoction.description:
A toxic concoction applied to the Hatchets' blade. The murky concoction is mainly composed of Berus snake venom which gives it fatiguing capabilities.

Hatchets inflict Exhausted for 5 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Addon_Hatchet_YewSeedBrew.name: Wooden Fox
Addon_Hatchet_YewSeedBrew.description:
Roughly carved, this fox statuette is no more than a few inches. A reminder that stealth and cunning is as effective as raw power.

Grants Undetectable for 30 seconds after reloading.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_Hatchet_YewSeedConcoction.name: Rose Root
Addon_Hatchet_YewSeedConcoction.description:
Dried petals that relieve symptoms of fatigue and overexertion when brewed in a tea.

Increases thrown Hatchet speed by 20%.

Addon_HillbillyChainsaw_IridescentBrick.name: Filthy Slippers
Addon_HillbillyChainsaw_IridescentBrick.description:
Max sometimes struggled to hear his mother’s footfalls.

After maintaining a Chainsaw Sprint for 2 seconds, grants Undetectable until the Chainsaw Sprint ends.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K22Power_1.name: Cat Figurine
Addon_K22Power_1.description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye. He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.

Displays the target location of a Pounce.

Addon_K22Power_10.name: Rusted Needle
Addon_K22Power_10.description:
A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children’s tattered clothes.

Crushing Victor when attached inflicts Hemorrhage until healed.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K22Power_11.name: Sewer Sludge
Addon_K22Power_11.description:
A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.

Increases time to crush Victor when attached by 2 seconds.

Addon_K22Power_12.name: Madeleine’s Scarf
Addon_K22Power_12.description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death. The Twins kept it as a memento.

Increases Victor's movement speed by 0.3 m/s.

Addon_K22Power_13.name: Stale Biscuit
Addon_K22Power_13.description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town’s market. It wasn’t much, but it was better than most meals.

Decreases Pounce cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

Addon_K22Power_14.name: Weighty Rattle
Addon_K22Power_14.description:
A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him. It’s entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.

Crushing Victor when attached inflicts Broken for 20 seconds.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

Addon_K22Power_15.name: Forest Stew
Addon_K22Power_15.description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.

Increases Victor's movement speed by 0.6 m/s.

Addon_K22Power_16.name: Spinning Top
Addon_K22Power_16.description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own. He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.

Victor's Pounce causes Survivors to drop their carried Survivor items.

Addon_K22Power_17.name: Drop of Perfume
Addon_K22Power_17.description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with. It has a pleasant, disarming scent.

Survivors in Victor's alert range while he is dormant are inflicted with Oblivious.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K22Power_18.name: Victor’s Soldier
Addon_K22Power_18.description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared. Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.

Crushing Victor while he is dormant reveals the Survivor's aura for 6 seconds.

Addon_K22Power_19.name: Silencing Cloth
Addon_K22Power_19.description:
A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth. Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.

Charlotte gains Undetectable for 20 seconds after waking from her dormant state.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K22Power_2.name: Tiny Fingernail
Addon_K22Power_2.description:
Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor’s death. As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.

Decreases Victor's Unbind time by 33%.

Addon_K22Power_20.name: Iridescent Pendant
Addon_K22Power_20.description:
A glass-like pendant molded from The Fog itself. There’s a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.

Crushing Victor while he is dormant inflicts Exposed for 45 seconds.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

Addon_K22Power_3.name: Soured Milk
Addon_K22Power_3.description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured. Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.

Increases Victor's alert range by 2 meters.

Addon_K22Power_4.name: Toy Sword
Addon_K22Power_4.description:
A miniscule toy sword, only a few inches long. Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.

Decreases Pounce charge time by 10%.

Addon_K22Power_5.name: Cat’s Eye
Addon_K22Power_5.description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes’ family. Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.

Victor becomes silent while Pounce is fully charged.

Addon_K22Power_6.name: Madeleine’s Glove
Addon_K22Power_6.description:
A glove once owned by The Twins’ mother. During desperate times, it was held over Victor’s mouth to keep him from making a peep.

Increases Victor's alert range by 4 meters.

Addon_K22Power_7.name: Bloody Black Hood
Addon_K22Power_7.description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte. Soon, he became the prey.

Decreases Charlotte's waking time by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_K22Power_8.name: Ceremonial Candelabrum
Addon_K22Power_8.description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn. A symbol of his tenacity.

Increases time to crush Victor when he is dormant by 0.2 seconds.

Addon_K22Power_9.name: Baby Teeth
Addon_K22Power_9.description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago. They’re unusually sharp.

Crushing Victor when attached inflicts Blindness for 30 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_K24Power_1.name: Damaged Syringe
Addon_K24Power_1.description: Medical equipment that fared poorly during the chaos that overwhelmed Raccoon City.Increases time it takes Survivors to use a Vaccine by 5 seconds.

Addon_K24Power_10.name: Tyrant Gore
Addon_K24Power_10.description: A damaged sample from a T-002 Tyrant that died in combat. There are signs of severe burns.Increases mutation rate when destroying zombies with Tentacle Strike by 75%.Decreases zombie respawn time by 7.5 seconds.

Addon_K24Power_11.name: Serotonin Injector
Addon_K24Power_11.description:
A hormone that slightly relaxes the user for when stealth is required.Grants Undetectable for 15 seconds when a zombie is destroyed.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K24Power_12.name: T-Virus Sample
Addon_K24Power_12.description: A sample of the T-Virus developed by Umbrella Corporation, it causes extreme mutations and brain damage in its subjects.Increases mutation rate when destroying zombies with Tentacle Strike by 100%.

Addon_K24Power_13.name: Plant 43 Vines
Addon_K24Power_13.description: The tangled remnants of a plant infected with the T-Virus, it killed one of the researchers who developed it.Increases time required for Survivors to open Supply Cases by 4 seconds.

Addon_K24Power_14.name: Licker Tongue
Addon_K24Power_14.description:
A sticky prehensile tongue that easily wraps around anything it touches.Survivors are Hindered for an extra 1 second after being Contaminated.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Addon_K24Power_15.name: NE-α Parasite
Addon_K24Power_15.description:
A parasite used in the development of Nemesis T-Types, it’s capable of hijacking its host’s brain.Becoming Contaminated inflicts Oblivious for 60 seconds, or until the Survivor receives a Vaccine.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K24Power_16.name: Jill’s Sandwich
Addon_K24Power_16.description: It’s tragically squished and dripping with blood from a recent battle. Despite that, it has a delicious aroma that can’t be missed.Reveals a Survivor's aura for 12 seconds after they unlock a Supply Case.

Addon_K24Power_17.name: Broken Recovery Coin
Addon_K24Power_17.description: A coin depicting a bird framed by a laurel wreath. It’s broken in half.Removes 1 Supply Case from the trial.

Addon_K24Power_18.name: Depleted Ink Ribbon
Addon_K24Power_18.description: Who will save them now? There’s something about this ink ribbon being dry that energizes zombies.Decreases zombie respawn time by 5 seconds.Increases zombie movement speed by 50%.Any zombies destroyed after all generators are repaired will respawn in an exit area.

Addon_K24Power_19.name: Shattered S.T.A.R.S. Badge
Addon_K24Power_19.description: A symbol of hope for Raccoon City, utterly destroyed.Increases Zombie movement speed by 150% for 60 seconds after a generator is repaired.

Addon_K24Power_2.name: Brian’s Intestine
Addon_K24Power_2.description: The small intestine of Brian Irons, chief of the RPD. It's an appetizing sight for zombies.Increases zombie movement speed by 25%.

Addon_K24Power_20.name: Iridescent Umbrella Badge
Addon_K24Power_20.description:
A glass-like badge molded from The Fog itself. It represents a corporation that pushed far beyond ethical and humane science.Survivors are inflicted with Exposed for 60 seconds when using a Vaccine.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

Addon_K24Power_3.name: Visitor Wristband
Addon_K24Power_3.description: An electronic Umbrella wristband for visitors to the facility. It also doubles as a tracking device.Increases zombie detection range by 2 meters and field of view by 10 degrees.

Addon_K24Power_4.name: S.T.A.R.S. Field Combat Manual
Addon_K24Power_4.description: A manual of compiled S.T.A.R.S. close-range combat knowledge. Edited by Chris Redfield.Zombies’ auras turn yellow for 6 seconds after hitting a Survivor.

Addon_K24Power_5.name: Marvin’s Blood
Addon_K24Power_5.description: The contaminated blood of a Raccoon City police officer.Increases mutation rate when hitting Survivors with Tentacle Strike by 16% for uncontaminated Survivors and by 50% for contaminated Survivors.

Addon_K24Power_6.name: Adrenaline Injector
Addon_K24Power_6.description: A hormone that heightens senses and prepares the body to fight.Increases length of Killer Instinct when Survivors use a Vaccine by 3 seconds.

Addon_K24Power_7.name: Mikhail’s Eye
Addon_K24Power_7.description: While little was left of Mikhail, his left eyeball survived the blast that killed him. It remains a tasty treat for zombies.Increases zombie movement speed by 35%.

Addon_K24Power_8.name: Zombie Heart
Addon_K24Power_8.description: The heart of an eviscerated zombie. It’s considered hazardous waste as it’s certainly teeming with viruses.Increases mutation rate when destroying zombies with Tentacle Strike by 75%.

Addon_K24Power_9.name: Admin Wristband
Addon_K24Power_9.description: An electronic Umbrella wristband for administrators of the facility. While allowing access to secure areas, it also doubles as a tracking device.Increases zombie detection range by 4 meters and field of view by 18 degrees.

Addon_K25Power_01.name: Bent Nail
Addon_K25Power_01.description:
A simple nail that cut deep into Larry Cotton’s hand. Though the damage was superficial, it set into motion a horrifying set of events.

Gain 100% bonus Bloodpoints when binding a Survivor with a possessed chain.When hitting a Survivor with a possessed chain, only 1 additional chain will spawn.

Addon_K25Power_02.name: Lively Crickets
Addon_K25Power_02.description:
Insects which scarcely avoided being eaten by a mysterious drifter.

Increases turn rate of possessed chains by 10%.

Addon_K25Power_03.name: Burning Candle
Addon_K25Power_03.description:
A candle lit by Frank Cotton during a fatal summoning ceremony.

Decreases the time for Chain Hunts to activate by 3 seconds.

Addon_K25Power_04.name: Leather Strip
Addon_K25Power_04.description:
Leather strips torn from a cenobite’s uniform, allowing for the mutilation of exposed flesh.

Decreases Summons of Pain’s cooldown time after possessing a chain by 3%.

Addon_K25Power_05.name: Wriggling Maggots
Addon_K25Power_05.description:
Larvae that poured from the mouth of a corpse hidden in the Cotton household.

Increases turn rate of possessed chains by 15%.

Addon_K25Power_06.name: Spoiled Meal
Addon_K25Power_06.description:
A pile of mold, feasted on by a cockroach. Perhaps a sign of Frank Cotton’s mysterious disappearance...

Increases the possessed chain’s maximum travel distance by 2 meters.

Addon_K25Power_07.name: Skewered Rat
Addon_K25Power_07.description:
A crude solution for the Cotton home’s rat problem.

Decreases Summons of Pain’s cooldown time after possessing a chain by 9%.

Addon_K25Power_08.name: Flickering Television
Addon_K25Power_08.description:
A television that acted strangely upon the arrival of the cenobites.

Increases the maximum casting range of the gateway by 4 meters.

Addon_K25Power_09.name: Liquified Gore
Addon_K25Power_09.description:
The result of summoning the cenobites. There’s no telling what part of the human body this belonged to.

Increases the time it takes Survivors to solve the Lament Configuration by 1 second.

Addon_K25Power_10.name: Larry’s Blood
Addon_K25Power_10.description:
The blood of Larry Cotton, which partially resurrected his brother Frank.

Increases the possessed chain's maximum travel distance by 4 meters.

Addon_K25Power_11.name: Torture Pillar
Addon_K25Power_11.description:
A dangling slab covered in the gore of past victims.

Decreases the time for Chain Hunts to activate by 6 seconds.

Addon_K25Power_12.name: Frank’s Heart
Addon_K25Power_12.description:
The beating heart of Frank, given life from his brother’s blood.

Increases the maximum casting range of the gateway by 8 meters.

Addon_K25Power_13.name: Larry’s Remains
Addon_K25Power_13.description:
The skeletal remains of Larry Cotton, covered in a thick, sticky layer of blood.

Increases the time it takes Survivors to solve the Lament Configuration by 2 seconds.

Addon_K25Power_14.name: Slice of Frank
Addon_K25Power_14.description:
A slab of Frank’s face after his torture at the hand of the cenobites.

Survivors carrying the Lament Configuration are inflicted with Exhausted.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Addon_K25Power_15.name: Greasy Black Lens
Addon_K25Power_15.description:
A lens from the sunglasses of an obese cenobite whose fleshy rolls droop down his face and neck.

Survivors hit by a possessed chain are revealed for 6 seconds.

Addon_K25Power_16.name: Original Pain
Addon_K25Power_16.description:
The first pin pushed into Pinhead’s skull. Such pleasure and pain.

Injured Survivors who break free from a possessed chain suffer from Deep Wound.

Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

Addon_K25Power_17.name: Impaling Wire
Addon_K25Power_17.description:
A wire that pierces the cheeks of a cenobite, while revealing the gaping wound on her neck.

When a Survivor uses the environment to break a chain, an additional chain will target them.

Addon_K25Power_18.name: Chatterer’s Tooth
Addon_K25Power_18.description:
A fragment from a cenobite whose mouth chatters endlessly. This tooth, having broken from his jaw, is finally silent.

Reveal the Lament Configuration.Picking up the Lament Configuration deactivates Chain Hunts.Gain the Undetectable status effect for 25 seconds after picking up the Lament Configuration.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius and Red Stain.

Addon_K25Power_19.name: Engineer’s Fang
Addon_K25Power_19.description:
A sharp tooth from the maw of a fleshy, scorpion-like creature, known to accompany cenobites on their grim undertakings.

Possessed chains injure healthy Survivors, but do not bind them or spawn additional chains.Increases the time to close the gateway after hitting a healthy Survivor with a possessed chain by 50%.When hitting an injured Survivor with a possessed chain, only 1 additional chain will spawn.

Addon_K25Power_20.name: Iridescent Lament Configuration
Addon_K25Power_20.description:
A glass-like puzzle box molded from The Fog itself. This replica differs from the original, providing altogether new powers.

When a Chain Hunt is inactive, Survivors beyond 24 meters of the Lament Configuration cannot see its aura.

Addon_K26Power_01.name: Oil Paints
Addon_K26Power_01.description:
There's little left but a few globs of black and gray, yet Carmina could paint an expansive landscape with them.

Increases the Dire Crow's Killer Instinct detection range by 1.5 meters.

Killer Instinct intermittently reveals the location of Survivors.

Addon_K26Power_02.name: Vibrant Obituary
Addon_K26Power_02.description:
Scrap newspaper, speckled with bright, eye-catching paint. It seems tragedy is a daily thing.

Increases the length of time a Dire Crow's Killer Instinct reveals Survivors by 3 seconds.

Killer Instinct intermittently reveals the location of Survivors.

Addon_K26Power_03.name: Thick Tar
Addon_K26Power_03.description:
Sticky, viscous sludge that Carmina used for an experimental piece. Once it sticks to skin, it's nearly impossible to get off.

Increases the time for Survivors to repel a Dire Crow swarm by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_K26Power_04.name: Choclo Corn
Addon_K26Power_04.description:
A type of corn common in South America. A few kernels are reason enough for a crow to stop for a snack.

Increases the time Dire Crows stay idle for before disintegrating by 2 seconds.

Addon_K26Power_05.name: Automatic Drawing
Addon_K26Power_05.description:
An experimental drawing Carmina made without conscious planning. Do not think—act.

Decreases Birds of Torment cooldown time by 1.5 seconds after a Dire Crow disintegrates from inactivity.

Addon_K26Power_06.name: Festering Carrion
Addon_K26Power_06.description:
A stomach-churning pile of meat and guts, yet it attracts hungry crows craving a bite.

Decreases Birds of Torment cooldown time by 0.5 seconds after a Dire Crow takes flight.

Addon_K26Power_07.name: Velvet Fabric
Addon_K26Power_07.description:
A striking red fabric Carmina used on an art project. Its brightness contrasted against black feathers.

When a Survivor attempts to repel a Dire Crow swarm, the swarm's aura remains visible for an additional 1.5 seconds.

Addon_K26Power_08.name: Still Life Crow
Addon_K26Power_08.description:
An ink drawing of a dead crow. Carmina's sadness over its death can be felt with each dark line.

Increases the time Dire Crows stay idle before disintegrating by 4 seconds.

Addon_K26Power_09.name: Untitled Agony
Addon_K26Power_09.description:
A canvas that was targeted with swipes and thrashes of black paint following Matias' death. It radiates with heavy, crippling sorrow.When Dire Crows swarm a Survivor, it afflicts them with a 15% Hindered status effect for 1.5 seconds.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Addon_K26Power_10.name: Charcoal Stick
Addon_K26Power_10.description:
A stick of charcoal that conceals anything it rubs over.

The Dire Crow's aura is no longer visible when in flight.The Dire Crow's aura is visible for 0.5 seconds when summoned.

Addon_K26Power_11.name: Darkest Ink
Addon_K26Power_11.description:
An unnatural ink, so wretched and dark that it seems to pull in light around it.

When Dire Crows swarm a Survivor, it afflicts them with the Blindness status effect. The effect persists for 15 seconds after Dire Crows are repelled from a Survivor.

Blindness prevents survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_K26Power_12.name: O Grief, O Lover
Addon_K26Power_12.description:
An abstract ink drawing that Carmina drew before walking to the Death Leap.

When Dire Crows swarm a Survivor, it afflicts them with the Exhausted status effect.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating certain perks.

Addon_K26Power_13.name: Thorny Nest
Addon_K26Power_13.description:
