A nest that remained empty near Carmina's home. There are sharp thorns embedded in it.

Survivors damaged by a Dire Crow are afflicted with the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effects for 70 seconds.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until healed.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K26Power_14.name: Silver Bell
Addon_K26Power_14.description:
A shiny trinket that a crow took a liking to. The clinking of the bell was a distraction to all but Carmina.

When Dire Crows swarm a Survivor it afflicts them with the Oblivious status effect.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing and being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K26Power_15.name: Matias' Baby Shoes
Addon_K26Power_15.description:
A grieving reminder to Carmina that Matias would be with her, always watching.

Survivors within 5 meters of an idle Dire Crow have their auras revealed for 3 seconds.

Addon_K26Power_16.name: Severed Tongue
Addon_K26Power_16.description:
Carmina's tongue, cut from her mouth shortly before her death. The sight instills rage not just in her, but in her crows.

Decreases the length of time The Artist's movement slows when Dire Crows take flight by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_K26Power_17.name: Garden of Rot
Addon_K26Power_17.description:
A nude self-portrait in which Carmina depicts a rotting darkness growing outwards from within.

When a Survivor affected by Dire Crows completes the repel action, they are afflicted by the Exposed status effect for 4 seconds.

Exposed Survivors are downed by basic attacks, even if uninjured.

Addon_K26Power_18.name: Ink Egg
Addon_K26Power_18.description:
An unusual egg that seems to be nothing but a ball of semi-solid ink.

Increases the maximum capacity of Dire Crows by 1.Decreases the time Dire Crows stay idle before disintegrating by 2 seconds.

Addon_K26Power_19.name: Severed Hands
Addon_K26Power_19.description:
Carmina's severed hands, cut from her arms shortly before her death. The sight brings sheer fury to her and her protectors.

Any Survivors within 3 meters of a Survivor being swarmed by Dire Crows will also be swarmed.

Addon_K26Power_20.name: Iridescent Feather
Addon_K26Power_20.description:
A glass-like feather molded from The Fog itself. Simple as it may be, it's a symbol of those who watch over Carmina.

The Artist gains the Undetectable status effect when Birds of Torment is in cooldown and she holds no Dire Crows.Decreases the maximum capacity of Dire Crows by 1.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K28_01.name: Wooden Plank
Addon_K28_01.description:
A wooden plank torn from the stage where Otto Stamper sacrificed a meddling journalist.

Increases the amount Nightfall charges when a Survivor is hooked by 25%.

Addon_K28_02.name: Caffeine Tablets
Addon_K28_02.description:
Stamper’s followers were told not to sleep, or they would bring the wrath of Druanee upon them. Towards the end, he brought in drugs from the mainland.

Auras of locked lockers are visible in yellow while charging The Gloaming and Teleporting.

Addon_K28_03.name: Mortar and Pestle
Addon_K28_03.description:
Disconnected from the world and modern medicine, Stamper's followers originally had to make do with the flora local to the island.

The Dredge will emerge from its Remnant facing the same direction as when Teleport is activated instead of the direction facing when the Remnant was placed.

Addon_K28_04.name: Follower’s Cowl
Addon_K28_04.description:
They believed the cowls proved their enlightenment, but they merely kept them in darkness.

Teleporting to the Remnant will activate Killer Instinct even when not in Nightfall.

Addon_K28_05.name: Burnt Letters
Addon_K28_05.description:
Some followers tried to write letters home. Stamper ensured that nobody would have contact with the outside world.

Increases the amount Nightfall charges when injuring a Survivor by 25%.

Addon_K28_06.name: Air Freshener
Addon_K28_06.description:
After her parents were found, this was in the bag of belongings the police returned. Haddie doesn’t know why she keeps it.

Adds 1 additional Power Token for Teleporting.

Addon_K28_07.name: Haddie’s Calendar
Addon_K28_07.description:
She planned to cross out each day until her parents took her to India, but when tragedy struck, she abandoned her calendar.

Decreases the time to exit a locked locker by 0.4 seconds.

Addon_K28_08.name: Fallen Shingle
Addon_K28_08.description:
After the Ottomarians were subsumed by The Dredge, the mansion fell into disrepair.

Using Reign of Darkness increases Nightfall charge speed by an additional 15% per second.

Addon_K28_09.name: Malthinker’s Skull
Addon_K28_09.description:
Those who brought negativity to the commune would mysteriously disappear from time to time. Their remains were never found… until The Dredge brought them up.

Increases Nightfall charge speed by 25% while any Survivor is injured.

Addon_K28_10.name: Worry Stone
Addon_K28_10.description:
While the Ottomarians were told to think only positive thoughts, some kept these stones in their pockets to rub when negative thoughts arose.

Reveals the aura of a Survivor for 6 seconds when they lock a locker.

Addon_K28_11.name: Ottomarian Writing
Addon_K28_11.description:
The words of Otto Stamper were the only words available for his followers to read, decrying malthink and malspeak.

Decreases Teleport cooldown by 2 seconds while not in Nightfall.

Addon_K28_12.name: Broken Doll
Addon_K28_12.description:
Followers brought their families to live in a utopia. None of them were spared.

Increases the duration of Nightfall by 20 seconds.

Addon_K28_13.name: War Helmet
Addon_K28_13.description:
While investigating an Overlap in the Alps, she found an abandoned war bunker. She took a helmet from it after the Overlap nearly took her.

Increases Killer Instinct duration by 1.5 seconds.

Addon_K28_14.name: Destroyed Pillow
Addon_K28_14.description:
While not allowed to sleep, leaders among the Ottomarians tore sleeping supplies to shreds to prevent malthinkers from sneaking off to nap.

Decreases Teleport cooldown by 2.5 seconds during Nightfall.

Addon_K28_15.name: Tilling Blade
Addon_K28_15.description:
The island was self-sufficient, and followers tilled the tough soil to grow crops during the warm season.

When a Survivor is injured from full health during Nightfall, they are afflicted with the Blindness, Hemorrhage, and Mangled status effects for 80 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until healed.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K28_16.name: Boat Key
Addon_K28_16.description:
Only one boat allowed people on and off the island, and the keys were hidden away to prevent deserters.

Increases Teleport speed by 16% while not in Nightfall.When the exit gates are powered, all active locks are instantly broken.

Addon_K28_17.name: Field Recorder
Addon_K28_17.description:
Haddie documented all of her forays near Overlaps, to prove not only to the world but herself what she saw and felt.

Nightfall is active at the start of the trial.Nightfall is automatically triggered when the last generator is repaired.Any Survivor that comes into contact with a Remnant is afflicted with the Exhausted status effect for 15 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating certain perks.

Addon_K28_18.name: Lavalier Microphone
Addon_K28_18.description:
She kept a lav mic nearby, allowing her to record her innermost feelings when under great stress.

Survivor auras are revealed for 3 seconds when using the last Teleport token.When entering a locker using Teleport, other lockers within 6 meters of Survivors open and slam their doors.

Addon_K28_19.name: Sacrificial Knife
Addon_K28_19.description:
When a journalist attempted to warn the Ottomarians of his true task, he slit her throat as a warning to any dissenters.

Exiting a locker during Nightfall blocks all vault locations within 16 meters for 5 seconds.

Addon_K28_20.name: Iridescent Wooden Plank
Addon_K28_20.description:
Once the journalist’s blood stained the wooden boards of the stage, everything was set into motion for The Dredge’s arrival.

Survivors are afflicted with the Exposed status effect for the last 12 seconds of Nightfall.

Exposed Survivors are downed by basic attacks, even if uninjured.

Addon_K29_01.name: Jewel Beetle
Addon_K29_01.description:
A beautiful and valuable insect. While difficult to capture, it’s worth a pretty penny.

Decreases the Virulent Bound extension when grabbing a Survivor mid-Bound by 50%.Gain 100% bonus Bloodpoints for Virulent Bound score events.

Addon_K29_02.name: Green Herb
Addon_K29_02.description:
A common plant, usually known for its restorative properties.

Increases the rate of Infection when grabbing a Survivor during a Virulent Bound by 30%.

Addon_K29_03.name: Unicorn Medallion
Addon_K29_03.description:
An old medallion depicting a majestic unicorn. It was placed in storage for years.

Increases the initial Virulent Bound distance by 20%.Decreases the subsequent Virulent Bound distance by 20%.

Addon_K29_04.name: R.P.D. Shoulder Walkie
Addon_K29_04.description:
Without the ability to communicate, the cops of Raccoon City are isolated and don’t stand a chance.

Decreases the initial Virulent Bound distance by 20%.Increases the subsequent Virulent Bound distance by 20%.

Addon_K29_05.name: Loose Crank
Addon_K29_05.description: To the person whose only tool is a crank, the whole world looks like a crank-shaped hole.Increases movement speed between the first and second Virulent Bounds by 8%.

Addon_K29_06.name: Leather Gloves
Addon_K29_06.description: Gloves of a cold, calculating schemer. They impart an air of icy professionalism.Decreases the time to recharge Virulent Bound by 8%.

Addon_K29_07.name: Lion Medallion
Addon_K29_07.description: An old medallion depicting a brave lion. It was made when the Raccoon Police Station was still an art museum.Increases the distance at which Survivors are thrown by 30%.

Addon_K29_08.name: Chalice (Gold)
Addon_K29_08.description: A chalice of pure gold used to celebrate the summer solstice.Increases the Virulent Bound extension when grabbing a Survivor mid-Bound by 50%.

Addon_K29_09.name: Bullhorn
Addon_K29_09.description:
The commands screamed into this device riled up some and disoriented others.Survivors that use the First Aid Spray suffer from the Oblivious status effect for 30 seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K29_10.name: Portable Safe
Addon_K29_10.description:
A small container that requires a complicated combination to unlock.Survivors injured by Virulent Bound suffer from the Hemorrhage status effect until fully healed.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K29_11.name: Red Herb
Addon_K29_11.description: Acts as a reagent that strengthens the effect of that with which it is combined.Increases the time it takes for Survivors to use a First Aid Spray by 2 seconds.

Addon_K29_12.name: Maiden Medallion
Addon_K29_12.description:
A medallion depicting a beautiful maiden. Its purpose was unknown for many years.When a Survivor becomes fully Infected, they suffer from the Blindness status effect for 60 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_K29_13.name: Video Conference Device
Addon_K29_13.description: Many intricate conspiracies were orchestrated on devices just like this one.Increases the Infection passive gain rate by 30%.

Addon_K29_14.name: Egg (Gold)
Addon_K29_14.description: A highly coveted foodstuff. The cash worth is second only to its regenerative effects.Increases the duration of the additional Virulent Bound window by 50%.

Addon_K29_15.name: Dark Sunglasses
Addon_K29_15.description:
Glasses enhanced with AR that grant the wearer an invaluable advantage on the battlefield.When a Survivor is fully infected with the Uroboros Infection, gain the Undetectable status effect for 20 seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K29_16.name: Helicopter Stick
Addon_K29_16.description: Debris from a helicopter crash. Few jobs are more dangerous than a helicopter pilot’s when Wesker is involved.When a Survivor uses a First Aid Spray, reveal their aura for 8 seconds.

Addon_K29_17.name: Uroboros Tendril
Addon_K29_17.description: The result of decades of Bio Organic Weapon research. It will not rest until it has swallowed the entire world.Increases movement speed while charging Virulent Bound by 5%.

Addon_K29_18.name: Uroboros Virus
Addon_K29_18.description: For some, the strength and resistance was worth the trade-off.When a Survivor reaches full infection, reveal their aura for 4 seconds.

Addon_K29_19.name: Lab Photo
Addon_K29_19.description: Wesker was as much a researcher as he was a guinea pig for Umbrella's bio-weapons.Destroy pallets and breakable walls when colliding while using Virulent Bound.Removes the ability to vault pallets while using Virulent Bound.

Addon_K29_20.name: Iridescent Uroboros Vial
Addon_K29_20.description:
The perfect bio-weapon. Decades of research have led to this.Survivors start the trial Infected with Uroboros.Survivors suffer from the Exposed status effect for 30 seconds when reaching maximum Infection.

Exposed Survivors will be downed by basic attacks even if uninjured.

Addon_K30_01.name: Gritty Lump
Addon_K30_01.description:
A rock-hard, dense loaf filled their stomachs on most days, giving them the energy to commit truly heinous acts.

Increases Guards' movement Speed while on Patrol by 9%.

Addon_K30_02.name: Map of the Realm
Addon_K30_02.description:
These unique leather maps were not easy to come by, but when they could not be purchased, they could be taken by force.

Increases the detection Range for Guards on Patrol by 2 meters.

Addon_K30_03.name: Tattered Tabard
Addon_K30_03.description:
Cloaked in heavy fabrics, neither human nor nature could stop them once they had their target.

Increases Patrol time for all Guards by 8 seconds.

Addon_K30_04.name: Pillaged Mead
Addon_K30_04.description:
Drinks taken from their victims tasted sweet, but such frivolities were often short-lived.

Decreases the amount of time it takes for a Guard to complete their Order action by 10%.

Addon_K30_05.name: Dried Horsemeat
Addon_K30_05.description:
Long campaigns often required restocking, and the steeds of fallen enemies were as good as any farm-fresh ration.

Increases the amount of time a Guard will Hunt a Survivor by 4 seconds.

Addon_K30_06.name: Battleaxe Head
Addon_K30_06.description:
Sander Rault was a tower of a man, terrifying in form and demeanor.

Decreases the cooldown after summoning The Carnifex by 20%.

Addon_K30_07.name: Treated Blade
Addon_K30_07.description:
Durkos Malecek stuck to the shadows, and was an efficient slaughterer.

Decreases the cooldown after summoning The Assassin by 20%.

Addon_K30_08.name: Cold Steel Manacles
Addon_K30_08.description:
Alejandro Santiago apprenticed as an armorer, and showed no remorse.

Decreases the cooldown after summoning The Jailer by 20%.

Addon_K30_09.name: Call To Arms
Addon_K30_09.description:
Posted across many towns, lords desperate to protect their riches posted for able-bodied mercenaries. None survived.

Increases the length of a Patrol Path by 10 meters, and, while creating the path, movement speed is increased by 25%.

Addon_K30_10.name: Sharpened Mount
Addon_K30_10.description:
To stand before the Standard of the Guardia Compagnia was to stand at the threshold between life and death.

Increases the time it takes for the Standard to spawn by 15%.

Addon_K30_11.name: Grim Iron Mask
Addon_K30_11.description:
No method of torture was too base for Guardia Compagnia. Pain and humiliation went hand-in-hand.

When a Survivor is Detected by a Guard, the Survivor suffers from Blindness for 75 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_K30_12.name: Broken Hilt
Addon_K30_12.description:
A fresh weapon is clean, even surgical; an attack with a broken one is malicious and desperate.

Guards inflict the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effects for 70 seconds when damaging a Survivor.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K30_13.name: Ironworker’s Tongs
Addon_K30_13.description:
Vital for repairs between battles and a horrifying, gauging, tearing improvisational weapon.

When a Survivor escapes a Guard Hunt successfully, they suffer from the Oblivious status effect for 60 seconds.

Oblivious prevents survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K30_14.name: Town Watch’s Torch
Addon_K30_14.description:
Upon breaching a village, the first thing they would extinguish was the torches, and with them, hope.

While a Guard is actively Hunting a Survivor, gain the Undetectable status effect.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K30_15.name: Blacksmith’s Hammer
Addon_K30_15.description:
In their hands, everything was a weapon.

Guards inflict the Broken status effect for 60 seconds when damaging a Survivor.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

Addon_K30_16.name: Flint and Steel
Addon_K30_16.description:
Attacks at night were not uncommon. Fear was often their greatest ally.

After summoning The Carnifex, The Knight can see the auras of Survivors within 24 meters of downed pallets for 8 seconds.

Addon_K30_17.name: Healing Poultice
Addon_K30_17.description:
Their reputation was so large, so horrible, that the mere knowledge that they were coming was enough to bring people to their knees.

After summoning The Assassin, all Survivors within 8 meters from the Guard's initial position have their aura revealed for 8 seconds.

Addon_K30_18.name: Jailer's Chimes
Addon_K30_18.description:
Many captives met the same grisly end for attempting to escape his clutches.

After summoning The Jailer, Survivors that cross his Patrol Path have their aura revealed for 8 seconds.

Addon_K30_19.name: Knight’s Contract
Addon_K30_19.description:
The original document contracting Tarhos to Vittorio’s employ. The laws of man could not stand up, though, to natural law.

After giving an Order, the Guard will remain for an extra 8 seconds, triggering a Hunt if they detect a Survivor.

Addon_K30_20.name: Iridescent Company Banner
Addon_K30_20.description:
Where this banner was raised, those who called themselves "civilized" ran and hid, because for all their codes and laws, they had nothing resembling actual strength.

While a Survivor is Hunted by a Guard, spikes block the exit for the Hunted Survivor. When they vault, that vault location is blocked for all Survivors for the duration of the Hunt.While creating a Patrol Path, passing through vault locations will block these locations for 25 seconds after summoning a Guard.

Addon_K31_01.name: Adi Valente #1
Addon_K31_01.description:
An original copy of the first issue of Adi Valente, the comic her father made while Adriana was a child.

Survivors with a Claw Trap suffer from 20% smaller skill checks. This effect lasts until the Claw Trap is removed.

Addon_K31_02.name: High-Power Floodlight
Addon_K31_02.description:
A sudden and overwhelming light that discombobulates anyone foolish enough to approach.

Survivors with a Claw Trap suffer from the Blindness status effect. This effect lasts until the Claw Trap is removed. Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_K31_03.name: Geographical Readout
Addon_K31_03.description:
The drones generate and communicate a detailed three-dimensional map of the terrain, making traversal easier.

Gain a 20% action speed bonus to breaking pallets and breakable walls, damaging generators, and vaulting for 8 seconds after deploying a Drone.

Addon_K31_04.name: High Current Upgrade
Addon_K31_04.description:
A wider cable with low resistance that allows faster recharging of batteries.

Increases the time Survivors appear on the radar when detected by 1 second.

Addon_K31_05.name: Adaptive Lighting
Addon_K31_05.description:
The drone takes account of the surrounding area and casts lights in a bewildering manner that obscures movement.

Increases the duration of the Undetectable status effect by 20%. Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K31_06.name: Stereo Remote Mic
Addon_K31_06.description:
An upgrade that allows increased three-dimensional audio tracking.

Decreases the Disabled state duration of Drones by 15%.

Addon_K31_07.name: Supercharge
Addon_K31_07.description:
The batteries may run a little hot, but removing the safety protocols from the cells makes them last a little longer.

Increases the battery life of Claw Traps by 15%.

Addon_K31_08.name: Shotgun Speakers
Addon_K31_08.description:
Capable of directing high-frequency noises in a single direction over great distances, the drones can focus in on one individual and distract them from danger for some time.

Survivors with a Claw Trap have no skill check warning. This effect lasts until the Claw Trap is removed.

Addon_K31_09.name: Low-Power Mode
Addon_K31_09.description:
By intermittently powering off and on non-vital components, the drone can stay on for longer.

Decreases Drone Rotation speed by 100%.

Addon_K31_10.name: Powdered Glass
Addon_K31_10.description:
Once used on the strings used for battle kites, this powdered glass took on a much more nefarious purpose on her blade.

Claw Trapped Survivors you hit suffer from the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effects for 70 seconds.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K31_11.name: Vital Targeting Processor
Addon_K31_11.description:
An additional process in the drone’s programming more accurately predicts the weaknesses of potential prey.

Increases the Hindered status effect gained by Claw Trapped Survivors when detected by a Drone by 2%. Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Addon_K31_12.name: Brown Noise Generator
Addon_K31_12.description:
An ominous hum disseminates from the drone, blanketing the soundscape and making it difficult to hear anything else.

Survivors with a Claw Trap suffer from the Oblivious status effect. This lasts until the Claw Trap is removed. Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K31_13.name: Loose Screw
Addon_K31_13.description:
A bone-chilling rattling emanates from the drone, and it seems like it make fall at any minute, distracting Survivors from complicated tasks.

Survivors with a Claw Trap suffer from the Exhausted status effect for 6 seconds. Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Addon_K31_14.name: Infrared Upgrade
Addon_K31_14.description:
Heat-detecting cameras focus in on high-stress individuals with pinpoint accuracy.

Anytime a Claw Trap is removed, the Survivor's aura is revealed for 4 seconds.

Addon_K31_15.name: Randomized Strobes
Addon_K31_15.description:
Lights flash randomly on the ground, making it harder to find purchase on the uneven terrain.

Increases the duration of the Hindered status effect Claw Trapped Survivors suffer from when detected by a Drone by 1 second.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Addon_K31_16.name: Advanced Movement Prediction
Addon_K31_16.description:
Even after they leave the zone of influence, a refined AI program predicts with high accuracy where a person will go next.

When a Survivor receives a Claw Trap, reveal their aura for 6 seconds.

Addon_K31_17.name: Ultrasonic Speaker
Addon_K31_17.description:
A high-frequency noise blaster that fills the sonic spectrum with disorienting sounds, making it impossible for observers to pick out more important noises.

Decreases Survivors' scan line immunity duration by 10%.

Addon_K31_18.name: Expired Batteries
Addon_K31_18.description:
The batteries on these Claw Traps have been swapped out with old alkaline batteries. Recharging is not recommended.

All Survivors start the trial with a Claw Trap, which has 50% less battery life.Claw Trap battery life increases by 10% for each Claw Trap received, up to 150%.

Addon_K31_19.name: Prototype Rotor
Addon_K31_19.description:
The cutting-edge design allows the drone to move with razor-sharp precision.

Increases Drones' rotation speed by 10%.

Addon_K31_20.name: Iridescent Unpublished Manuscript
Addon_K31_20.description:
Before he disappeared, Adriana’s father had started a newer, darker manga, Sonhadores Sombrios.

When a Drone is disabled, it gains a 32-meter Terror Radius for 15 seconds. During this time, gain the Undetectable status effect.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K32_01.name: Broken Security Key
Addon_K32_01.description:
Dozens of security measures were applied across the ship’s equipment, and many of them were in a state of disrepair.

The reboot timer when the EMP affects the Biopods is reduced by 15%.

Addon_K32_02.name: Heavy Water
Addon_K32_02.description:
A byproduct of the microfission reactors powering cryo and life support. Even a tiny leak would prove disastrous for onboard sensors.

Supply cases' aura distance is reduced by 8 meters.

Addon_K32_03.name: Kid’s Ball Glove
Addon_K32_03.description:
A kid’s baseball glove owned by one of the colonists. His memories of a youth playing catch were implanted.

Overclock Mode duration is increased by 8%.

Addon_K32_04.name: Nutritional Slurry
Addon_K32_04.description:
Made for the organics, this disgusting concoction works well to nourish any organic matter.

Get 2 extra Biopods.

Addon_K32_05.name: Diagnostic Tool (Construction)
Addon_K32_05.description:
A device that gives highly accurate information on the lay of the land.

Reveals the auras of Survivors who pick up an EMP for 8 seconds.

Addon_K32_06.name: Diagnostic Tool (Repair)
Addon_K32_06.description:
A device that can find the flaws in constructed objects. Intended to help with repair.

Increases targeting range while in a Biopod by 4 meters.

Addon_K32_07.name: Android Arm
Addon_K32_07.description:
Destroying the other HUX units not only made his extermination of humans easier, it gave him more parts to work with.

Slipstream infection range between Survivors is increased by 2 meters and spreads 25% faster.

Addon_K32_08.name: Cremated Remains
Addon_K32_08.description:
After extracting the other colonists’ DNA, he burned their remains.

Survivors afflicted with Temporal Slipstream suffer from Blindness.

Blindness prevents survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_K32_09.name: Foreign Plant Fibers
Addon_K32_09.description:
Xenobotanists would have a field day with these strange samples of alien plant life.

Decreases the duration of the Hindered status effect after being stunned by a pallet while in Overclock mode by 20%.

Hindered reduces Killer movement speed.

Addon_K32_10.name: Live Wires
Addon_K32_10.description:
Unconnected wires attached to a live current that have a tendency to deliver a shocking surprise.

A Survivor who is cleansed of Slipstream screams, interrupting their current action.

Addon_K32_11.name: Cryo Gel
Addon_K32_11.description:
A no-friction gel applied to crew members before entering deep cryo sleep.

Slipstreamed Survivors suffer from the Hemorrhage status effect for 60 seconds when hit with a basic attack.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.

Addon_K32_12.name: Denied Requisition Form
Addon_K32_12.description:
Despite the advent of light speed technology, it seemed nothing could make bureaucracy any faster.

At the start of the trial, EMPs take 30 seconds longer to generate.All survivors start the match Slipstreamed.

Addon_K32_13.name: Iridescent Crystal Shard
Addon_K32_13.description:
A crystal from the alien structure that gave him sentience.

When a Biopod is created, the auras of all Survivors within 10 meters of that Biopod are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

Addon_K32_14.name: Ultrasonic Sensor
Addon_K32_14.description:
A limitation of organic hearing is a limited aural spectrum. Expanding that range is like gaining an entirely new sense.

Exiting a Biopod within 2 seconds of Slipstreaming a Survivor decreases your Terror Radius by 12 meters for 12 seconds.

Addon_K32_15.name: Spent Oxygen Tank
Addon_K32_15.description:
Without air to breathe, organics don’t last long.

When a survivor becomes Slipstreamed, they are Exhausted for 6 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Addon_K32_16.name: Nanomachine Gel
Addon_K32_16.description:
A gel that can heal wounds extremely quickly. However, the machines in it have a history of being hacked to hurt people too.

Decreases Biopod cooldown by 15% after Slipstreaming a Survivor.

Addon_K32_17.name: Hyperawareness Spray
Addon_K32_17.description:
Used by crew members during long shifts to avoid lapses in focus. Side effects of overuse include paranoia and, in extreme cases, hallucination.

While a Survivor is Slipstreamed, they hear the Terror Radius as if you were nearby.

Addon_K32_18.name: Hologram Generator
Addon_K32_18.description:
Originally used for communication and entertainment, this has been repurposed for obfuscation.

After a successful Slipstream teleport from a Biopod, the target Survivor suffers from the Oblivious status effect for 60 seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K32_19.name: Soma Family Photo
Addon_K32_19.description:
A sentimental object that grounds someone to an imagined past.

Slipstreaming a Survivor using a Biopod inflicts a 3% Hindered status effect for 3 seconds, and also inflicts the Deep Wounds status effect if the Survivor is injured.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

Addon_K32_20.name: Crew Manifest
Addon_K32_20.description:
A complete list of biographical data on the entire crew of the ship sent to Dvarka.

Reveals a Slipstreamed Survivor's aura for 8 seconds when they infect another Survivor.Increases the Slipstream infection range between Survivors by 2 meters.

Addon_K33_01.name: Lambert’s Star Map
Addon_K33_01.description:
Vital for interstellar travel, but not as useful on a smaller scale.

Decreases the flame distance of Turrets by 2 meters.

Addon_K33_02.name: Cereal Rations
Addon_K33_02.description:
Contains 100% of the recommended daily intake of Vitamin A. Tastes awful.

Turret auras are visible while in tunnels and when coming out of vents for 3 seconds.

Addon_K33_03.name: Ripley's Watch
Addon_K33_03.description:
On a ship as massive as the Nostromo, synchronizing watches was important to keep track of work shifts.

When a Turret removes Crawler Mode, it is destroyed automatically.

Addon_K33_04.name: Ovomorph
Addon_K33_04.description:
It looks harmless, but the horrors held inside are immeasurable.

The cooldown of Crawler Mode is 25% faster while outside of tunnels.

Addon_K33_05.name: Drinking Bird
Addon_K33_05.description:
One of the many tchotchkes littering the Nostromo’s living quarters. A bit of whimsy in an otherwise sterile environment.

After exiting a tunnel, Killer Instinct duration is increased by 3 seconds.

Killer Instinct intermittently reveals the location of Survivors.

Addon_K33_06.name: Crew Headset
Addon_K33_06.description:
While they facilitated team communication, the constant chatter made the crew easier to track.

While in tunnels, footstep detection is increased by 6 meters.

Addon_K33_07.name: Emergency Helmet
Addon_K33_07.description:
An extra helmet on the bridge, for use in emergencies only.

Increases resistance to staggering from Turrets by 15%.

Addon_K33_08.name: Ash’s Innards
Addon_K33_08.description:
While hardier, mechanical beings break too when enough force is applied.

Turrets take 15 seconds longer to respawn after they are destroyed.

Addon_K33_09.name: Light Wand
Addon_K33_09.description:
A portable light source used by Ash and Dallas while looking for the invasive creature. Mostly ineffective for lighting larger spaces.

Increases downtime of Turrets by 3 second after exiting a tunnel.

Addon_K33_10.name: Kane’s Helmet
Addon_K33_10.description:
A thin layer of glass was the difference between a minor inconvenience and the tragic destruction of the Nostromo’s crew.

Survivors hit with a Tail Attack are Mangled for 70 seconds.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K33_11.name: Multipurpose Hatchet
Addon_K33_11.description:
Equally useful for destruction and repair.

Survivors hit by a Tail Attack suffer from Hemorrhage.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K33_12.name: Parker’s Headband
Addon_K33_12.description:
A bold fashion choice that doubled as a handy way to wick sweat from the eyes.

After exiting a tunnel, gain 5% Haste for 3 seconds.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

Addon_K33_13.name: Molted Skin
Addon_K33_13.description:
The Xenomorph molted many times as it rapidly grew on the Nostromo. Its shed skin was a constant reminder of its presence.

After deploying a Turret, the deploying Survivor suffers from the Exhausted status effect for 30 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating certain perks.

Addon_K33_14.name: Brett’s Cap
Addon_K33_14.description:
This Nostromo ballcap was fashionable, but severely limited his vertical field of vision.

Destroying a Turret causes all Survivors within 16 meters to suffer from Blindness for 25 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_K33_15.name: Semiotic Keyboard
Addon_K33_15.description:
Its symbols are designed to be universally recognizable, but they take some getting used to.

Generators within 16 meters of a Turret have the intensity of their auras determined by their repair progression.

Addon_K33_16.name: Harpoon Gun
Addon_K33_16.description:
Barely a weapon, its use is only viable in a situation of last resort.

Exiting a tunnel and hitting a Survivor within 30 seconds causes all Survivors further than 16 meters from you to scream and reveal their locations.

Addon_K33_17.name: Cat Carrier
Addon_K33_17.description:
Saving the cat is a noble goal. It’s also very distracting.

Exiting Crawler Mode due to a Turret attack makes you Undetectable for 30 seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K33_18.name: Self-Destruct Bolt
Addon_K33_18.description:
They needed to be removed to start, and replaced to end, the self-destruct sequence. Just seeing them evokes a sense of urgency.

Increases vault speed by 30% while in Crawler Mode.

Addon_K33_19.name: Improvised Cattle Prod
Addon_K33_19.description:
A brutal and noisy weapon, which might have been more effective against a cow.

Each time a generator is completed, a 15-second timer starts. Any Survivor who comes within 10 meters of a Control Station during that time has their aura revealed for the remainder of the timer.

Addon_K33_20.name: Acidic Blood
Addon_K33_20.description:
When damaged, the Xenomorph’s unique physiology made it deadlier than ever.

While exiting a tunnel in Crawler Mode, any Survivor who stuns you with a pallet in the next 20 seconds takes damage. If that Survivor is already injured, they suffer from Deep Wound.

Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

Addon_K34_01.name: Strobing Light
Addon_K34_01.description:
With the right training, can be used to make people more suggestible.

Decreases the Terror Radius by 8 meters when Hidey-Ho Mode is in cooldown.

Addon_K34_02.name: Doll Eyes
Addon_K34_02.description:
One of the advantages of possessing a mass-produced doll is easy access to replacement parts.

While in Hidey-Ho Mode, reveals auras of all windows and downed pallets within 20 meters.

Addon_K34_03.name: Tiny Scalpel
Addon_K34_03.description:
Sometimes, a precision cut can lead to a beautiful bleed.

While in Hidey-Ho Mode, blood pools are more visible.

Addon_K34_04.name: Good Guy Box
Addon_K34_04.description:
Someone kept this box around in case they needed to bring Chucky back to the store.

Decreases Slice & Dice hit cooldown by 7%.

Addon_K34_05.name: Power Drill
Addon_K34_05.description:
Comes with a dozen convenient drill tips. They all make a big mess when applied to people.

Reduces Hidey-Ho Mode cooldown by 10% after hitting a Survivor with Slice & Dice.

Addon_K34_06.name: Electric Carving Knife
Addon_K34_06.description:
The annoying buzzing sound means it’s ready to carve some flesh.

Decreases Slice & Dice miss cooldown by 5%.

Addon_K34_07.name: Jump Rope
Addon_K34_07.description:
Good for a bit of exercise, or for tying up your target.

Increases duration of Slice & Dice by 8%.

Addon_K34_08.name: Hair Spray & Candle
Addon_K34_08.description:
An aerosolized inferno that will ensure a bad hair day is the least of your worries.

Decreases the time that basic attacks remove from Hidey-Ho Mode by 20%.

Addon_K34_09.name: Automatic Screwdriver
Addon_K34_09.description:
A good way to make mechanical adjustments on the fly.

Missing a Slice & Dice reduces Hidey-Ho Mode cooldown by 8%.

Addon_K34_10.name: Portable TV
Addon_K34_10.description:
Small enough for any room. Just keep it out of the bath.

Slice & Dice duration increased by 70% once the Exit Gates have been powered.

Addon_K34_11.name: Silk Pillow
Addon_K34_11.description:
For when you want to smother your target with silky-smooth softness.

Terror Radius is reduced by 6 meters, but Slice & Dice charge time is increased by 50%.

Addon_K34_12.name: Iridescent Amulet
Addon_K34_12.description:
A pendant of great power, recreated within the Realm.

Increases duration of Hidey-Ho Mode by 50%. Basic attacks immediately end Hidey-Ho Mode.

Addon_K34_13.name: Plastic Bag
Addon_K34_13.description:
Nothing tires out a kill like a lack of oxygen.

If a Survivor walks through an illusory Footfall, they suffer from Exhausted for 15 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating other perks that cause Exhausted.

Addon_K34_14.name: Pile of Nails
Addon_K34_14.description:
It’s a lot easier to stay hidden when your target is worried about a pile of nails flying at their head.

Upon manually exiting Hidey-Ho Mode, The Good Guy remains Undetectable for 3 seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K34_15.name: Yardstick
Addon_K34_15.description:
Good for measuring distance. Even better for laying down a beating.

A Scamper reveals Survivor auras within 16 meters of you for 3 seconds.

Addon_K34_16.name: Running Shoes
Addon_K34_16.description:
The latest in high-performance killer doll athletic technology.

Gain 2% movement speed after a Scamper for 5 seconds.

Addon_K34_17.name: Rat Poison
Addon_K34_17.description:
The secret ingredient in a killer chili.

While performing a Slice & Dice, the auras of Survivors within 6 meters of you are revealed for 2.5 seconds.

Addon_K34_18.name: Straight Razor
Addon_K34_18.description:
For when a close shave needs to be really, really close.

Slice & Dice attacks inflict the Hemorrhage and Mangled  status effects for 80 seconds.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until healed.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K34_19.name: Hard Hat
Addon_K34_19.description:
Keeps the dome intact while performing high-impact activities.

Performing a Scamper under a pallet breaks it immediately.

Addon_K34_20.name: Mirror Shards
Addon_K34_20.description:
A bunch of shattered mirror pieces that reflect light and shadow, further disorienting the already disoriented.

The Good Guy can see the illusory Footfalls around Survivors.

Addon_K35_01.name: Rabbit's Foot
Addon_K35_01.description:
The unlucky creature’s remains were found by a tree, its intestines wedged between its teeth.

Blood pools appear bright red when charging UVX.

Survivors injured by UVX suffer from the Hemorrhage status effect for 30 seconds.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors.

Addon_K35_02.name: Footprint Cast
Addon_K35_02.description:
The cast sits in the Museum of the Weird in Sarasota, Florida and has long since been debunked.

Decreases the time until the next Hallucination spawns by 15 seconds when a Survivor becomes Weakened.

Weakened Survivors lose health states when hit by UVX’s Blast Area.

Addon_K35_03.name: Blurry Photo
Addon_K35_03.description:
The photo was found at an abandoned campsite. The campers were never seen again.

After Teleporting, regain full movement speed 15% faster.

Addon_K35_04.name: Slashed Backpack
Addon_K35_04.description:
When the hiker was rescued from the mountain pass, she insisted her companion would never wander off alone.

UVX triggers a Blast Area upon contact with Hallucinations.Hallucinations can be destroyed by UVX. Doing so decreases the time until the next Hallucination spawns by 75%.

Addon_K35_05.name: Punctured Eyeball
Addon_K35_05.description:
The station was a scene of madness. The officers had seemingly turned on each other.

Survivors who are both Weakened and injured suffer from the Deep Wound status effect when they Dispel a Hallucination.

Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

Weakened Survivors lose health states when hit by UVX’s Blast Area.

Addon_K35_06.name: Notebook of Theories
Addon_K35_06.description:
His studio apartment was empty and reeked of black mold. The book was the only thing left.

Survivors hit by UVX while it is airborne suffer from the Hindered status effect for an additional 2 seconds.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Addon_K35_07.name: Last Known Recording
Addon_K35_07.description:
She studied musique concrète before she disappeared, her screams the last sound on the tape.

Decreases your Hallucinations’ Aura Range that is visible to Survivors by 25%.

Addon_K35_08.name: Sketch Attempt
Addon_K35_08.description:
The victim’s child was given paper and crayons at the station, while he waited for his father to pick him up.

Survivors hit by UVX's Blast Area suffer from the Oblivious status effect for 20 seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K35_09.name: Victim’s Map
Addon_K35_09.description:
He thought the key to solving the mystery lay beyond the forest, and feared he would never return.

When a Survivor successfully Stares Down The Unknown, The Unknown gains Killer Instinct for 3 seconds.

Addon_K35_10.name: Vanishing Box
Addon_K35_10.description:
The magician was popular at children’s parties, and quickly became the top suspect.

Survivors who complete generators become Weakened against UVX.Increases Hallucination spawn time by 80%.

Weakened Survivors lose health states when hit by the UVX's Blast Area.

Addon_K35_11.name: Front-Page Article
Addon_K35_11.description:
The assailant had torn gaping holes in the walls of the cabin, and drove the family into the woods.

Performing the break interaction on a pallet or breakable wall decreases the time until the next Hallucination spawns by 50%.

Addon_K35_12.name: Hypnotist’s Watch
Addon_K35_12.description:
Hypnotherapy was recommended to recover repressed memories. What emerged from his mind would be his undoing.

Survivors hit by UVX while it is airborne suffer from the Exhausted status effect for 10 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating certain perks.

Addon_K35_13.name: B-Movie Poster
Addon_K35_13.description:
The movie was rumored to be state-funded propaganda, made specifically for something called Project Apple-Pie.

Survivors damaged by UVX's Blast Area suffer from the Broken status effect for 30 seconds.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

Addon_K35_14.name: Device of Undisclosed Origin
Addon_K35_14.description:
Was the thing made on Earth? Or somewhere else entirely?

Survivors entering the Aura Range of a Hallucination suffer from the Oblivious status effect.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K35_15.name: Homemade Mask
Addon_K35_15.description:
The killer had made the mask in the shed in his backyard, where he would bring the others when the sun went down.

Survivors who Dispel Hallucinations suffer from the Blindness status effect for 60 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_K35_16.name: Obscure Game Cartridge
Addon_K35_16.description:
Some maintained Project Apple-Pie evolved over time, turning to new forms of media for results.

Triggers for 20 seconds following a Teleport.Increases the action speed for breaking downed pallets, breakable walls, damaging generators, and vaulting windows by 30%.

Addon_K35_17.name: Discarded Milk Carton
Addon_K35_17.description:
She decided to take the long way home, and waved goodbye to her friends before parting ways.

Doubles the UVX projectile's bounce strength.

Addon_K35_18.name: Serum Vial
Addon_K35_18.description:
The molecular structure of the substance was synthesized in the lab, but its effects could never be replicated.

Survivors within a Hallucination’s Aura Range suffer from the Exhausted status effect for 10 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating certain perks.

Addon_K35_19.name: Captured by the Dark
Addon_K35_19.description:
The documentary purported that the disappearances were linked to small-town cinemas. Audiences left the theater feeling uneasy.

Survivors begin the trial Weakened.Decreases the maximum number of Hallucinations that can be spawned by 1.

Weakened Survivors lose health states when hit by UVX’s Blast Area.

Addon_K35_20.name: Iridescent OSS Report
Addon_K35_20.description:
The report was redacted to the point of being meaningless. But still, theorists tried to extract meaning from it.

Decreases Teleport cooldown by 5 seconds.The Decoy left behind after The Unknown teleports takes 10 seconds longer to disappear.When created, the Decoy has the same Terror Radius and Red Stain as The Unknown.

Addon_K36_01.name: Tattered Headband
Addon_K36_01.description:
An enchanted accessory once owned by a powerful summoner. It still carries a whisper of its former magic.

Increases the distance of Flight of the Damned’s spectral entities by 4 meters.

Addon_K36_02.name: Raven's Feather
Addon_K36_02.description:
A material component most typically used for the Fly spell.

Increases duration of the Fly spell by 0.5 second.

Addon_K36_03.name: Trickster's Glove
Addon_K36_03.description:
A glove once belonging to an arcane trickster whose mastery of Mage Hand clings to its fibers.

Increases the time Mage Hand holds a pallet up by 0.3 second.

Addon_K36_04.name: Crystal Ball
Addon_K36_04.description:
Used by spellcasters for centuries to scry upon friend and foe alike.

When a Survivor is revealed by Dispelling Sphere, the Killer Instinct effect lasts for an additional 1 seconds.

Addon_K36_05.name: Lantern of Revealing
Addon_K36_05.description:
Even those who evade your attacks cannot evade your gaze.

Reveals the aura of Survivors narrowly missed by Flight of the Damned for 3 seconds.

Addon_K36_06.name: Potion of Speed
Addon_K36_06.description:
A curious concoction that downgrades the rules of physics to mere suggestions.

Decreases the period where you cannot attack after casting Fly by 0.1 seconds.

Addon_K36_07.name: Ring of Telekinesis
Addon_K36_07.description:
Its arcane energy crackles to life when its user manipulates objects from afar.

Increases vault speed by 10% for 10 seconds after casting Mage Hand on an upright pallet.

Addon_K36_08.name: Glass Eye
Addon_K36_08.description:
A material component used to cast spells of detection.

Increases the size of Dispelling Sphere by 2 meters and its movement speed by 10%.

Addon_K36_09.name: Ring of Spell Storing
Addon_K36_09.description:
A magical ring that rewards those who are well-prepared.

Decreases the cooldown of all spells by 1 second.

Addon_K36_10.name: Ornate Horn
Addon_K36_10.description:
Once used to rally troops to battle, its very presence brings great armies to bear.

Increases the number of entities created by Flight of the Damned by 1.

Addon_K36_11.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
Addon_K36_11.description:
Its colors are constantly shifting, making you more difficult to detect from afar.

Reduces Terror Radius by 22 meters while the Fly spell is active.

Addon_K36_12.name: Boots of Speed
Addon_K36_12.description:
A simple click of their heels grants their wearer incredible pace.

Casting Mage Hand grants you 3% Haste for 2 seconds.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

Addon_K36_13.name: Staff of Withering
Addon_K36_13.description:
Its necrotic power brings its targets closer to death.

Dispelling Sphere causes the Exhausted status effect for 30 seconds to Survivors who enter its radius.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Addon_K36_14.name: Pearl of Power
Addon_K36_14.description:
Its shimmering face energizes mages who hold it, allowing them to cast more spells.

Reduces the remaining cooldown for your spells by 2 seconds each time you land a basic attack.

Addon_K36_15.name: Robe of Eyes
Addon_K36_15.description:
When worn, none can escape its bearer’s unyielding gaze.

Reveals the auras of Survivors within 6 meters of a Treasure Chest for 4 seconds each time you cast a spell.

Addon_K36_16.name: Dragontooth Dagger
Addon_K36_16.description:
Made from the actual tooth of a dragon, its edge is jagged and cruel.

Applies Hemorrhage and Mangled status effects to Survivors hit with a basic attack while holding a Magic Item for 60 seconds.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K36_17.name: Cloak of Invisibility
Addon_K36_17.description:
A powerful magic item, envied by rogues and the conflict-averse alike.

Gain Undetectable for 20 seconds each time all of your spells are on cooldown at the same time.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K36_18.name: Bag of Holding
Addon_K36_18.description:
The realm itself bends to its astounding capacity, populating trials with even more to take.

Two Treasure Chests are guaranteed to roll 1 on the dice roll.Opening Treasure Chests grants the Oblivious status effect to Survivors for 15 seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing and being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K36_19.name: Vorpal Sword
Addon_K36_19.description:
A powerful magical artifact whose blade has severed many a head from its accompanying body.

Any injured Survivor that enters a Dispelling Sphere screams and gains Broken for 30 seconds.Using the Mage Hand spell on a downed pallet breaks that pallet in 3.2 seconds.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

Addon_K36_20.name: Iridescent Book of Vile Darkness
Addon_K36_20.description:
The ultimate compilation of cruelty, wickedness and depravity.

Using the Fly spell to pass through any vault location blocks that location for Survivors for 45 seconds.Lowers the number of spectral entities created by Flight of the Damned by 3 and makes them fly lower to the ground.

Addon_K37_01.name: Sylph Feather
Addon_K37_01.description:
An enchanted feather that grants its holder great agility.

Breaking a pallet grants The Dark Lord a token. For each token held, Hellfire's cooldown is decreased by 5%, to a maximum of 25%.

Addon_K37_02.name: Ruby Circlet
Addon_K37_02.description:
An enchanted headpiece that brings even the mightiest of flames to heel.

Decreases the cooldown of Hellfire by 10%.

Addon_K37_03.name: Cerberus Talon
Addon_K37_03.description:
A sharp memento from one of Dracula’s most terrifying guards.

Increases the reveal distance of Scent Orb by 100%.

Addon_K37_04.name: Clock Tower Gear
Addon_K37_04.description:
A piece of the great clock tower, a reminder of the inevitability of time itself.

Reduces the cooldown of Shapeshift by 10%.

Addon_K37_05.name: Magical Ticket
Addon_K37_05.description:
A strange artifact once used to transport across Dracula’s castle.

Increases the maximum speed of Teleport by 10%.

Addon_K37_06.name: Moonstone Necklace
Addon_K37_06.description:
A simple necklace by day, but its power comes to life in the dark.

Reduces the size of the Terror Radius in Vampire and Wolf Forms by 4 meters.

Addon_K37_07.name: Blood-Filled Goblet
Addon_K37_07.description:
The blood of his victims sustains him and makes him an even greater hunter.

Increases the duration of Scent Orbs by 50%.

Addon_K37_08.name: Traveler’s Hat
Addon_K37_08.description:
A wide-brimmed hat that once belonged to a well-traveled man.

Increases Shapeshift speed by 10%.

Addon_K37_09.name: Winged Boots
Addon_K37_09.description:
Long used by their wearers to move quickly.

Increases maximum distance of Teleport by 20%.

Addon_K37_10.name: White Wolf Medallion
Addon_K37_10.description:
A trinket once used to call a great spirit guide.

Increases Killer Instinct duration by 40% while in Wolf Form after Survivors complete rushed actions.

Addon_K37_11.name: Killer Doll
Addon_K37_11.description:
One of Dracula’s minions, and a reminder that all are his playthings.

Increases the cooldown reduction of Pounce Attacks from Scent Orbs by 50%.

Addon_K37_12.name: Sunglasses
Addon_K37_12.description:
They protect against bright lights, in addition to looking cool.

Hellfire has 1 extra pillar. Increases Hellfire charging time by 25%.

Addon_K37_13.name: Force of Echo
Addon_K37_13.description:
An artifact that grants bats even greater senses in the dark.

Increases the spawn rate of Scent Orbs by 17%.

Addon_K37_14.name: Pocket Watch
Addon_K37_14.description:
A tool that bends the rules of time itself.

Breaking a pallet or wall resets the Teleport cooldown.

Addon_K37_15.name: Medusa’s Hair
Addon_K37_15.description:
A snakelike memento from one of Dracula’s most ancient and fearsome minions.

All Survivors within 12 meters of your teleport destination suffer from an 8% Hindered status effect for 3 seconds.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Addon_K37_16.name: Warg’s Fang
Addon_K37_16.description:
A mighty tool of destruction taken from one of Dracula’s most dangerous allies.

Reveals the auras of all Survivors whose Scent Orbs you have collected whenever Pounce Attack becomes available for 4 seconds.

Addon_K37_17.name: Cube of Zoe
Addon_K37_17.description:
A strange box whose presence creates something from nothing.

When a generator is completed, creates pillars of Hellfire around The Dark Lord for 10 seconds.

Addon_K37_18.name: Lapis Lazuli
Addon_K37_18.description:
A stone said to bring luck to its holders, or take it from their enemies.

After Teleporting to a window vault, the Entity blocks that window for Survivors for 15 seconds.

Addon_K37_19.name: Alucard’s Shield
Addon_K37_19.description:
A family heirloom that blocks its bearer’s enemies at every turn.

When the gates are opened, pillars of Hellfire continuously spawn within the exit gates.

Addon_K37_20.name: Iridescent Ring of Vlad
Addon_K37_20.description:
A unique relic belonging to Dracula. It is said none can approach The Dark Lord without it.

Hellfire pillars home in on nearby Survivors. Reduces the number of Hellfire pillars by 1.

Addon_K38_01.name: Young Coconut
Addon_K38_01.description:
Her first meal as a castaway, she shared it with her loyal companion.

Increases the Dog's Chase speed by 5%.

Addon_K38_02.name: Sticky Pitch
Addon_K38_02.description:
A vital commodity for keeping a ship in tip-top shape.

Increases The Houndmaster's bonus movement speed gained while running on the Search Path by 2%.

Addon_K38_03.name: Creature's Bone
Addon_K38_03.description:
It was unlike anything she'd ever seen, and the marrow in its bones was delectable.

The Dog's stun duration is reduced by 50%.

Addon_K38_04.name: Trainer's Book
Addon_K38_04.description:
Some of the advice contained within helped strengthen their bond.

Increases Houndsense duration by 35%.

Addon_K38_05.name: Barley Meal
Addon_K38_05.description:
The key ingredient for a bland but reinvigorating porridge.

Increases the Dog's initial Chase distance by 20%.

Addon_K38_06.name: Belaying Pins
Addon_K38_06.description:
Ideal for holding rope, securing knots, and rigging sails.

Survivors revealed by Killer Instinct when entering the Houdsense Radius also become Oblivious for 20 seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K38_07.name: Smoked Snapper
Addon_K38_07.description:
A protein-packed foodstuff, preserved to ensure its quality over long expeditions.

Power cooldown is reduced by 5%.

Addon_K38_08.name: Knotted Rope
Addon_K38_08.description:
The dog's jaws tightened around the makeshift toy, and he thrashed it back and forth.

Reduces the cooldown of basic attacks against Survivors injured while in the Dog's Grab by 2%.

Addon_K38_09.name: Spyglass
Addon_K38_09.description:
Used to spot what one is looking for, no matter how far away.

When Houndsense duration ends, the Survivor's aura is revealed for 3 seconds.

Addon_K38_10.name: Waterskin
Addon_K38_10.description:
She gave him the last of her water, knowing he needed the strength to hunt.

Increases the Dog's Chase redirect distance by 20%.

Addon_K38_11.name: Unfinished Map
Addon_K38_11.description:
Features details on the area that would come to be known as the Bermuda Triangle.

Survivors revealed by Killer Instinct when entering the Houndsense Radius also become Exhausted for 15 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating certain perks.

Addon_K38_12.name: Training Bell
Addon_K38_12.description:
Even over great distances, it will notify a dog exactly where their owner is.

When the Dog is stunned, the responsible Survivor's aura is revealed for 8 seconds.

Addon_K38_13.name: Spiked Collar
Addon_K38_13.description:
A dangerous accessory worn by dogs sent to battle.

Survivors injured while in the Dog's grab suffer from Mangled and Hemorrhage for 60 seconds.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K38_14.name: Fatty Meat
Addon_K38_14.description:
A strange and irresistible treat for a canine friend.

Survivors who are affected by Houndsense periodically scream without notifying The Houndmaster every 15 seconds.

Addon_K38_15.name: Leather Harness
Addon_K38_15.description:
Allows greater control over a dog’s every movement.

Increases the Dog's Chase speed by 20% for 30 seconds after a generator is repaired.This bonus becomes permanent once all generators are repaired.

Addon_K38_16.name: Gunpowder Tin
Addon_K38_16.description:
Useful for all manner of explosive schemes.

Increases the action speed for breaking downed pallets, breakable walls, and damaging generators by 30% for 20 seconds when at least one Survivor becomes affected by Houndsense.

Addon_K38_17.name: Marlinspike
Addon_K38_17.description:
As good for unsplicing rope as it is for causing grievous bodily harm.

Survivors within 20 meters of a Survivor who is Grabbed by the Dog become afflicted with Houndsense.

Addon_K38_18.name: Ship Figurehead
Addon_K38_18.description:
A trophy torn from the bow of another ship.

While the Dog is following The Houndmaster, Terror Radius is increased by 8 meters.While the Dog is away from The Houndmaster, Terror Radius is reduced by 8 meters.

Addon_K38_19.name: Torn Novel
Addon_K38_19.description:
A book given to her by her father. All but destroyed after a raid.

While aiming the Chase Redirect, auras of Survivors within 10 meters of the Dog are revealed.Upon reassuming control of The Houndmaster, Survivors' auras revealed this way are shown for an additional 2 seconds.

Addon_K38_20.name: Iridescent Wheel Handle
Addon_K38_20.description:
Once used to guide a great vessel across the open seas, its remnants now serve as a memory of times past.

Increases the time the Dog lingers at a Search destination by 20%.While the Dog is running to and from the Search destination, The Houndmaster gains the Undetectable status effect.Standing on the Search Path removes the Undetectable status effect.


Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K39_01.name: Kaneki’s Wallet
Addon_K39_01.description:
Lost to a strange boy who happened to bump into him on the street.

Increases the window to perform consecutive Kagune Leaps by 3 second.

Addon_K39_02.name: The Black Goat’s Egg
Addon_K39_02.description:
The book he used to bond with a woman of consequence.

Perfectly timed grab-attacks grant a 100% Bloodpoints bonus.

Addon_K39_03.name: Anteiku Apron
Addon_K39_03.description:
Standard-issue uniform at a lovely little coffee shop.

Decrease the slide after a Kagune Leap by 50%.

Addon_K39_04.name: Fresh Coffee
Addon_K39_04.description:
Every ghoul's favorite drink, the one human delicacy they can consume.

Increases Kagune Leap speed by 14%.

Addon_K39_05.name: Broken Chain
Addon_K39_05.description:
Nothing could restrain him once he finally embraced his full potential.

Decreases Kagune Leap cooldown by 35% when not Enraged.

Addon_K39_06.name: Kaneki's Satchel
Addon_K39_06.description:
Essential gear for any student trying to keep up with their studies.

Increases the speed of the third consecutive Kagune Leap by 30%.

Addon_K39_07.name: Hide’s Headphones
Addon_K39_07.description:
They belonged to his best friend, who he tried to keep safe at all costs.

Survivors affected by Kagune Mark are afflicted with the Oblivious status effect.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing and being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_K39_08.name: Taiyaki
Addon_K39_08.description:
Ghouls can never eat human food, but they can find ways to pretend.

Increases the Enraged Mode countdown by 5 seconds.

Addon_K39_09.name: Blood-Stained Handkerchief
Addon_K39_09.description:
Even a single drop of blood can excite the senses of any gourmet.

Increases the Kagune's reach by 1 meter.

Addon_K39_10.name: Mado’s Glove
Addon_K39_10.description:
A glove worn by a ghoul investigator.

Upon removing Kagune Mark, Survivors suffer from the Exhausted status effect for 15 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Addon_K39_11.name: Hinami’s Umbrella
Addon_K39_11.description:
It was raining the day her mother was viciously taken from her.

Increases the amount of time added to the Enraged countdown for each perfectly timed grab-attack by 10 seconds.

Addon_K39_12.name: Rize's Glasses
Addon_K39_12.description:
They made her look innocent enough, which was exactly what she wanted.

Upon entering Enraged Mode, reveals the auras of any healthy Survivors repairing generators for 8 seconds.

Addon_K39_13.name: Aogiri Tree Robe
Addon_K39_13.description:
Garments worn by an anti-human ghoul organization.

If a generator is completed while The Ghoul is in Enraged Mode, gain the Undetectable status effect for 20 seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K39_14.name: Amon’s Necktie
Addon_K39_14.description:
Cold, calculated, precise. He had a firm grasp of every situation.

While aiming mid-Leap, reveals the auras of pallets and windows within 32 meters.

Addon_K39_15.name: Red Spider Lily
Addon_K39_15.description:
The white flowers turned red as blood.

While in Enraged Mode, base attacks afflict Survivors with the Hemorrhage status effect for 60 seconds.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K39_16.name: CCG ID Card
Addon_K39_16.description:
A card carried by every ghoul investigator.

Performing a Kagune Leap vault reveals the auras of all Kagune Marked Survivors within 24 meters for 3 seconds.

Addon_K39_17.name: Red-Headed Centipede
Addon_K39_17.description:
The thing caused him immeasurable torment.

Vaulting while in Enraged Mode blocks that vault location for 10 seconds.

Addon_K39_18.name: Torture Apparatus
Addon_K39_18.description:
A cutting tool used every time his extremities grew back.

When Enraged Mode ends, The Ghoul gains 5% Haste for 6 seconds.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

Addon_K39_19.name: Yamori’s Mask
Addon_K39_19.description:
Worn by a ghoul from the 13th district whose hobby was torture.

Upon hooking a Survivor while in Enraged Mode, all Survivors further than 40 meters scream and reveal their location for 3 seconds.

Addon_K39_20.name: Iridescent Eye Patch
Addon_K39_20.description:
An innocent way to hide his true nature from the world.

Performing a pallet vault on your third consecutive Kagune Leap while in Enraged Mode destroys the pallet.

Addon_K40_01.name: Help Wanted Ad
Addon_K40_01.description:
We all need a little help sometimes...

While winding up an axe throw, see a preview of the starting trajectory.

Addon_K40_02.name: Security Guard’s Badge
Addon_K40_02.description:
The badge comes with certain privileges for whoever carries it.

When exiting a Security Door after a teleport, gain the Undetectable status effect for 50% longer.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K40_03.name: Restaurant Menu
Addon_K40_03.description:
The lamination is peeling and crusty. How appetizing.

Decreases the minimum time required to retrieve an axe embedded in the environment by 20%.

Addon_K40_04.name: Rotten Pizza
Addon_K40_04.description:
Food poisoning is no laughing matter.

Increases the duration of Killer Instinct from the Axe's area of effect by 100%.

Addon_K40_05.name: Ripped Curtain
Addon_K40_05.description:
Taken from Pirates Cove, caught on the animatronic that lived there.

When an Axe hits a Survivor, they gain the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effects for 60 seconds.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured Survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_K40_06.name: Greasy Paper Plate
Addon_K40_06.description:
It sticks to everything it touches. No amount of soap can wash it off.

Increases the time required for Survivors to remove the Axe by 15%.

Addon_K40_07.name: Streamers
Addon_K40_07.description:
Employees would throw them over the rafters for a quick decoration.

Increases the speed at which you travel through Security Doors by 20%.

Addon_K40_08.name: Party Hat
Addon_K40_08.description:
The party never ends, no matter how much they beg.

When an Axe is embedded in the environment:Increases its area of effect radius to 250% over 3 seconds.Decreases the duration of the area of effect by 50%.

Addon_K40_09.name: Office Phone
Addon_K40_09.description:
He tried to leave messages as a warning. He didn't last long, either.

Survivors within 24 meters of a Survivor with an embedded Axe gain the Oblivious and - if injured - Broken status effects. Reveals the aura of the Axe to Survivors within this range.

Decreases the time required to remove the Axe from another Survivor by 50%.Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

Addon_K40_10.name: Chica’s Bib
Addon_K40_10.description:
A good way to keep Mr. Cupcake from making a mess.

Survivors within the Axe's area of effect gain the Exhausted status effect for 5 seconds.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Addon_K40_11.name: Bonnie’s Guitar Strings
Addon_K40_11.description:
Worn strings that are off-tune and liable to snap.

Unlocks potential in one’s aura reading ability.

While moving between Security Doors, the repair progress of generators can be determined by the intensity of their auras.

Decreases the duration of the Undetectable status effect upon exiting the Security Door by 50%.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K40_12.name: Foxy’s Hook
Addon_K40_12.description:
A pirate’s hook that seems more menacing than playful.

Players within range of the Axe's area of effect gain 7% Haste for 3 seconds.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

Addon_K40_13.name: Purple Guy Drawing
Addon_K40_13.description:
He only takes 10 seconds to draw!

While a Survivor has an Axe embedded in them, any rushed interactions they perform reveal their aura to you for 3 seconds.

Removing the Axe from themselves reveals their aura to you for 6 seconds.

Addon_K40_14.name: Freddy’s Hat
Addon_K40_14.description:
Gabriel trusted the wrong grown-up. Now he's the star of the show.

Increases the Axe's weight while throwing by 100%.

Addon_K40_15.name: Loot Bag
Addon_K40_15.description:
Open the bag, and see what goodies are inside.

While a Survivor has an Axe embedded in them: Exit gates will be blocked for them and any Survivors within 12 meters.

Addon_K40_16.name: Access Panel
Addon_K40_16.description:
Gaining control over the security doors is key to getting the job done.

Your Axe gains the ability to travel through Security Doors, and will exit straight through the connected Security Door.

When aiming your Axe:Gain Killer Instinct on Survivors within 4 meters of any Security Door.Reveals the auras of all Security Door numbers.

Addon_K40_17.name: Celebrate! Poster
Addon_K40_17.description:
The celebration lasts all night long, or until no one is left.

While the Axe is embedded in a Survivor, all players within 32 meters gain 12% Haste and vault 20% faster.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

Addon_K40_18.name: Faz-Coin
Addon_K40_18.description:
Collecting these tokens comes with a price.

Upon throwing the Axe, it gains a Terror Radius of 24 meters until it is reclaimed. You gain the Undetectable status effect for 10 seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_K40_19.name: Endo CPU
Addon_K40_19.description:
Greater computing power, for greater efficacy.

While within the Axe's area of effect, pallets, breakable doors, and generators break 25% faster. This effect lingers for 5 seconds after leaving the area of effect.

Addon_K40_20.name: Iridescent Remnant
Addon_K40_20.description:
Molten metal - in the right hands, it's the key to immortality.

Upon moving to a Security Door, upright pallets within 32 meters of the destination Door are blocked for 12 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_AkitosCrutch.name: Akito's Crutch
Addon_Kanobo_AkitosCrutch.description:
The crutch used by Kazan's son after falling from a tree. Akito's playmate and her family were punished for the boy's injury.

Increases movement speed of Demon Dash by 13%.

Addon_Kanobo_BlackenedToenail.name: Blackened Toenail
Addon_Kanobo_BlackenedToenail.description:
Fell off during one of Kazan's hundred winter treks to the temple. Despite his pilgrimage, Akito's leg would never heal.

Increases movement speed while absorbing Blood Orbs by 0.4 m/s.

Addon_Kanobo_BloodySash.name: Bloody Sash
Addon_Kanobo_BloodySash.description:
Blood from a boy who called Kazan The Imposter Noble. Kazan hid evidence of the fight from his father, often reveling at the sash in secret.

Increases movement speed while absorbing Blood Orbs by 0.7 m/s.

Addon_Kanobo_ChildsWoodenSword.name: Child's Wooden Sword
Addon_Kanobo_ChildsWoodenSword.description:
Akito's practice sword. The child had little use for it after his injury.

Increases Blood Orb aura reading range by 3 meters.

Addon_Kanobo_ChippedSaihai.name: Chipped Saihai
Addon_Kanobo_ChippedSaihai.description:
A baton that belonged to Renjiro, it was stolen by Kazan upon his departure.

Increases Blood Fury duration by 6 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_CrackedSakazuki.name: Cracked Sakazuki
Addon_Kanobo_CrackedSakazuki.description:
A cup from Kazan's wedding ceremony, it never made it through the night before being damaged.

Decreases Blood Fury activation time by 0.5 seconds.Decreases Blood Fury cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_InkLion.name: Ink Lion
Addon_Kanobo_InkLion.description:
An ink painting that once hung in the Yamaoka estate. Depicts the story of a lion eaten by mice.

Decreases Blood Fury activation time by 0.5 seconds.Decreases Blood Fury cooldown by 0.5 seconds.Decreases Blood Fury consumption when downing a Survivor by 2 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_KanaianzenTalisman.name: Kanai-anzen Talisman
Addon_Kanobo_KanaianzenTalisman.description: A trinket given to Kazan at birth, its powers are meant to protect his family from harm.Increases movement speed of Demon Dash by 8%.

Addon_Kanobo_LionFang.name: Lion Fang
Addon_Kanobo_LionFang.description: A tooth sold from an exotic vendor, it symbolizes power and nobility.Increases Blood Fury duration by 10 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_PaperLantern.name: Paper Lantern
Addon_Kanobo_PaperLantern.description:
Perhaps a memento of simpler times, before rage fully enveloped him.

Increases Blood Orb absorption speed by 4 m/s.

Addon_Kanobo_PolishedMaedate.name: Polished Maedate
Addon_Kanobo_PolishedMaedate.description:
A horned crest Kazan tore from his helmet after being compared to a demon.

Increases Yamaoka's Wrath passive charge rate by 50%.

Addon_Kanobo_RenjirosBloodyGlove.name: Renjiro’s Bloody Glove
Addon_Kanobo_RenjirosBloodyGlove.description:
The glove Renjiro held to his sternum following the strike dealt by his son.

All Survivors can see Blood Orbs at the same distance as you.A Survivor's aura is revealed for 2 seconds when coming into contact with a Blood Orb.

Addon_Kanobo_RottingRope.name: Rotting Rope
Addon_Kanobo_RottingRope.description:
Had the rope been stronger, it would have likely held Kazan. As it was, he escaped and butchered his captors.

Increases Blood Orb aura reading range by 2 meters.

Addon_Kanobo_ScalpedTopknot.name: Scalped Topknot
Addon_Kanobo_ScalpedTopknot.description:
The topknot of a samurai who questioned Kazan's honor. The roots cling to a thin strip of bloody skin.

Decreases time to activate Demon Dash by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_ShatteredWakizashi.name: Shattered Wakizashi
Addon_Kanobo_ShatteredWakizashi.description: The fragments of an ancestral blade, destroyed by Kazan in a fit of rage.Increases Yamaoka's Wrath passive charge rate by 100%.

Addon_Kanobo_SplinteredHull.name: Splintered Hull
Addon_Kanobo_SplinteredHull.description:
Fragments of a ship that carried Renjiro Yamaoka. Against all odds, the legendary samurai seemed to survive.

Increases the frequency of Blood Orbs dropped by Survivors by 33%.Survivors drop an additional Blood Orb when they vault, throw pallets, exit lockers, crouch, or fail a skill check.

Addon_Kanobo_TearSoakedTenugui.name: Tear Soaked Tenugui
Addon_Kanobo_TearSoakedTenugui.description:
The cloth that Kazan's mother cried into when he left on his pilgrimage to cleanse the samurai.

Decreases Blood Fury consumption when downing a Survivor by 4 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_WoodenOniMask.name: Wooden Oni Mask
Addon_Kanobo_WoodenOniMask.description:
A mask that a young Kazan bought to celebrate Setsubun, its repulsively fanged mouth began haunting his nightmares.

Increases the frequency of Blood Orbs dropped by Survivors by 14%.Survivors drop an additional Blood Orb when they vault, throw pallets, exit lockers, crouch, or fail a skill check.

Addon_Kanobo_YamaokaFamilyCrest.name: Iridescent Family Crest
Addon_Kanobo_YamaokaFamilyCrest.description:
A crest that denotes its owner as being a part of the Yamaoka family.

Miss a charged attack during Blood Fury to smash the ground and create a shock wave. Any Survivors within 24 meters will scream and reveal their current location to you for 4 seconds.

Addon_Kanobo_YamaokaSashimono.name: Yamaoka Sashimono
Addon_Kanobo_YamaokaSashimono.description:
The banner of the Yamaoka family, Kazan felt an overwhelming pride from it.

Increases Blood Fury duration by 8 seconds.

Addon_Key_001.name: Prayer Rope
Addon_Key_001.description:
Tightly knitted rope used in praying rituals. Can be attached to the Key.

Adds 10 seconds of use to the Key.

Addon_Key_002.name: Prayer Beads
Addon_Key_002.description:
A chain of matte beads of various sizes used in praying rituals. Can be attached to the Key.

Adds 15 seconds of use to the Key.

Addon_Key_003.name: Eroded Token
Addon_Key_003.description:
A heavily worn out token made of brass. If an inscription or drawing was once engraved in it, it has today completely disappeared. Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the Key's aura reading ability.

Reveals Survivor auras when within 24 meters.

Addon_Key_004.name: Gold Token
Addon_Key_004.description:
A gold token with a dull appearance. Both faces are smooth and void of any inscriptions. Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the key's aura reading ability.

Reveals Survivor auras when within a 48 meter range.

Addon_Key_005.name: Blood Amber
Addon_Key_005.description:
A blood-red amber striped with black veins. The amber is warm to the touch. Can be attached to the Key using its jump ring to channel the key's aura reading ability.

Reveals the Killer's aura within a 32 meter range.Increases the Key's energy usage by 100%.

Addon_Key_006.name: Milky Glass
Addon_Key_006.description:
This opaque piece of glass emits a dull vibrating noise. When the Key is used to unlock the Hatch, the glass token protects the Key from breaking, channeling The Fog's energy into the glass.

Do not lose the Key when unlocking the Hatch, lose this add-on instead.

Addon_Key_007.name: Weaved Ring
Addon_Key_007.description:
A mundane key ring in appearance with an unusual bluish dark sheen. The ring binds the Key to the user, preventing its loss even in the darkest of times.

Do not lose the Key on death, lose this add-on instead.

Addon_Key_008.name: Scratched Pearl
Addon_Key_008.description:
A porous and scratched white pearl. A minuscule jump ring allows the pearl to be attached to the Key.

Increases the range of the Key's aura reading ability by 12 meters.

Addon_Key_WeddingRing.name: Unique Wedding Ring
Addon_Key_WeddingRing.description: An engraved wedding ring that emerged from The Fog and resonates with an indescribable and incomprehensible energy. Reveals the Obsession's aura at all times, without the need to channel the Key's energy.Decreases your chances to be The Killer’s Obsession.
