ADDON_Lastbreath_AtaxicRespiration.name: Ataxic Respiration
ADDON_Lastbreath_AtaxicRespiration.description:
The irregular and deteriorating breath collected from the catatonic boy. Normally stable and calm, becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.

Decreases base Blink fatigue duration by 7%.

ADDON_Lastbreath_BadManLastBreath.name: "Bad Man's" Last Breath
ADDON_Lastbreath_BadManLastBreath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum patient "the Bad Man." In the hands of The Nurse, it jolts with intensity.

Hitting a survivor with a successful Blink Attack grants the Nurse Undetectable for 25 seconds. This effect may be only triggered once every 45 seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

ADDON_Lastbreath_DullBracelet.name: Dull Bracelet
ADDON_Lastbreath_DullBracelet.description:
A worthless piece of jewelry that might have had an important significance to someone. Taken from the anxious girl's body.

Decreases maximum Blink distance by 20%.Increases Bloodpoints for Precise Blink score events by 100%.

ADDON_Lastbreath_HeavyPanting.name: Heavy Panting
ADDON_Lastbreath_HeavyPanting.description:
The slow and bulging breath stolen from the orderly. Dimly oscillates at The Nurse's touch.

Extends the duration of a lunge after more than one Blink by 30%.

ADDON_Lastbreath_JennerLastBreath.name: Jenner's Last Breath
ADDON_Lastbreath_JennerLastBreath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum patient Mary Jenner. In the hands of The Nurse, it trembles with intensity.

Once The Nurse has exhausted all of her Blinks, allows The Nurse to immediately Blink back to her original position by pressing the Active Ability Button.Must be triggered before The Nurse succumbs to fatigue.After returning to her original position, The Nurse will have one Blink charge ready.

ADDON_Lastbreath_KavanaghLastBreath.name: Kavanagh's Last Breath
ADDON_Lastbreath_KavanaghLastBreath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum orderly Harvey Kavanagh. In the hands of The Nurse, it wobbles with intensity.

When succumbing to fatigue, any Survivors within 8 meters of The Nurse are afflicted with the Blindness status effect for 60 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

ADDON_Lastbreath_Matchbox.name: Matchbox
ADDON_Lastbreath_Matchbox.description:
A matchbox containing an odd collection of mismatched buttons. Serves as a reminder of a horrible place.

Sets maximum number of Blink charges to 1.Increases The Nurse's base movement speed to 4.4 m/s.

ADDON_Lastbreath_SpasmodicBreath.name: Spasmodic Breath
ADDON_Lastbreath_SpasmodicBreath.description:
The twitchy and tremulous breath stolen from the "Bad Man." Aggressively pulses and jumps at The Nurse's touch.

Hitting a survivor with a successful Blink Attack disables the ability to Blink and increases the Nurse's base movement speed to 4.6 m/s for 60 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_AwardWinningChili.name: Award-Winning Chili
ADDON_LFChainsaw_AwardWinningChili.description:
A big bowl of spicy chili made famous thanks to prime meat.

Increases maximum Chainsaw Sweep duration by 0.2 seconds per charge spent.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_BeastsMarks.name: The Beast's Marks
ADDON_LFChainsaw_BeastsMarks.description:
Jagged marks cover the Chainsaw's body, punishment from the dark beast that lives in The Fog. Memories of violent reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.

Increases Chainsaw Sweep movement speed by 2%.Increases time required to charge the Chainsaw by 12%.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_BegrimedChain.name: Begrimed Chains
ADDON_LFChainsaw_BegrimedChain.description:
This chain is stained with a foul substance that debilitates anyone it touches.

Chainsaw hits cause Survivors to drop their items.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_CarburatorGuide.name: Carburetor Tuning Guide
ADDON_LFChainsaw_CarburatorGuide.description:
A crudely drawn guide to properly adjust and tune a Chainsaw carburetor.

Automatically consume all charges when triggering a Chainsaw Sweep.Increases Chainsaw Sweep duration by 0.5 seconds.Decreases Chainsaw Sweep movement speed by 2%.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_ChainsawFile.name: Chainsaw File
ADDON_LFChainsaw_ChainsawFile.description:
A file whose purpose is to hone Chainsaw chains.

Decreases tantrum duration by 0.25 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_Chili.name: Chili
ADDON_LFChainsaw_Chili.description:
A big bowl of steaming chili to keep you fresh and strong.

Increases maximum Chainsaw Sweep duration by 0.15 seconds per charge spent.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_DepthGaugeRake.name: Depth Gauge Rake
ADDON_LFChainsaw_DepthGaugeRake.description:
Tool that increases the angle of the depth gauge, making the chain eat more "wood".

Grants 1 additional Chainsaw charge.Increases time required to charge the Chainsaw by 22%.Decreases Chainsaw Sweep movement speed by 2%.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_GrislyChains.name: Grisly Chain
ADDON_LFChainsaw_GrislyChains.description:
A chain with unusually hefty cutter teeth that leaves victims crippled even after being healed.

Chainsaw hits inflict Mangled for 70 seconds.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_HomemadeMuffler.name: Homemade Muffler
ADDON_LFChainsaw_HomemadeMuffler.description:
A makeshift exhaust system made of black gas pipes.

Decreases tantrum duration by 0.5 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_IridescentFlesh.name: Iridescent Flesh
ADDON_LFChainsaw_IridescentFlesh.description:
A thin slice of smooth, young flesh. The veins shimmer with luminescent glow, as if life still flows within.

Hitting a Survivor with the Chainsaw replenishes its charges.Limits the maximum tantrum duration to 3 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_KnifeScratches.name: Knife Scratches
ADDON_LFChainsaw_KnifeScratches.description:
Scratches cover the Chainsaw's body, caused by a searing blade. Memories of reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.

Increases Chainsaw Sweep movement speed by 1.5%.Increases time required to charge the Chainsaw by 10%.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_LightChassis.name: Light Chassis
ADDON_LFChainsaw_LightChassis.description:
A light and durable Chainsaw chassis with a shorter guide bar. Makes the Chainsaw easier to handle.

While revving, see the auras of Survivors within 8 meters.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_LongGuideBar.name: Long Guide Bar
ADDON_LFChainsaw_LongGuideBar.description:
A sturdy iron replacement bar for long chains.

Increases the time the Chainsaw can be revved before triggering a tantrum by 2 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_PrimerBulb.name: Primer Bulb
ADDON_LFChainsaw_PrimerBulb.description:
Pumps more gas in the ignition system to ensure a quick and powerful start.

Decreases time required to replenish a charge by 1 second.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_RustedChain.name: Rusted Chain
ADDON_LFChainsaw_RustedChain.description:
This chain is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.

Chainsaw hits inflict Broken for 90 seconds.

Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_ShopLubricant.name: Shop Lubricant
ADDON_LFChainsaw_ShopLubricant.description:
An oil specifically formulated for chainsaws. A special additive prevents oil throw off.

Downing a Survivor with the Chainsaw while no other Survivors are in your Terror Radius will hide the Survivor's aura for 20 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_SparkPlug.name: Spark Plug
ADDON_LFChainsaw_SparkPlug.description:
A clean spark plug fitted for a Chainsaw.

Decreases time required to replenish a charge by 0.5 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_SpeedLimiter.name: Speed Limiter
ADDON_LFChainsaw_SpeedLimiter.description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.

Chainsaw does not automatically trigger dying state.Get 100% more Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit score events.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_TheGrease.name: The Grease
ADDON_LFChainsaw_TheGrease.description:
A thick yellowish ooze, concocted by the Sawyers. Used for all-purpose lubrication around their house.

Increases the time the Chainsaw can be revved before triggering a tantrum by 3 seconds.

ADDON_LFChainsaw_VegetableOil.name: Vegetable Oil
ADDON_LFChainsaw_VegetableOil.description:
A rancid oil used as a poor quality lubricant.

Decreases Chainsaw cooldown by 0.3 seconds.

Addon_Map_001.name: Map Addendum
Addon_Map_001.description:
A fragmented piece of a thick fibrous material. A partial and faded Map is drawn on it which by itself is useless.

Adds a 5 second charge to any Map.

Addon_Map_002.name: Retardant Jelly
Addon_Map_002.description:
A slimy, translucent substance with a ghastly lavender shade. This jelly from unknown origin is highly resistant to heat.

Slows down the burning rate of the Map by 20%.

Addon_Map_003.name: Glass Bead
Addon_Map_003.description:
A strange bead circled with gold that can be used to magnify the Map and mark a specific position. The bead emits an energy which can be felt and seen by Survivors.

Unlocks the marker ability on the Secondary Action button.Creates a marker that can be seen by all Survivors.

Addon_Map_004.name: Crystal Bead
Addon_Map_004.description:
An intricate set of lenses wrapped up in an astonishingly complex apparatus. The gears controlling the lenses' focus move by themselves as to focus on something invisible to humans.

Every Survivor sees the aura generated by the Map when the owner activates it.

Addon_Map_005.name: Odd Stamp
Addon_Map_005.description:
A stamp carved out of sturdy blonde wood. The text found at the base is incomprehensible: "kw'zvre'od". Can be used with a Map.

Increases the range of the Map tracking ability by 12 meters.

Addon_Map_006.name: Unusual Stamp
Addon_Map_006.description:
A wooden stamp with a crosshatched rubber pad used to mark documents. It is unclear as to how or by whom this stamp was originally used. Can be used with a Map.

Increases the range of the Map tracking ability by 8 meters.

Addon_Map_007.name: Black Silk Cord
Addon_Map_007.description:
A smooth black cord with a soft appearance. Can be tied around a Map to enhance its aura reading ability.

Unlocks the ability to track the Hatch.

Addon_Map_008.name: Red Twine
Addon_Map_008.description:
A bristly and rough piece of twine of a deep red color. Can be tied around a Map to enhance its aura reading ability.

Unlocks the ability to track the Killer's belongings.

Addon_Map_009.name: Yellow Wire
Addon_Map_009.description:
A small electrical wire. Both ends are heavily damaged like it has been forcefully torn out of its intended location. Can be tied around a Map to enhance its aura reading ability.

Unlocks the ability to track exit gates.

Addon_Medkit_001.name: Bandages
Addon_Medkit_001.description:
A pack of bandages usually found in first aid kits.

Adds 8 charges to the Med-kit.

Addon_Medkit_002.name: Gel Dressings
Addon_Medkit_002.description:
A pack of gel forming pads used to patch up heavily exudating wounds.

Adds 16 charges to the Med-kit.

Addon_Medkit_003.name: Medical Scissors
Addon_Medkit_003.description:
Scissors designed to easily cut through textiles.

Increases healing speed by 10%.

Addon_Medkit_004.name: Butterfly Tape
Addon_Medkit_004.description:
Medical quality tape used to close small wounds.

Increases healing speed by 5%.

Addon_Medkit_005.name: Sponge
Addon_Medkit_005.description:
A mundane sponge used to soak up extra blood, providing easier access to wounds.

Increases the Bonus skill check size by 20%.

Addon_Medkit_006.name: Rubber Gloves
Addon_Medkit_006.description:
Disposable medical gloves to avoid cross-contamination.

Increases the Bonus skill check size by 10%.

Addon_Medkit_007.name: Styptic Agent
Addon_Medkit_007.description:
A white powder with coagulant properties. Apply the agent to a wound to stop it from hemorrhaging.

Press the Secondary Action button while healing with the Med-kit to use the Styptic Agent.When the Styptic Agent is used on an injured Survivor, they gain Endurance for 5 seconds.Consumes the Med-kit on use.

Endurance prevents a Survivor from being downed, inflicting Deep Wound instead.

Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

Addon_Medkit_008.name: Anti-Hemorrhagic Syringe
Addon_Medkit_008.description:
An anti-hemorrhagic substance that stops the bleeding in a matter of seconds.

Press the Secondary Action button while healing with the Med-kit to use the Anti-Hemorrhagic Syringe.The affected Survivor will gain a health state 16 seconds after use.The time required is modified by perks, items and add-ons that affect Healing Speeds.This effect is canceled when the affected Survivor changes health state or is picked up.Consumes the Med-kit on use.

ADDON_medkit_abdominaldressing.name: Abdominal Dressing
ADDON_medkit_abdominaldressing.description:
A highly absorbent pad that prevents bodily fluid leakage when applied to large abdominal wounds.

Increases healing speed by 15%.

Addon_Medkit_BlightedSyringe.name: Refined Serum
Addon_Medkit_BlightedSyringe.description:
A refined version of the putrid serum that’s mostly safe for human consumption. Mostly.

Press the Secondary Action button while healing with the Med-kit to use the Refined Serum.Grants the Survivor 5% Haste and increases their field of view by 10 degrees for 20 seconds.Creates a blight trail behind the Survivor.Consumes the Med-kit on use.

ADDON_medkit_gauzeroll.name: Gauze Roll
ADDON_medkit_gauzeroll.description:
A sterile gauze used for a variety of wounds. Part of a total wound care system.

Adds 10 charges to the Med-kit.

ADDON_medkit_needleandthread.name: Needle & Thread
ADDON_medkit_needleandthread.description:
Not exactly a medical device, however it can be used to quickly and painfully close up a wound.

Increases the chances of triggering a Skill Check by 10%.Increases progression bonus for succeeding Great Skill Checks by 5%.

ADDON_medkit_selfadherentwrap.name: Self Adherent Wrap
ADDON_medkit_selfadherentwrap.description:
A pack of bandages that sticks to themselves without the need of clips for a faster patch-up that requires less readjustments.

Adds 8 charges to the Med-kit.Increases healing speed by 5%.

ADDON_medkit_surgicalsuture.name: Surgical Suture
ADDON_medkit_surgicalsuture.description:
A medical device used to close and hold body tissue. Even though it's very effective, the surgical suture is challenging to use.

Increases the chances of triggering a Skill Check by 15%.Increases progression bonus for succeeding Great Skill Checks by 10%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_BloodiedMud.name: Bloodied Mud
Addon_PhantomTrap_BloodiedMud.description:
A handful of mud with veins of deep crimson. The bloody layers empower the mud.

Decreases Phantasm Trap trigger range by 30%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_BloodiedWater.name: Bloodied Water
Addon_PhantomTrap_BloodiedWater.description:
Tainted water contained in a folded waterlily leaf.

Decreases Phantasm Trap trigger range by 20%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_BogWater.name: Bog Water
Addon_PhantomTrap_BogWater.description:
Murky water contained in a glass pill bottle from another time.

Decreases Phantasm Trap trigger range by 10%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_CrackedTurtleEgg.name: Cracked Turtle Egg
Addon_PhantomTrap_CrackedTurtleEgg.description:
A pale orange turtle egg, cracked and emptied of its content.

Increases triggered Phantasm Trap duration by 30%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_CypressNecklet.name: Cypress Necklet
Addon_PhantomTrap_CypressNecklet.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with crudely attached cypress bark and swamp moss.

Increases Phantasm Trap setting speed by 15%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_DeadFlyMud.name: Dead Fly Mud
Addon_PhantomTrap_DeadFlyMud.description:
A small lump of mud, black with the remains of flies. Devoured to increase stamina.

Increases teleportation range by 10%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_DisfiguredEar.name: Disfigured Ear
Addon_PhantomTrap_DisfiguredEar.description:
The cannibal village deaf boy's ear. Deformed due to several hits to the head. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.

Survivors who trigger a Phantasm Trap will be deafened for 6 seconds.

Addon_PhantomTrap_DragonflyWings.name: Dragonfly Wings
Addon_PhantomTrap_DragonflyWings.description:
A handful of yellowish wings, dry and crisp. Devoured to increase stamina.

Increases teleportation range by 12.5%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_DriedCicada.name: Dried Cicada
Addon_PhantomTrap_DriedCicada.description:
A large swamp cicada covered in a fine layer of ash. Crispy. Devoured to increase stamina.

Increases teleportation range by 15%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_GranmasHeart.name: Granma's Heart
Addon_PhantomTrap_GranmasHeart.description:
The cold heart of the cannibal village elder. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.

Decreases Terror Radius to 0 meters when a Survivor triggers a Phantasm Trap.Increases Mud Phantasms' Terror Radius by 16 meters.

Addon_PhantomTrap_HalfEggshell.name: Half Eggshell
Addon_PhantomTrap_HalfEggshell.description:
One half of a perfectly round hollow eggshell.

Increases triggered Phantasm Trap duration by 25%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_MintRag.name: Mint Rag
Addon_PhantomTrap_MintRag.description:
A small piece of cotton torn from the dress worn by Lisa Sherwood on the day she disappeared. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.

The Hag can teleport to any Phantasm Trap in the level.Phantasm Trap teleport gains a cooldown of 10 seconds.

Addon_PhantomTrap_PowderedEggshell.name: Powdered Eggshell
Addon_PhantomTrap_PowderedEggshell.description:
Minuscule eggshell fragments shimmering with a pale golden hue.

Increases triggered Phantasm Trap duration by 20%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_PussyWillowCatkins.name: Pussy Willow Catkins
Addon_PhantomTrap_PussyWillowCatkins.description:
A handful of small, pristine flower clusters covered in a fine greyish fur.

Reveals the Survivor's aura for 3 seconds when they trigger a Phantasm Trap.

Addon_PhantomTrap_RopeNecklet.name: Rope Necklet
Addon_PhantomTrap_RopeNecklet.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants.

Increases Phantasm Trap setting speed by 10%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_RustyShackles.name: Rusty Shackles
Addon_PhantomTrap_RustyShackles.description:
Shackles once used to hold prisoners and carcasses in the cannibal village cellar. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.

Triggered Phantasm Traps give no indication of being triggered to Survivors and do not spawn a Mud Phantasm.

Addon_PhantomTrap_ScarredHand.name: Scarred Hand
Addon_PhantomTrap_ScarredHand.description:
The cut up, severed hand of the cannibal village butcher. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.

Mud Phantasms become solid and will block Survivors.Removes the ability to teleport to traps.Grants 300% bonus Deviousness Bloodpoints.

Addon_PhantomTrap_SwampOrchidNecklet.name: Swamp Orchid Necklet
Addon_PhantomTrap_SwampOrchidNecklet.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with withered orchid petals and leaves.

Increases Phantasm Trap setting speed by 20%.

Addon_PhantomTrap_WaterloggedShoe.name: Waterlogged Shoe
Addon_PhantomTrap_WaterloggedShoe.description:
A child's shoe, long lost in the bog's waters. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.

Survivors in the trigger zone of a triggered Phantasm Trap are Hindered by 9%.Increases movement speed by 7.5%.Removes the ability to teleport to traps.

Hindered reduces Survivor movement speed.

Addon_PhantomTrap_WillowWreath.name: Willow Wreath
Addon_PhantomTrap_WillowWreath.description:
Three frail willow branches attached to form a triangular wreath.

Reveals the Survivor's aura for 5 seconds when they trigger a Phantasm Trap.

Addon_PhaseWalker_BloodyHairBrooch.name: Mother's Glasses
Addon_PhaseWalker_BloodyHairBrooch.description:
Pair of glasses belonging to a loving mother afflicted with a chronic disease.

Survivors trigger Killer Instinct when they come within 2 meters of the husk.

Addon_PhaseWalker_DirtyUwabaki.name: Uchiwa
Addon_PhaseWalker_DirtyUwabaki.description:
Handheld fan with a koi motif to create a nice breeze on a hot summer day.

Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting when stunned by a pallet.

Addon_PhaseWalker_DriedCherryBlossom.name: Dried Cherry Blossom
Addon_PhaseWalker_DriedCherryBlossom.description:
A crumbling, dried cherry flower. Once the symbol of mortality.

Survivors trigger Killer Instinct when they come within 3 meters of The Spirit while she is phasing.Scratch marks are no longer visible while using Yamaoka’s Haunting.

Addon_PhaseWalker_FathersGlasses.name: Kintsugi Teacup
Addon_PhaseWalker_FathersGlasses.description:
Cup mended and lacquered with powdered gold. Both the breakage and repair are part the cup.

Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting after breaking a pallet or wall.

Addon_PhaseWalker_GiftedBambooComb.name: Gifted Bamboo Comb
Addon_PhaseWalker_GiftedBambooComb.description:
A narrow tooth bamboo comb to gently untangle disheveled hair.

Increases Yamaoka's Haunting charge speed by 15%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_JuniperBonsai.name: Juniper Bonsai
Addon_PhaseWalker_JuniperBonsai.description:
Dark blue-green foliage bonsai tree. Once the symbol of Yamaoka family tradition.

Increases Passive Phasing frequency by 20%.Increases Passive Phasing duration by 50%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_KaiunTalisman.name: Kaiun Talisman
Addon_PhaseWalker_KaiunTalisman.description:
A talisman to get luck on your side.

Increases Yamaoka's Haunting duration by 25%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_KatanaTsuba.name: Katana Tsuba
Addon_PhaseWalker_KatanaTsuba.description:
The handguard of an ancestral blade. Crafted for the Yamaoka family.

Increases Yamaoka's Haunting reappearance duration by 20%.Increases Yamaoka's Haunting reappearance movement speed by 5%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_KatsumoriTalisman.name: Senko Hanabi
Addon_PhaseWalker_KatsumoriTalisman.description:
Thin sparklers that light up summer nights and display the beauty of ephemeral moments in life.

When Yamaoka's Haunting ends, The Spirit's husk explodes and any vault locations within 4 meters are blocked for 5 seconds.

Addon_PhaseWalker_MotherDaughterRing.name: Mother-Daughter Ring
Addon_PhaseWalker_MotherDaughterRing.description:
A silver ring engraved with “for my precious daughter.”

Increases Yamaoka's Haunting movement speed by 25%.Scratch marks are no longer visible while using Yamaoka’s Haunting.

Addon_PhaseWalker_MuddySportsDayCap.name: Muddy Sports Day Cap
Addon_PhaseWalker_MuddySportsDayCap.description:
A muddy sport cap with a High School logo. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Rin".

Increases Yamaoka's Haunting movement speed by 10%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_OrigamiCrane.name: Origami Crane
Addon_PhaseWalker_OrigamiCrane.description:
One of the one thousand orizuru for your wish to come true.

Increases Yamaoka's Haunting recharge rate by 20%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_PrayerBeadsBracelet.name: Furin
Addon_PhaseWalker_PrayerBeadsBracelet.description:
Warm summer breeze chimes the little bell hanging from the balcony ceiling.

The phasing sound is heard by all Survivors.

Addon_PhaseWalker_RinsBrokenWatch.name: Rin's Broken Watch
Addon_PhaseWalker_RinsBrokenWatch.description:
A wristwatch with a shattered glass. The name "Rin" is scribbled on the wristband.

Increases Yamaoka's Haunting recharge rate by 30%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_RustyFlute.name: Rusty Flute
Addon_PhaseWalker_RustyFlute.description:
A rusty transverse flute with a haunting sound.

Increases Yamaoka's Haunting recharge rate by 40%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_ShiawaseAmulet.name: Shiawase Amulet
Addon_PhaseWalker_ShiawaseAmulet.description:
A talisman that makes one happy and enthusiastic.

Increases Yamaoka's Haunting duration by 15%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_WakizashiSaya.name: Wakizashi Saya
Addon_PhaseWalker_WakizashiSaya.description:
The scabbard of an ancestral blade. Once crafted for the Yamaoka family.

During Yamaoka's Haunting, use the Active Ability Button to return to the husk and end the haunting.

Addon_PhaseWalker_WhiteHairRibbon.name: White Hair Ribbon
Addon_PhaseWalker_WhiteHairRibbon.description:
A silken bow to tame wild hair.

Increases Yamaoka's Haunting charge speed by 20%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_YakuyokeAmulet.name: Yakuyoke Amulet
Addon_PhaseWalker_YakuyokeAmulet.description:
A powerful talisman to protect your endeavors from being hindered by suspicious circumstances.

Increases Yamaoka's Haunting duration by 70%.Decreases Yamaoka's Haunting movement speed by 15%.

Addon_PhaseWalker_Zori.name: Zōri
Addon_PhaseWalker_Zori.description:
A comfortable pair of flat sandals that can easily be slipped on and off.

Increases Yamaoka's Haunting movement speed by 5%.

Addon_Plague_AshenApple.name: Ashen Apple
Addon_Plague_AshenApple.description:
A peeled apple rolled into sanctified ashes. Eating such a fruit warded off the malignantly envious spirits of the deceased.

Start the Trial with 1 additional Pool of Devotion already corrupted.Increases the number of Pools of Devotion in the trial by 1.

Addon_Plague_BlackIncense.name: Black Incense
Addon_Plague_BlackIncense.description:
A dark paste made of sharp osseous shavings. The inhaling of its foul fumes sharpens the mind's eye.

Survivors' auras are revealed to you for 3 seconds when they vomit.

Addon_Plague_DevoteesAmulet.name: Devotee's Amulet
Addon_Plague_DevoteesAmulet.description:
A bloodstone amulet carved intricately with the effigy of the Babylonian god of mayhem and pestilence. Fills the wearer with boundless devotion.

Increases duration of Corrupt Purge by 20 seconds.

Addon_Plague_EmeticPotion.name: Emetic potion
Addon_Plague_EmeticPotion.description:
A mustard-water based syrup that induces vomiting when consumed. Used to purge evil from the body.

Increases the effectiveness of Vile Purge by 30%.

Addon_Plague_ExorcismAmulet.name: Exorcism Amulet
Addon_Plague_ExorcismAmulet.description:
An obsidian amulet to ward off sickness during exorcism rituals. Inscribed with a prayer to the god of mayhem and pestilence. Fills the wearer with fierce devotion.

Increases the duration of Corrupt Purge by 10 seconds.

Addon_Plague_HealingSalve.name: Healing Salve
Addon_Plague_HealingSalve.description:
A bitterly pungent paste of crushed roots, which were marinated in fish brine for three days and in wine for two. Applied on skin rashes.

Decreases cooldown of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by 0.25 seconds.

Addon_Plague_HematiteSeal.name: Hematite Seal
Addon_Plague_HematiteSeal.description:
A cylindrical seal forged from a metallic hardstone, engraved with bird-headed beings that stood next to strange machines. Used as a container for sanctified ashes.

Increases object infection duration by 30 seconds.

Addon_Plague_IncensedOintment.name: Incensed Ointment
Addon_Plague_IncensedOintment.description:
A dark waxy paste, laced with cedar sap that diffuse a sweet and earthy aroma. Applied directly on infected skin.

Ingesting the corruption at a Pool of Devotion causes all Survivors within The Plague's Terror Radius to scream and reveal their locations.

Addon_Plague_InfectedEmetic.name: Infected Emetic
Addon_Plague_InfectedEmetic.description:
A disgusting syrup of unknown origin. The thick yellow liquid is consumed to induce vomiting. Used to purge evil from the body.

Increases the effectiveness of Vile Purge by 40%.

Addon_Plague_IridescentSeal.name: Iridescent Seal
Addon_Plague_IridescentSeal.description:
A translucent cylindrical seal molded from The Fog Itself with the effigy of The Plague. Its surface is warm and pulsates with The Entity's power.

Corrupt Purge activates every time a generator is completed.Decreases duration of Corrupt Purge by 20 seconds.

Addon_Plague_LimestoneSeal.name: Limestone Seal
Addon_Plague_LimestoneSeal.description:
A cylindrical seal made from porous stone that displays a ritualistic scene with winged deities.

Increases object infection duration by 20 seconds.

Addon_Plague_OlibanumIncense.name: Olibanum Incense
Addon_Plague_OlibanumIncense.description:
Precious resin extracted from Boswellia trees, used during ceremonies for their sweet citrusy fragrance.

Survivors who cleanse at fountains have their auras revealed for 4 seconds.

Addon_Plague_PotentTincture.name: Potent Tincture
Addon_Plague_PotentTincture.description:
A frothing, murky liquid that permeates the air with an acute aroma of herbs and alcohol. Applied directly on blisters.

Decreases cooldown of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by 0.4 seconds.

Addon_Plague_PrayerApple.name: Blessed Apple
Addon_Plague_PrayerApple.description:
A perfectly ripe fruit to break fast during the purification ceremony. Delicious.

Start the Trial with 1 additional Pool of Devotion already corrupted.

Addon_Plague_PrayerTabletFragment.name: Prayer Tablet Fragment
Addon_Plague_PrayerTabletFragment.description:
A fragmented stone tablet with a corrupted incantation originally used to purge illnesses and feelings of general malaise.

Vile Purge no longer affects Survivors.Increases object infection duration by 40 seconds.Increases infection from infected objects by 100%.Increases Devious Bloodpoints by 100%.

Addon_Plague_ProphylacticAmulet.name: Prophylactic Amulet
Addon_Plague_ProphylacticAmulet.description:
A soapstone amulet crudely engraved with a winged deity that wards off sickness. Fills the wearer with devotion.

Decreases the number of Pools of Devotion in the Trial by 2.

Addon_Plague_RubbingOil.name: Rubbing Oil
Addon_Plague_RubbingOil.description:
A beaker of rubbing oil with expectorant quality. Exudes the evergreen scent of laurel and rosemary.

Increases the charge rate of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by 50%.

Addon_Plague_SeveredToe.name: Severed Toe
Addon_Plague_SeveredToe.description:
The decaying severed toe of Adiris, weaved on a thread and worn as an amulet around the neck. Radiates with vile power.

Increases infection rate for Survivors who are performing interactions by 50%.

Addon_Plague_VileEmetic.name: Vile Emetic
Addon_Plague_VileEmetic.description:
A foul-smelling and half-congealed potion of unidentifiable ingredients. Consumed to rapidly induce vomiting. Used to purge evil from the body.

Increases velocity of vomit projectiles by 10%.

Addon_Plague_WorshipTablet.name: Worship Tablet
Addon_Plague_WorshipTablet.description:
A stone tablet adorned with gold showing the drawings and writings of a corrupted incantation used originally to worship forgotten deities.

Increases speed of ingesting corruption at a Pool of Devotion by 100%.Increases movement speed while holding Corrupt Purge by 4.5%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_AmandasLetter.name: Amanda's Letter
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_AmandasLetter.description:
A blackmailing letter for the attention of Amanda. Fills the reader with rage and focus.

While crouched, reveals auras of Survivors within 16 meters.Decreases available Reverse Bear Traps by 2.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_AmandasSecret.name: Amanda's Secret
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_AmandasSecret.description:
A black metal box containing a knife and various medical supplies, such as bandages and compresses. Deep cuts reduce stress and awaken the senses.

Gain a notification when a Survivor removes a Reverse Bear Trap.Auras of Survivors removing a Reverse Bear Trap are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_BagofGears.name: Bag of Gears
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_BagofGears.description:
A few mechanical parts that allow the creation of challenging Jigsaw Boxes and easier to install Reverse Bear Traps.

Increases Reverse Bear Trap setting speed by 50%.Increases time required to search a Jigsaw Box by 17%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_CombatStraps.name: Combat Straps
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_CombatStraps.description:
Leather straps that hold fabric in place for nimbler movement.

Increases crouching and uncrouching speed by 10%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_CrateofGears.name: Crate of Gears
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_CrateofGears.description:
This collection of mechanical parts allows the creation of extra-challenging Jigsaw Boxes and Reverse Bear Traps that are easier to install.

Increases Reverse Bear Trap setting speed by 50%.Increases time required to search a Jigsaw Box by 33%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_FaceMask.name: Face Mask
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_FaceMask.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap: The heavy cloth face mask, laced with a sedative, partially suffocates the target making it hard to concentrate.

Reverse Bear Traps inflict Blindness until removed.Does not affect the Jigsaw Box aura.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_InterlockingRazor.name: Interlocking Razor
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_InterlockingRazor.description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box: The addition of interlocking razor blades makes it impossible to move suddenly in the Jigsaw Box without suffering the consequences.

Failing a Jigsaw Box skill check while injured will inflict Deep Wound on Survivor.

Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_JigsawsAnnotatedPl.name: Jigsaw's Annotated Plan
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_JigsawsAnnotatedPl.description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design laid down on paper and annotated by Jigsaw.

Increases available Reverse Bear Traps by 1.Increases Reverse Bear Trap death timer by 10 seconds.Whenever a generator is completed, 10 seconds is removed from the death timer of all active Reverse Bear Traps.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_JigsawsSketch.name: Jigsaw's Sketch
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_JigsawsSketch.description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design sketched in details on a sheet of paper.

Increases available Reverse Bear Traps by 1.When a Survivor with a Reverse Bear Trap is working on a generator, that generator's yellow aura is revealed to you.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_JohnMedicalFile.name: John's Medical File
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_JohnMedicalFile.description:
The medical file of a cancerous man. Fills the reader with dread and recklessness.

Increases crouched move speed by 10%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_LastWill.name: Last Will
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_LastWill.description:
A latched wooden box with a satin lining, offered as part of a last will.

Increases Ambush attack movement speed by 6%.Increases time to charge Ambush attack by 33%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_RazorWires.name: Razor Wires
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_RazorWires.description:
A modification to the Jigsaw Box: The addition of razor-sharp wires makes it extra difficult and potentially painful to search.

Jigsaw Box skill check success zones are smaller.Failing a Jigsaw Box skill check while uninjured will injure the Survivor.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_RuleSetN2.name: Rule Set No.2
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_RuleSetN2.description:
Not all games need to have the same rules.

Disables the Survivors' ability to see Jigsaw Boxes highlighted until their Trap is activated.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_RustyAttachments.name: Rusty Attachments
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_RustyAttachments.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap: Mouth spikes, covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.

Reverse Bear Traps inflict Mangled for 70 seconds.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_ShatteredSyringe.name: Shattered Syringe
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_ShatteredSyringe.description:
Symbol of a broken way of life. Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.

Decreases Ambush attack miss cooldown by 10%.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_SlowReleasingToxin.name: Slow-Release Toxin
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_SlowReleasingToxin.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap: A poison that is not fatal but weakens the body and makes it nearly impossible to recover fully from any effort.

Reverse Bear Traps inflict Exhausted until removed.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_TamperedTimer.name: Tampered Timer
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_TamperedTimer.description:
A timer that has been fiddled with. A spring in the mechanism forces the gears to turn faster.

Decreases the Reverse Bear Trap death timer by 20 seconds.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_UtilityBlades.name: Utility Blades
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_UtilityBlades.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap: Sharp blades attached to the trap's interior lacerate the victim with every movement.

Reverse Bear Traps inflict Hemorrhage every time the Survivor is injured by any means.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until healed.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_VideoTape.name: Video Tape
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_VideoTape.description:
A recording of Jigsaw, explaining the game's rules to Amanda. Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.

Survivors begin the trial with Reverse Bear Traps installed.

Addon_ReverseBearTrap_WorkshopGrease.name: Workshop Grease
Addon_ReverseBearTrap_WorkshopGrease.description:
A simple tube of grease, used to lubricate the mechanisms of the hidden blade.

Increases Ambush attack charge speed by 50%.Decreases Ambush attack miss cooldown by 10%.

Addon_Rush_AdrenalineVial.name: Adrenaline Vial
Addon_Rush_AdrenalineVial.description:
A hormone removed from an unwilling subject’s adrenal gland. Though it provides a jolt of energy, it can fatigue its user.

Increases maximum Rush tokens by 2.Increases maximum look angle while Rushing by 20 degrees.Decreases Rush turn rate by 55%.Increases Rush speed by 5%.

Addon_Rush_AlchemistsRing.name: Alchemist’s Ring
Addon_Rush_AlchemistsRing.description:
A ring given to chemists graduating from the London School of Medicine. It’s a reminder of unrestrained ambition.

Increases Rush duration by 20% for each consecutive Rush.

Addon_Rush_BlightedCrow.name: Blighted Crow
Addon_Rush_BlightedCrow.description:
A dead crow that has been grotesquely mutated by blight serum.

Increases speed while Rushing by 3% for each consecutive Rush.

Addon_Rush_BlightedRat.name: Blighted Rat
Addon_Rush_BlightedRat.description:
A rat that briefly returned to life when injected with serum, becoming aggressive and uncontrollable.

Increases speed while Rushing by 2% for each consecutive Rush.

Addon_Rush_CankerThorn.name: Canker Thorn
Addon_Rush_CankerThorn.description:
A sizable thorn snipped from a visceral canker. It secretes a mild toxin.

Decreases recovery time after Rushing by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_Rush_ChippedMonocle.name: Chipped Monocle
Addon_Rush_ChippedMonocle.description:
A monocle Talbot rarely used despite his eyesight weakening in later years.

Displays the target location of a Slam.

Addon_Rush_CompoundSeven.name: Compound Seven
Addon_Rush_CompoundSeven.description:
This early sample failed to achieve desired results but demonstrated surprising effects regardless.

Automatically face the nearest Survivor within 16 meters after a Slam.

Addon_Rush_CompoundThirtyThree.name: Compound Thirty-Three
Addon_Rush_CompoundThirtyThree.description:
Talbot’s penultimate attempt at a serum. Though it did not facilitate his escape, it did have powerful side effects.

Rush cannot be performed more than 5 times.Increases Rush turn rate by 11%.Increases Rush duration by 11%.

Addon_Rush_CompoundTwentyOne.name: Compound Twenty-One
Addon_Rush_CompoundTwentyOne.description:
A serum that's fatal to humans. It evokes beneficial qualities in those who are... something more.

Reveals the auras of all Survivors within 8 meters for 3 seconds after a Slam.

Addon_Rush_Foxglove.name: Foxglove
Addon_Rush_Foxglove.description:
A poisonous plant that sparked Talbot’s interest in chemistry. It rekindles deeply buried memories.

Decreases Rush recovery time by 0.25 seconds.

Addon_Rush_IridescentBlightTag.name: Iridescent Blight Tag
Addon_Rush_IridescentBlightTag.description:
A glass-like laboratory tag, molded from The Fog itself. Either a gift from The Entity or a cruel jest to tag The Blight as he once did to others.

Rush cannot be performed more than 3 times.Increases maximum Rush look angle by 20 degrees.Increases Rush speed by 10%.

Addon_Rush_PlaceboTablet.name: Placebo Tablet
Addon_Rush_PlaceboTablet.description:
A pill that’s utterly ineffective... or is it?

Decreases movement speed while Rushing by 15%.Gain 100% bonus Bloodpoints on Rush score events.

Addon_Rush_PlagueBile.name: Plague Bile
Addon_Rush_PlagueBile.description:
A sample of The Plague’s bile, distilled and treated with a mixture of chemicals.

Increases turn rate while Rushing by 10%.

Addon_Rush_PustulaDust.name: Pustula Dust
Addon_Rush_PustulaDust.description:
Dried pustula petals ground into a fine dust.

Increases maximum Slam duration by 0.75 seconds.

Addon_Rush_RoseTonic.name: Rose Tonic
Addon_Rush_RoseTonic.description:
A mixture made with dried roses from the exceedingly rare New Moon Bouquet.

Increases maximum Slam duration by 1 second.

Addon_Rush_ShreddedNotes.name: Shredded Notes
Addon_Rush_ShreddedNotes.description:
The remnants of Talbot’s notes, they still contain some valuable information within.

Decreases time to recharge a Rush token by 0.33 seconds.

Addon_Rush_SoulChemical.name: Soul Chemical
Addon_Rush_SoulChemical.description:
A chemical squeezed from the pineal gland of a recently deceased Survivor.

Increases the initial Rush speed by 5%.

Addon_Rush_SummoningStone.name: Summoning Stone
Addon_Rush_SummoningStone.description:
Talbot used this stone to carve what he believed was his research into the opium den’s walls.

Increases the initial Rush duration by 0.5 seconds.

Addon_Rush_UmbraSalts.name: Umbra Salts
Addon_Rush_UmbraSalts.description:
Regular sea salt that has momentarily passed through the spirit world, altering its properties in the process.

Increases turn rate while Rushing by 15%.

Addon_Rush_VigosJournal.name: Vigo's Journal
Addon_Rush_VigosJournal.description:
The journal of a man who claimed to have returned from the Void. The knowledge within has practical applications.

Grants Undetectable while Rushing.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, terror radius and red stain.

Addon_Spark_CalmClassI.name: "Calm" - Class I
Addon_Spark_CalmClassI.description:
An ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illness. With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause mild anxiety in the patient.

Increases Terror Radius by 4 meters while Static Blast is ready.Decreases Terror Radius by 4 meters while Static Blast is on cooldown.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

Madness II: Intermittently causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.Madness III: Constantly causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.

Addon_Spark_CalmClassII.name: "Calm" - Class II
Addon_Spark_CalmClassII.description:
A risky ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illness. With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause moderate anxiety in the patient.

Increases Terror Radius by 6 meters while Static Blast is ready.Decreases Terror Radius by 6 meters while Static Blast is on cooldown.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

Madness II: Intermittently causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.Madness III: Constantly causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.

Addon_Spark_CalmMuYisNotes.name: "Calm" - Carter's Notes
Addon_Spark_CalmMuYisNotes.description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself. Uses a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illness. With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure causes uncontrollable fear and anxiety in the patient.

Increases Terror Radius by 8 meters while Static Blast is ready.Decreases Terror Radius by 8 meters while Static Blast is on cooldown.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

Madness II: Intermittently causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.Madness III: Constantly causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius.

Addon_Spark_DisciplineClassII.name: "Discipline" - Class II
Addon_Spark_DisciplineClassII.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at high voltage. Can cause a state of moderate paranoia in the patient.

Decreases the detonation delay of Shock Therapy by 10%.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

Madness II: While in a chase, Survivors perceive an illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them. This effect persists for 6 seconds after the chase ends.Madness III: Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius are constantly active.The Doctor also sees the illusionary Red Stain.

Addon_Spark_DisciplineClassIII.name: "Discipline" - Class III
Addon_Spark_DisciplineClassIII.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at very high voltage. Can cause a state of serious paranoia in the patient.

Decreases the detonation delay of Shock Therapy by 15%.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

Madness II: While in a chase, Survivors perceive an illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them. This effect persists for 6 seconds after the chase ends.Madness III: Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius are constantly active.The Doctor also sees the illusionary Red Stain.

Addon_Spark_DisciplineMuYisNotes.name: "Discipline" - Carter's Notes
Addon_Spark_DisciplineMuYisNotes.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself. The intolerably high voltage leaves the patient in a severe state of paranoia.

Decreases the detonation delay of Shock Therapy by 20%.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

Madness II: While in a chase, Survivors perceive an illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them. This effect persists for 6 seconds after the chase ends.Madness III: Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius are constantly active.The Doctor also sees the illusionary Red Stain.

Addon_Spark_HighStimulusElectrode.name: High Stimulus Electrode
Addon_Spark_HighStimulusElectrode.description:
An experimental electrode that can withstand very-high charges for a longer period of time.

Increases the range of Shock Therapy by 4 meters.

Addon_Spark_IridescentGeneral.name: Iridescent King
Addon_Spark_IridescentGeneral.description:
A glass-like king chess piece molded from The Fog Itself. The Entity's trace reverberating within can break the most powerful minds.

Survivors with Madness status effect suffer from the following Afflictions: Calm, Discipline, Order, and Restraint.Causes Survivors to hear a distant illusionary Terror Radius. The effect is intermittent in Madness II and constant in Madness III.While in a chase, Survivors perceive an illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius as though The Doctor were directly behind them. This effect persists for 6 seconds after the chase ends in Madness II and is constantly active in Madness III.Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached. A new illusionary pallets is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.Increases the duration of illusionary Doctor hallucinations by 6 seconds.The Doctor sees illusionary Red Stains as well as the auras of illusionary Doctors and illusionary pallets.

Addon_Spark_JadeCharm.name: Iridescent Queen
Addon_Spark_JadeCharm.description:
A glass-like queen chess piece molded from The Fog itself. It can't be touched without receiving a considerable jolt of electricity.

All Survivors struck by Shock Therapy or Static Blast acquire a lingering Static Charge. The Static Charge remains with The Survivor(s) until discharged.Multiple Survivors struck by the same Shock Therapy or Static Blast that are within 4 meters of each other do not acquire a Static Charge.Any time a Survivor is within 4 meters of another Survivor carrying a Static Charge, the Survivor receives a shock identical to Shock Therapy and the Static Charge is discharged immediately.

Addon_Spark_MoldyElectrode.name: Moldy Electrode
Addon_Spark_MoldyElectrode.description:
A moldy electrode which nevertheless conducts a weak electrical current.

Increases the range of Shock Therapy by 2 meters.

Addon_Spark_NanmuCatapult.name: Maple Knight
Addon_Spark_NanmuCatapult.description:
A white knight chess piece made of maple. This gift from an old man brings back distant memories and imbues The Doctor with devastating focus.

Reveals the area of effect of Shock Therapy.

Addon_Spark_Obedience_MuYisNotes.name: Scrapped Tape
Addon_Spark_Obedience_MuYisNotes.description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing mostly white noise. Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.

Changes the shape of Shock Therapy to a ring with a range of 8 meters, a radius of 4 meters, and a thickness of 1 meter.

Addon_Spark_OrderClassI.name: "Order" - Class I
Addon_Spark_OrderClassI.description:
A conventional ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute. Can cause a state of mild confusion in the patient.

Decreases Static Blast cooldown by 2 seconds.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:

Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached.A new illusionary pallet is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary pallets.

Addon_Spark_OrderClassII.name: "Order" - Class II
Addon_Spark_OrderClassII.description:
A high stimulus ECT procedure, part of a patient daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute. Can cause a state of moderate confusion in the patient.

Decreases Static Blast cooldown by 2.5 seconds.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:

Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached.A new illusionary pallet is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary pallets.

Addon_Spark_OrderMuYisNotes.name: "Order" - Carter's Notes
Addon_Spark_OrderMuYisNotes.description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself. The long, constant stimulus leaves the patient in a state of severe confusion.

Decreases Static Blast cooldown by 3 seconds.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:

Broken pallets may appear to be replaced with illusionary pallets that persist until approached.A new illusionary pallet is generated at the location of a random broken pallet every 20 seconds.The Doctor sees the auras of illusionary pallets.

Addon_Spark_PolishedElectrode.name: Polished Electrode
Addon_Spark_PolishedElectrode.description:
A like-new electrode, standard equipment to conduct electroconvulsive treatments.

Increases the range of Shock Therapy by 3 meters.

Addon_Spark_RestraintClassII.name: "Restraint" - Class II
Addon_Spark_RestraintClassII.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog. Uses a wavelength that links the patient's and Doctor's minds. This procedure is known to cause mild cases of hallucinations in the patient.

Reveals Survivors' auras for 1 second when their Madness level increases.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

Increases the duration of illusionary Doctor hallucinations by 6 seconds.Allows The Doctor to see the auras of hallucinations at any level of Madness.

Addon_Spark_RestraintClassIII.name: "Restraint" - Class III
Addon_Spark_RestraintClassIII.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog. Uses a high stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and Doctor's minds. This procedure is known to cause serious cases of hallucinations in the patient.

Reveals Survivors' auras for 2 seconds when their Madness level increases.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

Increases the duration of illusionary Doctor hallucinations by 6 seconds.Allows The Doctor to see the auras of hallucinations at any level of Madness.

Addon_Spark_RestraintMuYisNotes.name: "Restraint" - Carter's Notes
Addon_Spark_RestraintMuYisNotes.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog, crudely annotated. Uses an unbearable stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and Doctor's minds. This procedure is known to cause severe cases of hallucinations in the patient.

Reveals Survivors' auras for 3 seconds when their Madness level increases.

Survivors with Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

Increases the duration of illusionary Doctor hallucinations by 6 seconds.Allows The Doctor to see the auras of hallucinations at any level of Madness.

Addon_Spark_TigerFangCharm.name: Interview Tape
Addon_Spark_TigerFangCharm.description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing an un-edited interview of a victim. Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.

Shock Therapy special ability changes from a cone to a beam with a 24 meter range and a 2 meter width.

Addon_Stalker_BlondHair.name: Blond Hair
Addon_Stalker_BlondHair.description:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.

Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 10 seconds.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

Addon_Stalker_BoyfriendsMemo.name: Boyfriend's Memo
Addon_Stalker_BoyfriendsMemo.description:
A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.

Increases the range of The Shape's lunge attack while in Evil Within I by 50%.

Addon_Stalker_DeadRabbit.name: Dead Rabbit
Addon_Stalker_DeadRabbit.description:
A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.

Decreases Terror Radius in Evil Within II by 25%.Increases Terror Radius in Evil Within III by 25%.

Addon_Stalker_FragrantTuftOfHair.name: Fragrant Tuft of Hair
Addon_Stalker_FragrantTuftOfHair.description:
A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp. Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance.

Unlimited duration of Evil Within III.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II by 400%.

Addon_Stalker_GlassFragment.name: Glass Fragment
Addon_Stalker_GlassFragment.description:
A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object. It is impossible to determine its origin.

Stalking a Survivor for at least 1 second while in Evil Within I reveals that Survivor's aura for 3 seconds.

Addon_Stalker_HairBow.name: Hair Bow
Addon_Stalker_HairBow.description:
A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.

Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 30 seconds.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

Addon_Stalker_HairBrush.name: Hair Brush
Addon_Stalker_HairBrush.description:
A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.

Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 20 seconds.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

Addon_Stalker_Jewelry.name: Jewelry
Addon_Stalker_Jewelry.description:
A large necklace made of beads and inexpensive metals. One of Judith's favorites.

Increases movement speed while stalking by 20%.

Addon_Stalker_JewelryBox.name: Jewelry Box
Addon_Stalker_JewelryBox.description:
A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.

Increases movement speed while stalking by 30%.

Addon_Stalker_JMyersMemorial.name: J.Myers Memorial
Addon_Stalker_JMyersMemorial.description:
A glossy page ripped from the '65 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.

Increases the rate at which evil is gained when stalking by 25%.

Addon_Stalker_JudithsJournal.name: Judith's Journal
Addon_Stalker_JudithsJournal.description:
A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers. Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.

You become obsessed with one Survivor.Increases the rate at which evil is gained when stalking your Obsession by 40%.

Addon_Stalker_JudithsTombstone.name: Judith's Tombstone
Addon_Stalker_JudithsTombstone.description:
A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers.

Unlocks the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors with Evil Within III.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II by 400%.Decreases movement speed by 9% while Evil Within III is active.

Addon_Stalker_LockOfHair.name: Lock of Hair
Addon_Stalker_LockOfHair.description:
A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic.

Increases the duration of Evil Within III by 40 seconds.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II for the first time by 50%.

Addon_Stalker_MemorialFlower.name: Memorial Flower
Addon_Stalker_MemorialFlower.description:
A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.

Increases the rate at which evil is gained when stalking by 11%.

Addon_Stalker_MirrorShard.name: Mirror Shard
Addon_Stalker_MirrorShard.description:
A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.

Stalking a Survivor for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II reveals that Survivor's aura for 5 seconds.

Addon_Stalker_ReflectiveFragment.name: Reflective Fragment
Addon_Stalker_ReflectiveFragment.description:
A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.

Stalking a Survivor for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II reveals that Survivor's aura for 2 seconds.

Addon_Stalker_ScratchedMirror.name: Scratched Mirror
Addon_Stalker_ScratchedMirror.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.

Evil Within I reveals Survivors' auras when stalking within a 32 meter range.Evil Within cannot progress past TIER I.Decreases movement speed by 4.5%.For each Hit score event, score 100% Bloodpoints in the Brutality category and an additional 200% Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.

Addon_Stalker_TackyEarrings.name: Tacky Earrings
Addon_Stalker_TackyEarrings.description:
A very cheap piece of jewelry made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.

Increases movement speed while stalking by 10%.

Addon_Stalker_TombstonePiece.name: Tombstone Piece
Addon_Stalker_TombstonePiece.description:
A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.

Unlocks the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors with Evil Within III.Killing a Survivor drains the power of Evil Within.Increases the amount of evil required to reach Evil Within III from Evil Within II by 300%.

Addon_Stalker_VanityMirror.name: Vanity Mirror
Addon_Stalker_VanityMirror.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.

Evil Within II reveals Survivors' auras when stalking within a 16 meter range.Evil Within cannot progress past TIER II.For each Hit score event, grant 100% Bloodpoints in the Brutality category and an additional 150% Bloodpoints in the Deviousness category.

Addon_TheOnryo_01.name: Videotape Copy
Addon_TheOnryo_01.description:
A copy of the deadly videotape imprinted upon by Sadako. It dampens the desire for vengeance.

Increases the range at which Survivors gain Condemned from Projection by 2 meters

Addon_TheOnryo_02.name: Old Newspaper
Addon_TheOnryo_02.description:
It tells of a local woman who predicted a volcanic eruption, evidence used to initially find Sadako.

Increases the Manifestation invisibility duration by 33%.

Addon_TheOnryo_03.name: Cabin Sign
Addon_TheOnryo_03.description:
The cabin where both Tomoko and Reiko watched the tape. Carries the memory of those first curses.

Decreases the time it takes for a TV to turn on after Projection by 4.5 seconds.

Addon_TheOnryo_04.name: Mother's Mirror
Addon_TheOnryo_04.description:
A mirror from Sadako's mother's house. A reminder of what Sadako has lost.

Increases the Manifestation intermittent visibility duration by 2 seconds.

Addon_TheOnryo_05.name: Reiko's Watch
Addon_TheOnryo_05.description:
The watch that Reiko left her son Yoichi. A distracting and constant reminder of one’s impending doom.

Increases the invisibility duration while Demanifested by 25%.

Addon_TheOnryo_06.name: Sea-Soaked Cloth
Addon_TheOnryo_06.description:
The hood worn by the mysterious figure in the tape. Makes those near it unable to trust what they see.

While Survivors are within 8 meters of a powered TV, they are afflicted with the Blindness status effect. This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_TheOnryo_07.name: Clump of Hair
Addon_TheOnryo_07.description:
Once beautiful and long, Sadako now hides behind her ragged, matted locks.

Decreases the range at which The Onryō is visible while Demanifested by 6 meters.

Addon_TheOnryo_08.name: Well Stone
Addon_TheOnryo_08.description:
A piece of the well where Sadako was trapped, an image burned into the mind of all those who have watched the tape.

Decreases the time it takes for a TV to turn on after being turned off by a Survivor by 7 seconds.

Addon_TheOnryo_09.name: Yoichi's Fishing Net
Addon_TheOnryo_09.description:
The net Yoichi used while fishing with his grandfather. A reminder that death comes to us all.

Survivors with at least 4 stacks of Condemned suffer from Blindness.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Addon_TheOnryo_10.name: Rickety Pinwheel
Addon_TheOnryo_10.description:
A pinwheel found in the caves of Izu Oshima. It spins even when there is no wind, disorienting those who see or hear it.

While Survivors are within 8 meters of a powered TV, they are afflicted with the Oblivious status effect. This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

Addon_TheOnryo_11.name: Well Water
Addon_TheOnryo_11.description:
Water from the well where Sadako was left to die. Murky and black, it obscures everything around it.

Increases the duration of the Undetectable status effect by 2 seconds when Manifesting by any means.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Addon_TheOnryo_12.name: Ring Drawing
Addon_TheOnryo_12.description:
A drawing of the view from inside the well, as drawn by a young Yoichi. Helping those cursed by the tape can only bring misfortune.

When hooking a Survivor carrying a tape, other Survivors gain 1 Condemned stack.

Addon_TheOnryo_13.name: Bloody Fingernails
Addon_TheOnryo_13.description:
Sadako's bloody fingernails, lost as she tried to claw her way out of the well. Evidence of her single-minded need to kill.

Increases the duration of Projection’s bonus movement speed by 50%.

Addon_TheOnryo_14.name: Mother's Comb
Addon_TheOnryo_14.description:
The comb Sadako's mother used in the tape. Sadako's psychic abilities are enhanced when she focuses on it.

Turning off a TV will trigger a loud noise notification.Reveals the yellow aura of any TV that is turned off by any means.

Addon_TheOnryo_15.name: VCR
Addon_TheOnryo_15.description:
The original VCR that played Sadako's tape. It is still warm to the touch.

All TVs play the Projection effects when The Onryō Projects to a TV.

Addon_TheOnryo_16.name: Distorted Photo
Addon_TheOnryo_16.description:
Those who have watched the tape find all photos of them distorted, a reminder of their impending doom.

Survivors witnessing a Manifestation from within 16 meters will scream, and then their auras are shown for 4 seconds.

Addon_TheOnryo_17.name: Telephone
Addon_TheOnryo_17.description:
After watching the video, victims receive a phone call. They are frozen in fear as they realize they have seven days to live.

Manifestation afflicts Survivors within 7 meters with a 3% Hindered status effect for 3 seconds.

Hindered reduces survivor movement speed.

Addon_TheOnryo_18.name: Tape Editing Deck
Addon_TheOnryo_18.description:
The editing deck used by Reiko and Ryuji to analyze and copy the tape. Copying and sharing the tape is the only way to survive the curse.

Each Survivor starts the trial with a Tape in their possession, and their target TV is the furthest from their location.Anytime a Survivor inserts a tape in their target TV, reveal their aura for 6 seconds

Addon_TheOnryo_19.name: Remote Control
Addon_TheOnryo_19.description:
A remote for the VCR at the cabin. It allows Sadako to focus on those enemies at a distance.

After using Projection, the Auras of Survivors who are within 12 meters of a powered TV are revealed to you for 7 seconds.

Addon_TheOnryo_20.name: Iridescent Videotape
Addon_TheOnryo_20.description:
The original tape containing Sadako’s curse.

Projection does not turn off TVs, and does not apply Condemned.Increases the time it takes for a TV to turn on after being turned off by Survivors by 20%

Addon_Toolbox_001.name: Scraps
Addon_Toolbox_001.description:
Springs, screws and gears. Mostly unusable junk.

Adds 8 charges to the Toolbox.

Addon_Toolbox_002.name: Wire Spool
Addon_Toolbox_002.description:
A portable but heavy spool of copper wire.

Adds 12 charges to the Toolbox.

Addon_Toolbox_003.name: Clean Rag
Addon_Toolbox_003.description:
A mundane rag. Suspiciously clean.

Increases the Toolbox's repair speed by 20%.

Addon_Toolbox_004.name: Grip Wrench
Addon_Toolbox_004.description:
An adjustable wrench with a tough grip. Essential in any Toolbox.

Hooks sabotaged using the Toolbox take an extra 20 seconds to respawn.

Addon_Toolbox_005.name: Hacksaw
Addon_Toolbox_005.description:
A small hand saw mounted with a metal cutting blade.

Increases the Toolbox's sabotage speed by 30%.

Addon_Toolbox_006.name: Protective Gloves
Addon_Toolbox_006.description:
Thick gloves which reduce manual dexterity but protect hands from injury.

Prevents the Killer from being notified when sabotaging a hook with the Toolbox.

Addon_Toolbox_007.name: Brand New Part
Addon_Toolbox_007.description:
This intricate mechanical part feels oddly out of place. It is clean and shiny as if straight out of the factory.

Toolbox Repair action is replaced with Install Brand New Part.During the installation, you will be faced with a difficult Skill Check.Upon succeeding the Skill Check, the generator's required charges are reduced by 10.This add-on is consumed after use.

Addon_Toolbox_008.name: Instructions
Addon_Toolbox_008.description:
Someone quickly painted what seems to be repair instructions on this piece of bark.

Eliminates Skill Checks while repairing with the Toolbox.

ADDON_toolbox_cuttingwire.name: Cutting Wire
ADDON_toolbox_cuttingwire.description:
A rudimentary cutting tool made from a jagged metal wire and two wooden handles.

Increases the Toolbox's sabotage speed by 20%.

ADDON_toolbox_socketswivels.name: Socket Swivels
ADDON_toolbox_socketswivels.description:
Swivels provide bend and flexibility for bolts that are out of reach, deep within mechanical devices.

Increases the Toolbox repair speed by 30%.

ADDON_toolbox_springclamp.name: Spring Clamp
ADDON_toolbox_springclamp.description:
Useful tool to clamp hoses or hold wires in place and prevent damage or injury.

The distance at which your repairs can be heard is reduced by 8 meters.

ADDON_TormentMode_BlackStrap.name: Black Strap
ADDON_TormentMode_BlackStrap.description: A nylon strap that was used to restrain a victim to a metal frame. The color makes it difficult to see the blood soaked into it.Increases the range of Punishment of the Damned by 0.5 meters.

ADDON_TormentMode_BurningManPainting.name: Burning Man Painting
ADDON_TormentMode_BurningManPainting.description: A diagram of the Lakeview Hotel. Red flames are painted over this place of guilt.Increases the range of Punishment of the Damned by 1.5 meters.

ADDON_TormentMode_CinderellaMusicBox.name: Cinderella Music Box
ADDON_TormentMode_CinderellaMusicBox.description: A music box with a figure from the fairy tale Cinderella. Found inside a suitcase adorned with stickers from multiple destinations.Increases the duration of trails left by Rites of Judgment by 15 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_CopperRing.name: Copper Ring
ADDON_TormentMode_CopperRing.description: Found in the basement of Brookhaven Hospital. It’s engraved with a picture of a spider.Increases maximum duration of Rites of Judgment by 1 second.

ADDON_TormentMode_CrimsonCeremoneyBook.name: Crimson Ceremony Book
ADDON_TormentMode_CrimsonCeremoneyBook.description:
A book about an ancient god. Author unknown.Survivors damaged by Punishment of the Damned suffer from the Hemorrhage and Mangled status effects for 80 seconds.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors. This lasts for a set duration or until healed.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

ADDON_TormentMode_DeadButterfly.name: Dead Butterfly
ADDON_TormentMode_DeadButterfly.description: A butterfly found on a bed at Wood Side Apartments. It’s frail and nearly falls apart when touched.Decreases time required to recharge Rites of Judgment by 2 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_ForgottenVideotape.name: Forgotten Videotape
ADDON_TormentMode_ForgottenVideotape.description: A videotape of two lovers vacationing in Silent Hill. Despite its sentimental value, it was left behind in the Lakeview Hotel.Decreases time required to recharge Rites of Judgment by 3 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_IridescentSealofMetatr.name: Iridescent Seal of Metatron
ADDON_TormentMode_IridescentSealofMetatr.description: A talisman with an odd design inscribed on it. The Entity’s influence seems to have altered it.When sending a Survivor to a Cage of Atonement, the auras of all Survivors suffering from Torment are revealed for 6 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_LeadRing.name: Lead Ring
ADDON_TormentMode_LeadRing.description: Found in a refrigerator. It’s engraved with a disgusting, bloated face.Increases the duration of trails left by Rites of Judgment by 10 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_LeopardPrintFabric.name: Leopard-Print Fabric
ADDON_TormentMode_LeopardPrintFabric.description: A shred of pink, leopard print fabric. It’s difficult to tell what it was used for.Increases the duration of Killer Instinct when triggered by Rites of Judgment by 0.5 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_LostMemoriesBook.name: Lost Memories Book
ADDON_TormentMode_LostMemoriesBook.description:
A book about the history and legends of Silent Hill and the surrounding area.Rites of Judgment trails inflict Oblivious for 15 seconds.

Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

ADDON_TormentMode_MannequinFoot.name: Mannequin Foot
ADDON_TormentMode_MannequinFoot.description: The smooth grey foot of a mannequin, brutally torn from its leg.Increases the duration of trails left by Rites of Judgment by 20 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_MistyDayRemainsofJudgm.name: Misty Day, Remains of Judgment
ADDON_TormentMode_MistyDayRemainsofJudgm.description: A painting of an imposing figure wearing a steel pyramid atop his head. Victims are caged in the background.Increases the duration of Killer Instinct when triggered by Rites of Judgment by 1 second.

ADDON_TormentMode_ObsidianGoblet.name: Obsidian Goblet
ADDON_TormentMode_ObsidianGoblet.description:
An ancient looking goblet carved from pure obsidian.Grants Undetectable while standing on a Rites of Judgment trail.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

ADDON_TormentMode_RustcoloredEgg.name: Rust-colored Egg
ADDON_TormentMode_RustcoloredEgg.description:
An old-looking egg, colored reddish orange. About the size of a quail’s egg.Rites of Judgment trails inflict Blindness for 60 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

ADDON_TormentMode_ScarletEgg.name: Scarlet Egg
ADDON_TormentMode_ScarletEgg.description: A fresh egg, strikingly red in color. About the size of a quail’s egg.Increases the duration of Killer Instinct when triggered by Rites of Judgment by 3 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_Spearhead.name: Spearhead
ADDON_TormentMode_Spearhead.description: The sharp, rusted tip of a spear. It’s flaked with blood from its last victim.Increases maximum duration of Rites of Judgment by 1.5 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_TabletoftheOppressor.name: Tablet of the Oppressor
ADDON_TormentMode_TabletoftheOppressor.description: A metal tablet engraved with Aztec figures.Increases maximum duration of Rites of Judgment by 2 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_ValtielSectPhotograph.name: Valtiel Sect Photograph
ADDON_TormentMode_ValtielSectPhotograph.description: A photograph of two figures in red hoods. Entitled Crimson and White Banquet for the Gods.Decreases time required to recharge Rites of Judgment by 4 seconds.

ADDON_TormentMode_WaxDoll.name: Wax Doll
ADDON_TormentMode_WaxDoll.description: A doll carved from wax, handcrafted by a prisoner who would soon face their judgment.Increases the range of Punishment of the Damned by 1 meter.

ADDON_trap_BloodyCoil.name: Bloody Coil
ADDON_trap_BloodyCoil.description:
Part sticky, part slippery, this grim liquid makes handling the traps' springs more dangerous.

When a Bear Trap is disarmed by a healthy Survivor, the bloody coils exact their price and that Survivor becomes injured.

ADDON_trap_DiamondStone.name: Iridescent Stone
ADDON_trap_DiamondStone.description:
Traps sharpened with this sickly gleaming stone seem to gain a life of their own.

Every 30 seconds, one closed Bear Trap chosen at random becomes set.

ADDON_trap_OilyCoil.name: Oily Coil
ADDON_trap_OilyCoil.description:
An oiled spring that marks the hands of those who meddle with a Bear Trap.

When resetting a Bear Trap, reveal the aura of the most recent Survivor to disarm it for 5 seconds.

ADDON_trap_RustedJaw.name: Rusted Jaws
ADDON_trap_RustedJaw.description:
These Bear Trap jaws are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that makes injuries particularly difficult to heal.

Bear Traps inflict Mangled on trapped survivors for 70 seconds.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts for a set duration or until fully healed.

ADDON_trap_StitchedBag.name: Tension Spring
ADDON_trap_StitchedBag.description:
A high tension spring that snaps back into place after being stretched.

A Bear Trap resets 2 seconds after a Survivor escapes from it.

ADDON_trap_TrapSetters.name: Coffee Grounds
ADDON_trap_TrapSetters.description:
An old rusted can containing damp coffee grounds.

Increases the Haste status effect gained after setting a  Bear Trap by 5%.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.

Addon_Trickster_01.name: Memento Blades
Addon_Trickster_01.description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse. Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.

Decreases time between Blade throws by 10%.

Addon_Trickster_02.name: Trick Pouch
Addon_Trickster_02.description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets. Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.

Increases maximum carried Blades by 4.Start the Trial with 4 additional Blades.

Addon_Trickster_03.name: Killing Part Chords
Addon_Trickster_03.description:
A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for. Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.

Increases movement speed while throwing Blades by 1%.

Addon_Trickster_04.name: Inferno Wires
Addon_Trickster_04.description:
Burnt wires from the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members. Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.

Increases duration of Main Event by 40%.

Addon_Trickster_05.name: Ji-Woon's Autograph
Addon_Trickster_05.description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster. Sore as his wrist was after hundreds of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.

Increases the time before a combo ends by 10%.

Addon_Trickster_06.name: On Target Single
Addon_Trickster_06.description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame. Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.

Increases time before Laceration starts decaying by 2 seconds.

Addon_Trickster_07.name: Lucky Blade
Addon_Trickster_07.description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned. Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.

Increases the duration of Main Event by 0.3 seconds for each Blade hit while it is active.

Addon_Trickster_08.name: Caged Heart Shoes
Addon_Trickster_08.description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart. Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.

Increases movement speed while throwing Blades by 2.5%.

Addon_Trickster_09.name: Tequila Moonrock
Addon_Trickster_09.description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar. Became a favorite of Ji-Woon's.

Increases duration of Main Event by 60%.

Addon_Trickster_10.name: Bloody Boa
Addon_Trickster_10.description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim’s slashed neck. A number of pockets are concealed within it.

Increases the maximum carried Blades by 8.Start the Trial with 8 additional Blades.

Addon_Trickster_11.name: Fizz-Spin Soda
Addon_Trickster_11.description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN. High sugar and caffeine content.

Increases the time before a combo ends by 15%.

Addon_Trickster_12.name: Waiting for You Watch
Addon_Trickster_12.description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I’ll Be Waiting for You. It’s a stage prop that doesn’t work and never will.

Increases the duration of Main Event by 0.4 second for each Blade hit while it is active.

Addon_Trickster_13.name: Ripper Brace
Addon_Trickster_13.description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper. Though unintentional, the design stabilizes the wrist better than many medical braces.

Increases time before Laceration starts decaying by 3 seconds.

Addon_Trickster_14.name: Melodious Murder
Addon_Trickster_14.description:
An audio file of victims’ crisp, clear shrieks. Ji-Woon incorporated the sounds into one of his more popular tracks.

Increases Blade reload speed at lockers by 25%.

Addon_Trickster_15.name: Diamond Cufflinks
Addon_Trickster_15.description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon. Rubbing off the blood, there’s so much to be seen in the glitter.

Reveals Survivor auras for 6 seconds when their Laceration reaches one Blade hit from maximum.

Addon_Trickster_16.name: Edge of Revival Album
Addon_Trickster_16.description:
The Trickster’s debut album. The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.

Blades shatter when hitting the environment, dealing 50% Laceration to nearby Survivors.

Addon_Trickster_17.name: Trick Blades
Addon_Trickster_17.description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination. A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the tricks he performed.

Blades ricochet off the environment twice.Ricochet hits grant 100 Bloodpoints.

Addon_Trickster_18.name: Cut Thru U Single
Addon_Trickster_18.description:
The first single released by NO SPIN after Ji-Woon joined their ranks. Scored an all-kill on the Korean charts.

Blades pierce through Survivors.Subsequent Survivors hit by the same Blade receive 50% Laceration.

Addon_Trickster_19.name: Death Throes Compilation
Addon_Trickster_19.description:
A collection of the final sounds from Ji-Woon's victims, adapted to a vinyl record. Terrifying and emotionally raw.

Reveal the aura of Survivors hit during Main Event for 6 seconds.

Addon_Trickster_20.name: Iridescent Photocard
Addon_Trickster_20.description:
A glass-like photo molded from The Fog itself. Ji-Woon's eyes shimmer holographically on his grinning face.

For each consecutive Blade hit, gain a stackable 1% Haste status effect, up to a maximum of 7%.This bonus is lost when missing a Blade throw or when injuring a Survivor by any means.

Haste increases Killer movement speed.
